ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: IBFT Outgoing Fee (Consumer)- Info
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>The State Bank of Pakistan has limited free Interbank fund transfers to Rs 25,000 for All banks in Pakistan.&nbsp;Jazzcash is also<span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;implementing <strong>0.1%</strong> fee on IBFT transactions which will be charged to customers after minimum sending limit of Rs 25,000 per month has been consumed.&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:14.6667px">This change is for consumer only</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>IBFT Outgoing Fee (Consumer):</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please be informed that as per SBP regulations, we are implementing <strong>&nbsp;Fee on IBFT transactions</strong> for all customers once they have consumed their sending limit of Rs 25,000 per month</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After the consumption of &nbsp;minimum sending limit of Rs. 25000, customers would be charged <strong>IBFT Fee</strong> on every transaction at a rate of 0.1% of the total transaction amount </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Detailed information of customer handling has been shared via KMS</span></span></li>
</ol>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6123
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Screenshot of system visibility is attached for refrence of fee deduction&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><u><strong>25K Accumulator Check:</strong></u></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">Go to CPS&nbsp;<span style="line-height:29.5pt"><span style="font-family:Carlito,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;<span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Search customer number</span>&agrave;<span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Click Accumulator&nbsp; </span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:12px"><span style="line-height:29.5pt"><span style="font-family:Carlito,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:Wingdings"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">(See attached Screenshot-2 for refrence)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This change is live from <strong>16th October&rsquo; 2021 00:00 and is applicable only for consumers </strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All customers would have an accumulated amount limit of Rs 25,000 allowed for IBFT transactions per month</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This limit would reset per month and within the limit no fee would be charged </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Fee deducted would be inclusive of FED</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This charge is to be implemented for all consumer customers</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">IBFT outgoing fee would be charged on all channels (App, USSD, BVS), for all customer charge profiles and account levels (L0,L1 L2)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the value of accumulator in CPS is greater then 25K then fee of 0.1% will be applied on principal amount of a transaction (Screenshot-2 attached for refrence)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For a transaction of Rs 5000, 0.1% of the principle amount would be deducted as a Fee where (FED is inclusive of Fee). Fee will be shown as 2 separate transactions where the Fee is being deducted and credited into the fee account and FED is being deducted and credited into the FED account )&nbsp;(See screenshot-1 attached for reference<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Active to Hot
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer request to permanently block his Jazzcash ATM card and request received at backend</p>

<p><strong>Note:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Warm = Temporary suspension</li>
	<li>Hot = Permanent blocking (lost and to avoid misuse)</li>
	<li>Active = Active card</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1058,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,21
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>If customer request to permanently block the ATM card after taking the given verification create following Efront activity &amp; transfer live call on 146000
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Main Category: Card Status Change</li>
		<li>Sub Category: Active to Hot</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Completer: CC-MFS</li>
	<li>TAT:&nbsp; Immediate</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Probe customer the current card status &amp; his request</li>
	<li>Check is card linked in CPS</li>
	<li>ATM card once status changed to Hot cannot be activated again &amp; customer need to get new debit card however card status as Warm can be activated if needed</li>
	<li>CCR will transfer live call to MFS backend after consulting CPS if card is linked</li>
	<li>If customer request to permanently block the ATM card after taking the given verification create following Efront activity &amp; transfer live call on 146000
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Main Category: Card Status Change</li>
		<li>Sub Category: Active to Hot</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Completer: CC-MFS</li>
	<li>TAT:&nbsp; Immediate</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

Category: Both

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Utility Bill Payment Info
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer call on helping for utility bill payment related quarries</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Utility bill payment method</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Utility bill payment charges</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: Third party error while making Utility bill payment method</li>
	<li>Scenario 4: Customer paid bill but amount deducted twice(Consult Complaint handling process)</li>
	<li>Scenario-5: Bill is not updated in UBP menu</li>
	<li>Scenario-6: No record found in UBP Menu for bill reference number</li>
	<li>Scenario-7: Customer paid 2 months&rsquo; bill (Current and last unpaid bills)</li>
	<li>Scenario-8: Customer paid bill after due date or Maturity date</li>
	<li>Scenario-9: Customer paid bill against wrong reference number by Freudian slip</li>
	<li>Scenario 10: Utility bill payment limit</li>
	<li>Scenario 11: UBP service suspended</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can i pay my bills from my JazzCash App?</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Login to your account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select &quot;Utility Bill Payments&quot;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You will see different category of Utility bill payment companies (Electricity, Water, Gas, Internet etc). Select your desired company</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter input (consumer/account/reference number etc) in the required fields to pay your bill</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; View the confirmation screen to review bill details and enter your MPIN to complete the payment.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can i pay my bills from my JazzCash USSD *786#?</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*2# and select the utility bill category</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From the menu select the required utility bill company</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter reference number, check the amount or mention the amount if required</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter MPIN to complete the transaction</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Do I have to pay charges for paying utility bills via JazzCash?</p>

<p>First 3 utility bill payments are free of cost. From 4th bill onwards customer will be charged Rs. 20/bill irrespective of the amount</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Why am i unable to pay utility bills from JazzCash ?</p>

<p>Following could be the reasons you are unable to pay your utility bills via JazzCash:</p>

<p>1-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The bill is already paid.</p>

<p>2-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You are entering an incorrect input (Consumer number/Reference number/Account number etc).</p>

<p>3-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You have insufficient funds in your JazzCash account.</p>

<p>4-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is a technical issue at the server. In this case, please re-try after a while</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>5. What is the maximum amount of bill I can pay in a month?</p>

<p>The maximum limit to pay utility bill via JazzCash is Rs. 150,000/month This amount can be used either to pay one bill or several bills</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Can I save my frequently paid bills?</p>

<p>Yes, you can add the bills in your list of &ldquo;My favorites&rdquo; by selecting the &ldquo;Add to favorites&rdquo; option at the last step of bill payment or</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can go to &ldquo;My Account&rdquo; menu and select &ldquo;Favorite Management&rdquo;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Click on &ldquo;Add another Favorite&rdquo; and choose utility bills</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Select utility bill category and company</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enter valid consumer number and it will be added to your list of favorites</p>

<p>7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can I delete or give a nick name to my favorite?</p>

<p>You can go your My Favorites, Utility bill menu or Favorite Management and click on edit button to rename or delete the favorite</p>

<p>8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How many favorites can I add?</p>

<p>You can add 10 utility bills as your favorite</p>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Upfront handle the customer</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>As per respective scenario</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>UBP transactions for NADRA, PTCL, Internet Bill Payment &amp; K-Electric is capped for L0, L1 &amp; L2 accounts at</li>
	<li>Rs. 150,000/month and this limit will separate from normal account limits.</li>
	<li>A customer should not be able to pay more than Rs. 150,000 bill (Not applicable for Employees)
	<ul>
		<li>For Example, A customer should be able to perform a cash out of Rs. 50,000 and can pay IESCO bill of Rs. 150,000.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>A Merchant should not be able to pay more than Rs. 100,000 bill</li>
	<li>Utility Bill payment Info process is aplicable for both Consumer &amp; Merchants</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Payoneer Info
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer calls and inquires details about payoneer service</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario 1: Payoneer mechanics &amp; charges</li>
	<li>Scenario 2: Payoneer account registration procedure</li>
	<li>Scenario 3: How to get Bank Account Information and Delink account</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><span style="font-size:18px"><strong>Freelance Payments (Payoneer)</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Can I register for payoneer account from their website and provide my Jazzcash account number</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; New Payoneer account registration for JazzCash customers can only be done through through JazzCash application.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; What is my Jazzcash IBAN which I have to provide at the time of registration?</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; JazzCash application automatically populates the system generated IBAN at the time of registration which you should verify to make sure it is &ldquo;PK29JAZZ0000000000000001&rdquo;. This has nothing to do with your mobile account number and is just a system level code.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If I submit my application with IBAN &ldquo;PK29JAZZ0000000000000001&rdquo; where will my money be withdrawn eventually?</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; The IBAN is a JazzCash and Payoneer mutually agreed IBAN code which makes sure your JazzCash mobile account, which is being used for registration, is liked with your new Payoneer Account.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazzcash charges Fees for withdrawing the amount from the mobile account?</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; The customers are allowed up to 2 Free Cash withdrawals per month using the JazzCash ATM Card. The ATM Card can be ordered by visiting the below mentioned link . https://vdc.jazzcash.com.pk/ . The Free cash withdrawals would only be valid in the month in which the remittance is received in the Mobile Account. The customers would be charged the normal fee on cash withdrawal from retailers.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The transaction has not been received in real time.</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; In certain cases, the transaction would get stuck in AML Screening. The TAT for clearing such transactions is 2 Days. Within 2 days the amount would be received in the customers Mobile Account.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; What are the charges for the withdrawal?</strong></p>

<p>Ans.&nbsp; Payoneer charges a standard fee of 2% per withdrawal. No charges are incurred on transferring the amount into JazzCash</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><span style="font-size:18px"><strong>International Remittance:</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>FAQs: Request to Pay</strong>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Can I request money from family aboard?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Yes, anyone having JazzCash account can request funds from their friends &amp; family from our &ldquo;Request to Pay &ldquo;options from 40 major countries worldwide.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I am a freelancer; Can I use this service to request my clients?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Yes, you can use this service to request money from your client.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; How can I let my payer know I have requested for money?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Once you have requested your payer for money, Payer receives a system generated request email, containing link to your request, upon clicking on the link payer is directed to world remit website where they can pay via different payment options i.e. Credit, Debit cards and etc&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Can I track my recent requests &amp; have view of historical requests?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Yes, you can track all your requests and their status in the track option under international payment request.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; What are the transaction charges?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Receiving transaction is free. If the transaction amount is greater than equal to USD 100, than there are no transaction charges for sender as well.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Will I receive transactions in real time?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: 95% of transactions are received in real time, while in some cases the transactions make take up to 24 hours (working days) to process.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where do I register my query/complaints?&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Ans: Incase of any query and complaints please contact our 24-hour helpline 4444 (from Jazz &amp; Warid numbers) and UAN 051/042, 111-124-444 (from other operators)&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Previously customers required to submit salary slip to upgrade to L2 accounts.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Now Payoneer customers can upgrade to L2 account by visiting nearest Mobilink Microfinance Bank along with below documents:</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Undertaking from customer that he/she is working as freelancer and mention expected monthly income from freelancing.</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Payoneer account statement</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer profile on which platform he/she is working</span></span></li>

</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Fraud Attempt-Fake Call
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer complains for calls &amp; messages received for fraud attempted and caller asked for MPIN/OTP Code or any other confidential information, then guide customers to ignore such calls as Jazz cash does not require MPIN for any verification.<br />
However customer can register complaint via any of the following channels</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Fraud Complaint USSD (*7039#)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">JazzCash USSD (*786#)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Interactive Voice Response &ndash; 4444</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>C<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">ases where customer calls over the helpline that amount is stolen from his/her ATM card, then agent will ask customer to block his/her card on <strong>temporary basis</strong>. Agent will vigilantly take the consent of customer and will perform the action after taking required verifications. </span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34

</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Fake CLI (Caller Number)</li>
	<li>MPIN Reset (Ask from Customer)</li>
	<li>Ask customer Jazz Cash Account number on which fraud is attempted</li>
	<li>First check details in CPS completed transactions in case fraud is not executed</li>
	<li>Make fraud attempt complaint in creator tab of efront against calling no, moreover we need to confirm from customer that details are share with fraudster or not, in case customer have not shared any confidential details</li>
	<li>Guide *786*6*1*2# MPIN change via USSD (self) process, incase if details are shared</li>
	<li>First verify customer is calling from Same CLI, in case Yes we need to verify customer on Level 3 and process MPIN reset request via 4444 upfront.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>In case of Fraud attempt case where efront request is forwarded from 4444 front end, we should not provide any TAT to the customer also we need to guide the customer that details will be forwarded to relevant department, Please do not say &ldquo;we are forwarding your complaint&rdquo; to the customer</li>
	<li>Sometime customer received call from (+4444, 004444), if customer calls and informs such numbers are making calls, tell them not to respond and not share any confidential information as fraudsters are using such numbers in order to win the trust of customer</li>
	<li>4444 is an inbound short code only (Customers can dial that, we cannot generate outbound calls from 4444)</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Extended Verification (if required)</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If Mother Name / DOB not available in system, then agent will ask:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Place of Birth and last three transactions (at least one transaction should verify)<span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<strong> OR</strong></span></span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Account Opening Process Info
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer call on helpline and wanted to ask details about Account opening process </span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To be Actions:</strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">1- Incase customer call and ask about Jazzcash account opening procedure agent to follow below statement:</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sir I am sharing account opening procedure through USSD &amp; APP via SMS, please follow the instructions mentioned in SMS and you can easily open your Jazz cash account. Thankyou </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase if customer insist again &amp; again to get guidance from 4444 helpline in such cases we will provide relevant information:</span></span></span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Only in case where customer insist, First s</span></span></span></span>eek customer&rsquo;s consent to go through step by step process over the call to create new Jazzcash account</li>
		<li>There is no need to recite the whole step in one go.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>Who can open a JazzCash account?</strong></p>

<p>Any customer having either postpaid or prepaid number with a valid NADRA CNIC can open a JazzCash account</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>Where can I register the JazzCash account?</strong></p>

<p>You can register for a JazzCash account from the following sources:</p>

<p>i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Download JazzCash mobile app from Play Store or Apple Store and register your account .</p>

<p>ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you are a Jazz user, you can register an account by dialing *786#;</p>

<p>iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Go to any nearby JazzCash Agent and get your get registered through our agents</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>What if I have not received an SMS from 8558?</strong></p>

<p>Please check if handset memory is full or not, if it is full, please delete old SMS. If the issue persists kindly call 4444 to ensure that your number is not blacklisted.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>I forgot my JazzCash account&rsquo;s MPIN?</strong></p>

<p>In case you forget your MPIN,</p>

<p>i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; On the mobile app, click on &#39;Forgot MPIN&#39; and authorize this action by entering your CNIC and Date of Birth. You will receive a 4-digit temporary MPIN through SMS, use it to create your new 4-digit MPIN.</p>

<p>ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can also call us at 051-111-124-444 to reset your MPIN</p>

<p>iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial *786*6*1*2# and reset your MPIN</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>Can I register for more than one JazzCash account on a single CNIC?</strong></p>

<p>No, only one JazzCash account can be opened on one CNIC.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>What are JazzCash account transaction limits?</strong></p>

<p>Transaction limits are applicable according to the level of your JazzCash account. You can check your account limits via any of the following:</p>

<p>i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In &ldquo;My Account&rdquo; section of the JazzCash app;</p>

<p>ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dial the following dial code: *786*6*9#</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>Can I transfer the ownership of my JazzCash account to someone else?</strong></p>

<p>No, this is not allowed. You need to request closure of your account</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>After how long will my JazzCash account become dormant due to inactivity?</strong></p>

<p>If you do not use your JazzCash account for a period of 12 constant months, your account will be temporarily blocked. In order to reactivate your account, please call 4444 where you will be verified as its user and your account will be restored instantly.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong><strong>Can I transfer money from my JazzCash account to any bank account?</strong></p>

<p>Yes, you can transfer money from your Jazzcash account to any bank account by opening your mobile app. Select &ldquo;Send Money&rdquo; then select &ldquo;Bank&rdquo; option and choose your required bank name.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>10.&nbsp; </strong><strong>Can I transfer money to anyone from my JazzCash account, how much time will it take to process the transaction?</strong></p>

<p>You can transfer funds through inter-bank fund transfer option. Simply visit that bank&#39;s online banking portal, select Mobilink Microfinance Bank, enter your registered JazzCash mobile number as your account number and enter the amount you wish to transfer.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>11.&nbsp; </strong><strong>Are there any annual fee to use the JazzCash account?</strong></p>

<p>No, there are no annual fee to use the JazzCash account.</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer calls and ask about the Jazz Cash account migration process</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Account Level 0 Migration Required to Level-1:</u></strong></span></span>
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If current account level is 0 and customer wanted to upgrade it to Level-1, tell the customer to visit nearest Franchise/Retail shop along with original CNIC, Once BVS is completed account level is changed from level-0 to level-1 </span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Account Level 1 Migration Required to Level-2:</u></strong></span></span>
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">if current account level is 1 and customer wanted to upgrade it to Level-2, tell the customer to visit</span></span> <span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">MMBL with below mentioned documents </span></span>
			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Original CNIC and Copy&nbsp;</span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Source of income </span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Visiting card</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">From Level-1 to Level-2 account migration will be processed in 3 Working Days </span></span></li>
</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check customer Account Level in CPS</span></span></li>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Account Level 0 Migration Required to Level-1:</u></strong></span></span>
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If current account level is 0 and customer wanted to upgrade it to Level-1, tell the customer to visit nearest Franchise/Retail shop along with original CNIC, Once BVS is completed account level is changed from level-0 to level-1 </span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>Account Level 1 Migration Required to Level-2:</u></strong></span></span>
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">if current account level is 1 and customer wanted to upgrade it to Level-2, tell the customer to visit</span></span> <span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">MMBL with below mentioned documents </span></span>

</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer calls and ask about the ready cash </span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>How to apply for ready cash:</strong></span></span>
		<ul>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide customer to dial *786*4*1# to check the eligibility along with amount eligible for, in case customer is eligible he will be shown limit from 100 to 15,000, in case customer opt for ready cash loan he will have to pay weekly charges of this loan facility over and above the loan amount.</span></span></li>
			<li>Now available in Jazzcash application, customer can now avail ready cash from Jazzcash app and USSD as well.</li>
			<li>All mechanics and complaint handling will remain same. If there is any issue regarding Jazzcash APP, kindly follow Jazzcash APP handling. Please handle customer queries accordingly.</li>

			</ul>
			</li>
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">if customer is not eligible for the ready cash loan he will receive a popup on dialing *786*4*1# &ldquo;You are not eligible for this offer&rdquo;</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Repay Ready Cash:</strong></span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer wanted to repay the ready cash loan and ask the information by calling 4444, agent need to guide him to dial *786*4*2# and follow the USSD flow to repay full amount or partial amount as per his choice &amp; convenience</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>

		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer wanted to check his ready cash payment history, agent will guide to dial *786*4*3# to check his history by self-service, in case customer not agrees to check via self service agent check from ready cash portal and inform the required information to the customer </span></span><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">For improving customer experience and better handling of JazzCash OMO Load/UBP service whenever there is an outage at any third party in OMO load/UBP , respective option in menu will be auto-suspended with following error notified to customers while accessing USSD/App for that particular company.</span></span></span></span>
	<ul>
		<li>&quot;Dear Customer, this service is currently not available. Please try again later&rdquo;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

We also need to guide customer that he can try using service later after sometime as currently he would not be able to use the service.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">There is no need to lock any complaint since in such case as option of OMO load/UBP of said operator is auto-suppressed to avoid any inconvenience for our valuable customers. Once OMO load/UBP services are resumed, customer would be able to use the service without any issue. This auto-suspension and resumption functionality also minimizes count of complaints due to reserve balance issue</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">This functionality has also enabled us to minimize the reserve balance complaints which previously had large number of complaints</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase customer complaints that balance deducted but not posted at Party B end and transaction is also completed than we need to cater complaint as per existing process</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:14.0pt">How to Register in Jazz Cash App(For Jazz Customer):</span></span></span></p>

</strong><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">OTP</span></span></span></span></strong> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Authentication: Android Users: Wait</span></span></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">for</span></span></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">App to automatically fetch your OTP </span></span></span></span><strong>&rarr;</strong> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Create MPIN </span></span></span></span><strong>&rarr;</strong> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Enter Mobile Number and MPIN on the Login</span></span></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">page to start using</span></span></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">App</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:14.0pt">2. How to Register in Jazz Cash App(Other mobile Network Customer): </span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Click on Sign Up <strong>&rarr;</strong></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Upload picture of front and back of CNIC </span></span></span></span><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&rarr;</span></span></strong> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">your own photo </span></span></span></span><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&rarr;</span></span></strong> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Wait for verification SMS within 24 Hours</span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"> <strong>&rarr;</strong> </span></span><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Once SMS is received, click on SIGN</span></span></span></span> <span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">UP again, enter details and Create MPIN </span></span></span></span><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">&rarr;</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span 	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer calls and ask how to activate Sehat Sahulat Insurance, guide the customer a</span></span><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">bout the two available plans </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>1 Year Plan:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Dial *786*8*3*1# for activating one year plan </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong><u>6 Months Plan:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Dial *786*8*3*2# for activating six months plan</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer can choose according to his ease</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Provide information upfront on call along with sending ISMS</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><u><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Family Tahafuz</strong> - <strong>Sehat Sahulat Features:</strong></span></span></u></p>

<ul>
	<li>The product offers a financial safety net to customers against costs of hospitalisation.</li>
	<li>A service to avail free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers can SMS their medical query on 8331. A doctor will call back within one business day to discuss the query</li>
	<li>The product not only covers the customer but also his or her spouse as well as children</li>
	<li>Paperless enrolment process allows enrolment in a matter of few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrolment.</li>
	<li>Fast and digital claims processing</li>
</ul>

<p>Claim Process&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>At the time of hospitalisation, inform about the hospitalization on Claims helpline no. 051&ndash; 8466466</li>
	<li>Notify the claims helpline when the customer is discharged. Our representative will help the customer in making the claim</li>
	<li>Inform within fifteen (15) days of discharge from the hospital</li>
</ul>

<p>Note:</p>

<ul>
	<li>In case customer want to check status of an existing subscription of Family Tahafuz or Family Tahafuz Premium, we can confirm details through CPS. In addition customer can also check details through USSD by selecting required option.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Asaan Mobile Account (AMA)-Pilot
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Asaan Mobile Account (AMA) allows anyone in Pakistan with a basic mobile phone to open a digital transaction account swiftly through a USSD code or string from anywhere at any time. The objective of the scheme is to improve accessibility of new customers for account opening, drive usage of digital financial services through increased number of account-to-account transactions across various networks and provide digital access to a range of quality financial services.</p>

Submission Channel: 34

</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Customer will dial the USSD code *2262# from any mobile network connection and access the AMA menu and open a mobile account in any of the above mentioned banks.&nbsp; In the pilot phase the following transactions can be performed by the user. All these services are now live as well.
	<ul>
		<li>Account Registration</li>
		<li>Send Money to Wallet</li>
		<li>Send Money to Bank</li>
		<li>Pay Utility Bills</li>
		<li>MPIN Creation</li>
		<li>MPIN Change</li>
		<li>Mini Statement</li>
		<li>Account Closure</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>All mobile accounts registered via AMA channel will be L0 accounts. The accounts will be Cash In/Cash Out blocked and the customer will need to visit an agent to perform a biometric cash in to get the Cash In transaction activated. Agents will perform the cash in for these accounts as per the existing process and flow for cash in.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash Account Regulatory Changes
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif; font-size:medium">As per SBP guidelines, biometric verification of Mobile Accounts has been made mandatory and remotely opened accounts <strong>(Level 0)</strong> will not be able to perform Cash In and Cash out without biometric verification</span></p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32,34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case any customer with &ldquo;<strong>L0</strong>&rdquo; accounts complains that he is unable to perform transactions , simply update his account level through &ldquo;<strong>Account Limit Upgrade</strong>&rdquo; option after which they will be able to perform transactions involving BVS through Business Centers &amp; Franchise Channel.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Once OTA is pushed below shared new functionalities is available from Business Centers &amp; Franchise Channel.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Business Centers &amp; Franchise Channels should not raise any complaint to backend team for this implemented change as this is as per regulatory requirement</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All Jazz/OMNO Mobile accounts (L0) opened remotely (JazzCash account opened through USSD/APP) after 14th July, 2019 will not be able to perform Cash In, Cash Out &amp; ATM Withdrawal transactions until &amp; unless they have provided Biometric verification</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All Jazz/OMNO Mobile account registered till 14th July, 2019 will be able to perform Cash In, Cash Out &amp; ATM Withdrawal transactions normally</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All Jazz/OMNO Mobile Accounts opened via Biometric will be able to perform Cash In, Cash Out &amp; ATM Withdrawal transactions normally</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Jazz/Warid Mobile Account holders can get the details of Biometric enabled agent by sending a SMS containing <strong>&ldquo;B&rdquo; </strong>to <strong>2179</strong> to get the details of nearby Biometric Enabled agent or by dialing <strong>*786*0*1#</strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer&rsquo;s Mobile account will be migrated from Level 0 to Level 1 account if biometric verification is successful against below transactions/actions:</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Cash In Transaction performed via Biometric</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Cash Out Transaction performed via Biometric</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">MPIN Reset</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Registration (If there is already account registered on combination provided by Customer)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">DR Sending (If there is L0 Mobile Account registered against Sender CNIC &amp; MSISDN)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">DR Collection (If there is L0 Mobile Account registered against Receiver CNIC &amp; MSISDN)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">IBFT Outgoing via Biometric (If there is L0 Mobile Account registered against Sender CNIC &amp; MSISDN)</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase customer inputs someone else number with his/her CNIC than Cash in/Cashout&nbsp; will not get processed and customer will be offered to get JazzCash Account registered, if <strong>&ldquo;Yes&rdquo;</strong> option is selected on BVS device then after input of CNIC &amp; Mobile number, account will get registered</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer input someone else number against his/her CNIC and there is already any other number registered against that CNIC than those numbers will be shown on BVS devices as masked CLIs. Customer will be asked to enter correct number in this case</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Once customer is migrated to L1, than will be able to perform all the transactions as per normal process and existing flow</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case any customer (L0 only) comes with complaint that he is not being able to perform Cash in/Cashout or ATM withdrawal than will request him/her to visit nearest JazzCash BVS touchpoint. Business Centers &amp; Franchise Channel can simply update customer account level through &ldquo;<strong>Account Limit Upgrade</strong>&rdquo; option after which they will be able to perform transactions involving BVS </span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Kuickpay - School Fee Payment Integration
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>JazzCash has collaborated with Kuickpay to enable JazzCash customer to pay school fee of selected schools through JazzCash APP.&nbsp;With our focus on promoting education solutions and providing them with a convenient way to make payments, we integrated 1link and kuickpay to integrate with multiple companies. They provide solutions to address challenges faced by organizations in the area of payment collection. Kuickway works with industry experts in the financial sector including banks, fintechs and others to improve payment collection mechanisms that benefit both corporates and consumers.</p>

<div>
<table align="left">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">JazzCash has collaborated with KUICKPAY to promote their e-services and provide customers a convenient way to pay for education fee. Using the base of more than 5 million JazzCash active users and MMBL Branches, customers will be able to submit their payments. </span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">&nbsp;</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
</div>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p>Fee submission process Via JazzCash Application:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will open JazzCash Application</li>
	<li>Customer will select &ldquo;Payments&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Customer will select school</li>
	<li>Enter Consumer Number</li>
	<li>Customer will confirm the transaction via entering his/her M-Pin</li>
	<li>Customer will get a confirmation SMS</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Currently this will be available on JazzCash app only. Means customer would be able to pay via JazzCash App only</li>
	<li>In addition please note that addition of schools for this payment solution will be ongoing process</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">If <strong>Transaction Count Limit</strong> applicable for a calendar month is utilized while performing IBFT transaction during a day or week then customer would not be able to perform <strong>IBFT</strong> <strong>transaction</strong> for that particular month &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">We need to guide customer calling at DFS helpline accordingly and should not take any complaint for above mentioned scenarios where customer is unable to perform IBFT transaction due to <strong>Daily</strong>, <strong>Monthly</strong>, <strong>Yearly</strong> or <strong>per</strong> <strong>transaction</strong> limit rule implementation </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li>Cash out, ATM withdrawal, IBFT per limit transaction is 50,000, which means if L2 wants to withdraw 400K in one day from Cash out, he would have to do 4 Cash out of 50K, 50K each</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Deceased Jazz Cash Account Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case Jazz cash account holder is expired and account needs to be closed</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Deceased Jazz Cash Account closure request can be processed through Jazz Business centers/Franchises or Mobilink Microfinance Bank Branches. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Legal heirs of deceased can submit all the requisite documents at above these touch points, which will be sent to BBCR Team through Account Management Portal (AMS) for further processing. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">BBCR Team will scrutinize the documents and close the account if requirement are fulfilled after treating the balance exist in account or reject the request if found any discrepancy </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Documentation Required:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The required documentation is avaliable under scenerios</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Important Handling Guidelines</u></strong>:</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; For closing of deceased account, the legal heirs of deceased can submit all the requisite documents in Jazz Business centers/Franchises or Mobilink Bank Branches. All these touch points collect the documents and send to BBCR team at bank end for further processing. BBCR team after receiving scrutinize the documents and close the account if found ok after treating the balance in account or reject the request if found any discrepancy </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; No account closure processed at Business Center/Franchises or MMBL Branches at their own, they just receive/collect the documents/request from customer and then send to BBCR team for closure </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; Customer has to close his/her account prior to changing SIM/Ownership </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; Seek certified copy of the succession certificate &amp; Guardianship Certificate (if applicable) customer have to get it confirmed from his/her local counsel &amp; court has issued this order then please disburse amount </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; Ensure credentials (through original CNIC &amp; take biometric of next of kin) of the persons to whom we disburse amounts </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&bull; Please seek application from the persons submitting succession certificate, to whom the court has ordered disbursement of amount, which should be witnessed by two persons and identified by third person who personally knows the applicant with all credentials, to be verified by branch manager through original CNIC- (verifying picture, Name, Father&rsquo;s name, husband&rsquo;s name, CNIC number, address etc.)</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 27,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: waqas.khan
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6117
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><u><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case of JazzCash Account holder&rsquo;s death, the Branchless banking operations department should act on the following guidelines.</span></span></u></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All operations in the account shall be stopped, As soon as bank knows about death of customer, bank marks his account Freeze</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No zakat will be deducted if the customer expired before the valuation date</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If balance is less than 100 we remit the amount on claimant CNIC after submitting of necessary documents</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If balance is more than 100 and up to 10000 and its family member&rsquo;s (legal heirs ) wants to withdraw the amount, payment will be disburse through PO/ Banker&rsquo;s Cheque, after submitting of necessary documents, payment to will be made as per indemnity bond</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case the balance is above Rs. 10,000/-, payment to legal heirs will be made as per succession Certificate, issued by the court in favor of claimant</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Information regarding balance of the account may be provided to the &ldquo;<strong>NEXT OF KIN</strong>&rdquo;/legal heirs for handling of succession case</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case deceased customer&rsquo;s blood relation came at business center for ownership change, we close the jazz cash account on deceased customer name, after jazz cash account closure on deceased customer name, sim ownership changed to relative name and he/she will open new account on his/her name</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please add all documents in one PDF file which need to be updated through AMS portal (Account Closure Portal) for BBCR team to handle request as per process</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Franchise need to coordinate with DFS POC for AMS login creation where required</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><u><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>TAT: </strong></span></span></u></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For balance up to Rs.100 case is 4 working days</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For balance above Rs 100 is minimum 7 working days and maximum ASAP</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Order Confirmation- Jazz Cash AlaCart
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">When Customer approaches us on our helpline to ask whether his/her order is confirmed or not</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><u><strong><span style="font-size:14pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri Light&quot;,sans-serif">Process at Call Center</span></span></strong></u></h2>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">4444 Agent guide customer for order confirmation as per below process. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Order Placed Via Alacart App:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will guide the customer to navigate AlaCart Profile <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Go to my order <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Click on relevant order number <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span>Click track order for order confirmation Status. </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Order Placed Via USSD Code:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will guide the customer to dial USSD code<span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Go to market place&rsquo; option <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Go to &lsquo;view order history &amp; status&rsquo; <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Go to pending order&rsquo; <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Go to relevant order number <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> For order confirmation Status </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Status available in against Order:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Order Received (means customer order received successfully) </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Processed (means customer order is processed and now its confirmed)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Dispatched (means customer order has dispatched)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">On The Way (means customer order is on way for delivery)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Delivered (means customer order is delivered successfully)</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left:192px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">OR </span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer calls at 4444 helpline and inquire about Order confirmation</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">4444 agent once verified the call is related to information ask MSISDN from which order was placed OR ask order number from the customer (Whichever was available) and check in (AlaCart web based system)</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Status available in against Order:</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Order Received (means customer order received successfully) </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Processed (means customer order is processed and now its confirmed)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Dispatched (means customer order has dispatched)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">On The Way (means customer order is on way for delivery)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Delivered (means customer order is delivered successfully)</span></span></li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: CTI Portal Degradation- Alternative Remedy
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS

Complaint Description: <p><strong><u>Problem Statement:</u></strong></p>

<p>Please be informed in case there is any issue related to&nbsp;degradation of&nbsp;<u><strong>Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) Portal&nbsp;&amp; Unavailability of 81111 IVR</strong></u>&nbsp;below&nbsp;is the alternative remedy which is&nbsp;<span style="color:#e74c3c">manadatory</span>&nbsp;to be provided to the customer&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><u>Process:</u></strong></p>

<p>In case if customer came with above scenarios<strong>&nbsp;</strong>guide the customer&nbsp;to perform below actions&nbsp;from USSD or Jazz cash Application</p>

<ul>
	<li>Create Card PIN</li>
	<li>Track Order</li>
	<li>Create Card PIN</li>
	<li>Online Transaction Activation&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Online Transaction Deactivation</li>
	<li>Online Transaction Limit Change</li>
	<li>Contactless Transaction Limit Change</li>
	<li>Block Card - Temporary</li>
	<li>Block Card - Permanent</li>
	<li>Unblock Card</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;USSD Flow is attached in PDF for refrence</p>

<p>In case of CTI portal &amp; 81111 IVR Unavailability, call will not transferred to backend team, 4444 agent should handle the customer on Live call by giving above mentioned alternative remedy&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
