ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: DFS Activities & Callback Handling Process
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Where contact is established</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Case will be closed as per process, if issue is resolved.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">RU agent will be mentioned complete resolution provided to the customer in complaint remarks. </span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Where contact is not established</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Agent will make total 2 calls. 2 call back attempts within 30 mins.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Each attempt will be made after the span of 30 mins.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Loop will be closed after 2 unsuccessful attempts.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">After each attempt, agent must mention the complete notes in activity and isms will be sent to the customer.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">If contact not established with customers, agent will complete the case by adding possible resolution and relevant isms will be sent.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">1<sup>st</sup> attempt: Send ISMS to the customer</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&ldquo;Dear Customer, we are trying to contact you with respect to your complaint/query at 4444 helpline, we will call you again after 30 minutes. Thank you.&rdquo;</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">2<sup>nd</sup> attempt: Made after 30 minutes of 1st attempt, if contact not established send ISMS</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&ldquo;Dear Customer, we are unable to contact you regarding your query/complaint. Please call 4444 for further assistance Thank you&quot;</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">After this, the agent needs to mention in the related ServiceNow activity notes: &ldquo;Two call back attempts have been made at an interval of 30 minutes; however, contact was not established with the customer.&rdquo; The agent should then document the customer&#39;s issue after system consultation in the ServiceNow activity, which was raised by the team, along with the possible resolution. This ensures that if the customer calls or visits any touchpoint again, they will be guided accordingly.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Where wrong/irrelevant activity is created</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Resolution Unit will ensure that customers get the maximum and real time resolution of their concerns.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">For any activity which is created wrongly or in wrong header, Resolution Unit will edit same activity with correct details and will not create new activity.&nbsp; </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Also, RU agent will send wrong activity details to TL, TL further E-mail all wrong activities to OPS team at day end keeping Jazz Cash team in loop.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Escalation</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Customer escalations will be handled by RU team with certain priorities.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">RU team will keep record of all customer escalations.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Team will keep the customer&rsquo;s concern in loop till the issue gets resolved.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">RU Team will keep inform customer regarding every update related to their complaint via call back.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Call backs will be made where customer&rsquo;s concern/issue is not resolved.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Where issue is escalated to the concerned teams (Bank or IT-FS).</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Where issue is in process and TAT has lapsed, agents will call back and request the customers to wait.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Executive Escalation</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Executive/CEO/Management escalations will be handled by RU team with certain priorities</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">RU team will keep record of all executive escalations</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">RU team will follow up the case till complete resolution of issue</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">RU Team will keep inform customer regarding every update in case</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk195101890"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Cancel activities</span></span></u></strong></a></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Activity should be cancelled where agent used wrong header for customer complaint and CRU agent lodged the relevant complaint for better customer experience (If all required details are availed in System)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Activity should be cancelled where case can be handled upfront. CRU agent will be mentioned proper resolution remarks and call back to the customer for loop closure.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#181717"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Activity should be cancelled if duplicate activity found against same customer MSISDN but we have to cancel the latest one instead of old previous activity</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk195101876"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Routed activity</span></span></u></strong></a></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Activity should be route if all relevant details are available in system</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Activity should be route if latest attempt of customer&rsquo;s reflects in CPS &amp; USSD portal (CRU Agent will share In-progress ISMS to customer).</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk195101864"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Issue resolved activity</span></span></u></strong></a></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Where customer issue had resolved, so case should be close after <strong>1st attempt </strong>with issue resolved isms sent to customer and proper resolution remarks.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Note: All the mention activities need to be catered without call back except where case can be handled upfront.</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Issue resolved activity, Routed activity, Cancel activities</span></span></span></span></span></li>

<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">CRU Live Call Handling</span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Escalation to Backend- Service Now
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer complaint or request is already in process, TAT is over but request not completed within committed time &amp; customer contact on helpline for follow-up</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Scenarios</strong>

	<ul>
		<li>Scenario-1: TAT over - CC-MFS team raised issue to concerned team but response not received (Owner: CC: MFS)</li>
		<li>Scenario-2: TAT over - Complaint owner team has not taken the required action &amp; activity is open/pending</li>
		<li>Scenario-3: Issue not resolved - Activity is completed however customer issue is not resolved</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Cash â€“ Insurance â€“ Motorway Insurance 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Motorway Insurance Information</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Motorway Insurance is a vehicle insurance service for JazzCash Account holders who are travelling on M-Tag enabled motorways/highways in Pakistan.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can get their M-Tag enabled vehicle insured for 30 days in just 140 Rs.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claim coverage starts when M-Tag is scanned at the motorway/highway entrance and ends when M-tag is scanned at motorway exit.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All M-tag enabled Vehicles are covered in this insurance. This includes cars, vans, buses etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Motorway Insurance service covers below incidents with respective amounts:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:636px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Coverage Incident</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Amount</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Vehicle Accident (Own)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 20,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>For customer&rsquo;s own car</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Vehicle Accident (3rd Party)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 20,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This includes property damage, bodily injury, and death of 3rd party.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Car Towing</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs 10,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>In case of mechanical/electrical breakdown<a href="#_msocom_1" id="_anchor_1" name="_msoanchor_1">[MSKS1]</a>&nbsp; or accident</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Insurance Validity: The insurance coverage is valid for a period of 30 days, starting from the date of subscription, including the day of subscription itself.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In the event of damages, the customer is required to initially cover the expenses from their own pocket and can later claim the reimbursable amount as per the insurance coverage.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The claimed amount will be reimbursed only to the customer&#39;s JazzCash account after the insurance team verifies the submitted documents.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a customer has subscribed to Motorway Insurance for more than 5 vehicles, only the details of the latest 5 vehicles will be displayed in the app. For information regarding the remaining insurance plans, customers can contact the vendor using the below provided contact details.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Motorway Insurance Vendor (TPL): UAN: 021- 111 000 301</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Motorway Insurance Vendor (TPL) WhatsApp: 0333-8754671</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a similar complaint or query is received on the helpline, the agent can transfer the call to the Motorway Insurance Vendor (TPL) at 6030.</p>

<p><strong>Motorway Insurance - Subscription Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers can opt for Motorway Insurance while performing M-Tag top-up transactions through the JazzCash App. Refer to How-to scenarios for subscription process.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Users can access their policy details in the Insurance dashboard within the app,</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash App &agrave; Banking &amp; Finance &agrave; Insurance &agrave; Motorway Insurance &agrave; select Policy/M-Tag ID</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The policy information will be available for 30 days from the date of subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; During the subscription process, customers can click on &quot;Terms &amp; Conditions&quot; to obtain additional information about the insurance coverage and pricing.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash App &agrave; travel &agrave; M-tag Top up &agrave; recharge M-Tag &agrave; Amount &agrave; Click Yes on Motorway Insurance &agrave; Terms &amp; Conditions</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers who have multiple M-Tags registered in the JazzCash App can individually subscribe to Motorway Insurance for each M-Tag separately.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For each M-Tag, customers need to perform an M-Tag top-up transaction and subscribe to Motorway Insurance individually.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once subscribed, there is no option to cancel or reverse the M-Tag insurance or the insurance amount. The insurance will remain active for 30 days and cannot be canceled or reversed.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The service subscription option is only available during the M-Tag top-up transaction. Users need to top up their M-TAG balance to access the Motorway Insurance subscription option.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is no minimum top-up limit for the M-Tag balance.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The subscription option will be hidden for customers who have already subscribed to Motorway Insurance.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The policy follows a single-claim basis, and once a claim is settled, the policy will be terminated.</p>

<p><strong>Motorway Insurance - Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers can submit their claims for Motorway Insurance through the JazzCash App by navigating to the Banking &amp; Finance section and selecting Motorway Insurance. Please refer to how-to scenario for claim submission process.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The claim submission option will be available for a period of 30 days from the date of policy subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers have the ability to claim all the incident amounts specified in the product information. This means that customers can claim up to Rs. 50,000 for a subscription amount of Rs. 140.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All claim requests will be thoroughly verified by the Insurance company to ensure their validity and accuracy.</p>

<p><strong>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </strong>Below documents are required if customer wants to submit a claim:</p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC (CNIC of the Policy holder/JazzCash Account Holder)</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Driving License (Driving License of the Policy holder/JazzCash Account Holder)</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Car registration (effected Car Registration document)</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Police Report (Motorway police report of the incident).</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Towing/Other (Optional)</p>

<p>6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Other (any other supporting document e.g., picture of damaged car etc.)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers have the option to capture pictures of the required documents using the in-app camera feature or upload images from their gallery. Only image files in formats such as .JPEG or .PNG can be uploaded as claim documents. Document files in formats like .doc or .pdf will not be accepted.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers are eligible to make a claim under this insurance policy only if the insured vehicle is affected on M-tag enabled motorways/highways.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The status of the claim can be viewed in the Insurance dashboard within the app for a period of 30 days from the date of policy subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To initiate the claim process, the insurance policy must be in an active state within the app.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The reimbursed claim amount, as per the insurance coverage, will be credited to the customer&#39;s JazzCash Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Damages or losses resulting from personal conflicts are not covered under the insurance.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of a claim, customers may be required to provide the MTAG check-in and check-out details of the vehicle, if requested by TPL (the insurance provider).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Successful claim reimbursement is subject to adherence to the speed limits defined by the National Highway Authority (NHA).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For accidental claims, a motorway police report is mandatory.</p>

Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>FAQs:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Q: How many days are required for the acknowledgement of the claim?</strong></p>

<p>A: One working day if all required documents are shared.</p>

<p><strong>Q: How many days are required for the settlement of claim?</strong></p>

<p>A: After provision of highway accident report and as policy is single claim based, it will be assessed on the basis of provided images by insured.</p>

<p><strong>Q: How much time is required for the declination of a forged or invalid claim? </strong></p>

<p>A: As soon as this is identified by the claim department</p>

<p><strong>Q: What is not covered in M-TAG insurance?</strong></p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Damages/Loss arising due to personal conflict is not covered.</p>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage is limited within motorways/highways where the MTAG facility is available.</p>

<p>3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any claims arising due to over-speeding, or rash driving are not covered.</p>

<p>4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is not covered if the vehicle is driven more than the max speed limits defined by NHA.</p>

<p>5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If towing is arranged by Motorway Police with zero cost, then no towing charges will be payable.</p>

<p><strong>Q: Is the motorway police involvement must?</strong></p>

<p>A: In case of any accidental claim, motorway police report is mandatory</p>

<p><strong>Q: Who to contact in case of emergency or query?</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can intimate claim through the app.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Motorway policy report and vehicle damage images will be required to process the claim.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claim intimation via app along with above information will be verified by the claims department.</p>

<p>Settlement as per teams and conditions of the policy.</p>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Insurance â€“ Term Takaful 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Term Takaful is a Life insurance plan which provides a lump sum payout in case of a Participant&rsquo;s death.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with EFU Life insurance.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers are being offered Term Takaful via below options:</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; List of potential customers is shared with EFU team by Jazz Product Team. Outbound sales calls will be made to potential customers from 051-7080507.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can subscribe to term Takaful via USSD. Refer to Scenario 2 for subscription process. &nbsp;</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:648px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Coverage Details</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Amount</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Natural Death</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>200,000</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Death occurring in the course of nature and from natural causes (as age or disease) as opposed to accident or violence</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Accidental Death</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>600,000 (3x benefit in case of accidental death)</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Death by accidental means</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Accidental Medical Reimbursement (Bundled with Accidental Death)</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>10,000</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Accidental medical Reimbursement is provided in case of accidental death.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>1600 Rs/year</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			<p>Active</p>

			</td>
		</tr>

			<p>Look Free Period</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; List of potential customers contacted by Outbound/EFU Team.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage age: 18 to 56 years</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No restrictions of panel hospitals, for hospital cash benefit.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation/Exclusion from Policy</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage terminates when a participant attains 56th Birthday.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of death due to suicide or self-inflicted Injury.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any pre-existing conditions contracted due to accident or bodily Injury before the commencement of cover under this policy.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Murder, Suicide, self-inflicted Injury, participation in a criminal act, or violation of the law.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No amount will be reversed if customer unsubscribe policy after Look free period.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Terms &amp; conditions of Term Life will be shared with Customer via SMS.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Next of Kin of participant will request for claim by calling JazzCash helpline or directly to EFU Life. If customer calls Jazz Helpline, call will be routed to VDN 6031.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For direct contact to EFU for claim or any other query;</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; EFU Life- WTO on 111-338-436 or 051-7080507</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; For Queries: <a href="mailto:gbdsmallticket@efulife.com">gbdsmallticket@efulife.com</a> &nbsp;</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; For Claim(s): <a href="mailto:claims@efulife.com">claims@efulife.com</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Documents required for claim are;</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Copy of death certificate issued by NADRA / Union Council</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Claimant&rsquo;s Statement</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Copy of CNIC of claimant and deceased</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Heirship Certificate to establish claimant title in case of death of covered member (In case the beneficiary details are not recorded with the Company)</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Succession of certificate &amp; original guardian-ship certificate (in case beneficiary is a minor)</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Attending physicians report, postmortem/FIR</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Past medical records</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Any other document deemed necessary by the Company.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Accidental Medical reimbursement is only available in case of Accidental Death.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No restrictions of panel hospitals, for hospital cash benefit.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Deposit via Debit Card 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>JazzCash customer can deposit amount directly in their JazzCash account via Debit Card of any Bank.</li>
	<li>Card information is saved by default for future use after performing a successful Deposit via Debit Card transaction. Once the card information is saved, it will show as linked debit card.</li>
	<li>Customer can view linked debit cards in JazzCash App under My Account option as shown below:</li>
</ul>

<p>JazzCash &agrave; My Account &agrave; Linked Cards &amp; Other Accounts</p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;If multiple debit cards are linked, last used debit card will be set as default and will be used for next transactions.</li>
	<li>While performing deposit transaction via debit card, user can change default debit Card by clicking &ldquo;Change&rdquo; button before entering Amount.</li>
	<li>Debit card will be authorized by respective debit card issuer bank when it is used for the first time during Deposit via Debit card transaction. Verification OTP will be sent on customer&rsquo;s registered number at bank.</li>
	<li>Payment via debit card service is available in Split payment option for transactions which support Split payments. Example UBP, IBFT.</li>
	<li>Total transaction charge = service fee (3% of the deposited amount) + FED (Federal Excise Duty).</li>
	<li>FED is determined based on the province in which the customer account is originally registered.</li>
	<li>For information on the tax percentages with respective provinces, please refer below:</li>
</ul>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Federal&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 16%</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Sindh&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 13%</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Punjab&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 16%</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; KPK&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 15%</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Baluchistan&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 15%</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Example:</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Deposit Amount = 1,000 Rs.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Service fee = 3% of deposit Amount = 30 Rs.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; FED = 16% of Service fee = 16% of 30 Rs. = 4.8 Rs.</p>

<p>o&nbsp;&nbsp; Total Transaction charge = service fee + FED = 30 + 4.8 = 34.8Rs.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Call Handling - No Response/Distortion/Call Drop 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;Due to network or system issue, helpline agent may experience few issues like Call dead/Call dropped upon connecting&nbsp; to agent, No Response from customer, voice distortion during conversation or call dropped during conversation.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;This process will cover these scenarios and respective handling of such calls.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Conditions/Limitations:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;In case of scenario 2, 3 and 4, agent must take acknowledgement 3 times before ending call.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Sell Load - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product/Service Description:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Sell Jazz Load is a service for JazzCash Business users where we will reward them for performing Jazz load to their customers.</li>
	<li>They will be rewarded 1.4% without Holding tax + GST as per the as per province.</li>
	<li>This commission will be posted in real time.</li>
	<li>&middot;Merchant can check the commission on the Sell Jazz Load transaction on the review screen while performing transaction.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Minimum and Maximum load limits shall apply as per standard Jazz load limits.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Minimum Jazz load limit per Transaction= Rs.100</li>
	<li>Maximum Jazz load limit per transaction= Rs.5000</li>
	<li>Merchant can use this service only available for prepaid numbers.</li>
	<li>Merchant cannot perform Jazz Sell Load on self registered number.</li>
	<li>In the start of month Rs.2000 Jazz Sell Load limit will be given to merchant.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Accepting QR/Till ID transaction will increase the limit of Jazz Sell Load limit.
	<ul>
		<li>Example: Merchant initial Jazz Sell Load Limit =2000</li>
		<li>Merchant Receive QR/TILL ID transaction in June = 5000</li>
		<li>After Successfully Receiving QR/TILL ID transaction Merchant Jazz Sell Load Limit will increase in July = 2000 + 5000 = 7000</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Merchant can view Dashboard with information on Amount of Load he can sell and Total Commission earned.</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:80px">Business app &gt;&gt; Click on Sell Jazz Load &gt;&gt; On the main page you can Total Load you can sell and Total Commission Earned.</p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Merchant Sell OMNO Load</span></u></strong></span></span></p>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Sell </span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">OMNO</span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> Load is a service for JazzCash Business users where we will reward them for performing </span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">OMNO </span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">load</span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">, Bundle and Postpaid Bill</span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> to their customers.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">They will be rewarded 1.4% without Holding tax + GST as per the as per province</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Merchant can view Dashboard with information on Amount of Load he can sell and Total Commission earned.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Business app &gt;&gt;Open drawer &gt;&gt;Click </span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Verdana&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Sell Loads and Earn </span></span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&gt;&gt; On the main page you can see Total Load you can sell and Total Commission Earned.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Limit:</span></span></span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In the start of month Rs. 500,000 OMNO Sell Load Limit will be given to merchant</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Accepting QR/Till ID transaction will increase the limit of OMNO Sell Load Limit</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Example:&nbsp;Merchant initial OMNO Sell Load Limit in June = 500,000</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant Receive QR/TILL ID transaction in June = Rs. 200,000</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After successfully receiving QR/Till ID transaction Merchant OMNO Sell Limit will increase in July = Initial Limit in June + QR/Till ID transaction Received in June</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">500,000 + 200,000 = 700,000</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can sell OMNO load via Merchant App.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>To check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>To check Transaction History:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt;Check Transaction</p>

<p><strong>To check Transaction Failure Reason:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction &gt;&gt; transaction Details &gt;&gt; Failure Description</p>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 15836

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Salary Disbursement 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product/Service Description:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Salary disbursement is a new service introduced for JazzCash Merchants.</li>
	<li>The Salary Disbursement service provides merchant an easy solution for disbursing salaries in the account of their employees.</li>
	<li>This service is only available in JazzCash Business App.</li>
	<li>Salary disbursement Service uses money transfer functionality of JazzCash to transfer funds from Merchant account to employee account.</li>
	<li>Merchant can add, delete and edit their employee&rsquo;s accounts in salary disbursement menu. Refer to How to Processes scenarios.</li>
	<li>Employee account can be a JazzCash customer account, merchant account and other bank account.</li>
	<li>To add other bank account for salary disbursement, the Bank name should exist in JazzCash IBFT list.</li>
	<li>If employee account is a merchant account, it will be added via mobile number instead of till ID/QR.</li>
	<li>Merchant can add maximum 5 accounts in Merchant salary disbursement menu.</li>
	<li>Salary disbursement service is free of cost; however, fund transfer charges are applicable as per existing mechanics for Merchant Account.</li>
	<li>Merchant will be charged as per employee Account type whether it&rsquo;s a JazzCash Account, Other Bank Account or a Merchant Account. Refer to latest KMS Communication for respective charges.</li>
	<li>If employee account is a merchant account, employee will be charged for receiving fund in his/her own merchant account. Refer to updated KMS communication for charges.</li>
	<li>Merchant can send salaries to employees individually or in a bulk. Refer to how-to processes.</li>
	<li>Merchant can also send Advance salary to employee. For Advance salary transfer, merchant have to enter amount manually before completing transaction.</li>
	<li>Funds transfer via Salary Disbursement services are posted in real time.</li>
	<li>Merchant can check salary disbursement transactions history via History tab.</li>
</ul>

<p>JazzCash Business App &gt;&gt; Salary disbursement &gt;&gt; History Tab</p>

<ul>
	<li>Transactions in history tab are updated real time.</li>
	<li>Salary disbursement transaction can be identified in CPS by transaction type &ldquo;Salary Disbursement&rdquo; in transaction details.</li>
</ul>

<p>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Review Transaction or Transaction History &gt;&gt; Search transaction &gt;&gt; Click receipt # &gt;&gt; check reason Type &amp; Details</p>

<ul>
	<li>In History tab, merchant can view individual transaction by selecting the transaction.</li>
	<li>Merchant can click download button to download the slip as an image.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

		<tr>

			<p>Scenario 2.8: How to Delete Employees?</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Account status: Active</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p><strong>To check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>To check Transaction History:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction</p>

<p><strong>To check Transaction Failure Reason:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction &gt;&gt; transaction Details &gt;&gt; Failure Description</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer - DR Reversal 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related amount sent on CNIC.</li>
	<li>Customer can send or receive amount on valid CNIC and can withdraw amount from BVS enable retailers and franchises.</li>
	<li>DR means (Domestic Remittance) Reversal means when a customer wanted to reverse an amount which he/she sent from his/her Jazz Cash account to any customer CNIC.</li>
	<li>DR means (Domestic Remittance) CNIC Edit means when a customer wanted to edit (change) receiver CNIC on which amount is sent.</li>
	<li>Customer can send Rs:50000 on CNIC from his/her mobile Account.</li>
	<li>The receiving customer must collect the transaction within 180 days. As per regulations, all uncollected transactions for longer than 180 days will be blocked. Once blocked, the transaction cannot be reversed nor CNIC can be edited.</li>
	<li>Charges on transferring amount on CNIC are below
	<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
		<tbody>
			<tr>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Amount Slab</strong></p>
				</td>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges</strong></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p>Rs. 0 to 1000</p>
				</td>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p>Rs.55</p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p>Rs. 1001 to 2500</p>
				</td>
				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p>Rs.110</p>
				</td>
			</tr>

				<td style="vertical-align:top">
				<p>Rs. 2501 to 4000</p>

				<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Receiver CNIC in G2P/P2P</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; My Functions &gt;&gt; Operations &gt;&gt; G2P/P2P Payment Management &gt;&gt; search Receiver CNIC</p>

ID: 15846

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer Account â€“ Account Closure
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash account is just like a normal bank account. Like any bank account, customer has a legal right to close JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can request for JazzCash account closure by visiting Jazz Experience center, franchise and by calling helpline.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account closure request at helpline, agent will ask the reason of account closure to ensure better guidance to customer. Example. If customer wants to open JazzCash account on other number, agent will guide customer to use &ldquo;Change of MSISDN&rdquo; option available at any Jazz experience center, franchise and BVS enabled retailers instead of closing the account.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent must check account status (system navigation) before proceeding with account closure request. &nbsp;</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status must be in Active, Pending Active or Dormant state.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Suspended state due to CNIC expiry, refer to account activation process <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/5540">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/5540</a> and guide customer to callback once account is activated.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Suspended state due to fraud, guide the customer to visit MMBL bank for account closure.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Frozen state, guide customer to visit Jazz Experience Center, franchise or MMBL for account closure.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Only original customer can request for account closure from helpline. Below type of customer is considered as original customer.</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Mobile Account Owner</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; SIM (CLI) Owner</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Guardian (In case of NextGen Account) &nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Account cannot be closed if there is any balance available in account.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If account is on calling customer&rsquo;s name, and balance is available, customer will be asked to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and callback once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisas (decimal value) than amount can only be transferred via JC app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1 Rs.</li>
	<li>If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask customer to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</li>
	<li>Before taking the account closure request from different CLI, agent need to guide the customer that the available amount will be transferred on customer CNIC.</li>
	<li>In case calling customer does not know the account ownership but is the owner of calling SIM (CLI), and balance amount is greater than 50,000, route the customer to MMBL branch or Jazz Experience Center for account closure as amount greater than 50,000 cannot be transferred to CNIC. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>For NextGen (Minor Account), only guardian can request for account closure. Account request will not be entertained on Minor&rsquo;s request.</li>
	<li>For Account closure of a Deceased customer, Next of Kin will have to visit Jazz Experience Center, Franchise or MMBL branch with Death Certificate.</li>
	<li>For successful account closure request at helpline, agent will check pre-requisites as mentioned in table 1.0 below:</li>
	<li>If these checks are cleared, agent will take account closure request as per scenarios 2.0.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:98%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Account Closure &ndash; Pre-requisite Checks</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account registration date is less than 60 days old</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account closure requires a minimum of 60 days from the registration date. Agent will inform registration date and ask customer to call back once 60 days are passed. If customer wants to close account immediately, agent will ask the customer to visit Franchise/Business Center.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account balance is not Zero</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account balance must be zero to process account closure from helpline. Inform customer to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and callback once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisas than amount can only be transferred via JC app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1</p>

			<p>If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask customer to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Original Customer not Available</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Caller should be the original customer of account except if caller is the SIM owner and does not know the ownership of JazzCash account registered on calling number. In this case, request will be taken.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3 not Verified</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Calling/original customer has to be verified as per information available in NADRA Portal. If respective information that needs to be verified is not available in NADRA Portal, customer will be considered as unverified. Additionally, route customer to NADRA Center to get respective details updated.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Unpaid Ready Cash Loan</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account will not be closed is there is any outstanding Ready Cash loan. Agent will check Ready cash portal and guide customer to call back for account closure after clearing the pending amount.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active, Pending Active, Dormant</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation (as per scenarios)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Suspended &amp; Frozen account&rsquo;s closure request can only be processed from Experience Center and franchise.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; L2 account&rsquo;s closure request can only be processed MMBL branch.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account closure request will not be entertained if calling CLI is a PTCL number.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>

<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>Info Scenario</strong></span></p>

<p>Table 3.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:100%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Customer Account Closure&ndash; Info Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Work Codes</strong></p>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1 What is Account Closure process?</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Closure Process Info</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2 Account Closure Request Info &ndash; Pre-requisite not fulfilled</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Closure Process Info - 60 Days Not Completed</p>

			<p>Account Closure Process Info - Account Balance Not Zero</p>

			<p>Account Closure Process Info - Original Customer Not Available</p>

			<p>Account Closure Process Info - L3 Verifications Not Given</p>

			<p>Account Closure Process Info - Ready Cash Unpaid</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification = L3</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status = Active, Pending Active, Dormant</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account registration date &gt; 60 days</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account balance = Zero, except for below scenarios:</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Caller in not the owner of Mobile account</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Mobile Account owner is calling from CLI other than mobile account number</p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Caller = Original Customer (Mobile Account Owner/SIM Owner/Guardian in case of NextGen Account)</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No outstanding Ready Cash loan</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent Action required/relevant in SOP: </strong></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Check Status&agrave; Active, Pending Active, Dormant</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (Normal Account):</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Click Info &agrave; Click KYC Info tab &agrave; Check Personal Information</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (NextGen Account &ndash; Guardian Details):</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Click Info &agrave; Click KYC Info tab &agrave; Check KIN Details &agrave; Check Guardian Details</p>

<p><strong>Check Balance:</strong> CPS &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Click Operations &agrave; Click Info &agrave; Click Account Info Tab &agrave; Check Balance</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &agrave; Search MSISDN &agrave; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &agrave; Check Verification details. ()</p>

<p><strong>Create Account Closure Task in CPS - </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> &nbsp;Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> &nbsp;Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> &nbsp;Click Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> &nbsp;View Customer Info &agrave; View Basic Info &agrave; Select edit button in front of Identity Status <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> &nbsp;Pop Up Menu appears. Select &ldquo;closed&rdquo; in New Identity Status Option &agrave; Enter Service Now ID in Remarks &agrave; Click Submit to complete Task</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Instant Loan 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: &nbsp; &nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Merchant Instant Loan is a loan service for JazzCash Mobile Account Merchants to avail short-term loans of small denominations through JazzCash Business App and USSD (*800#).</li>
	<li>Merchant Instant Loan service credits loan amount into Merchant&rsquo;s Account allowing them to utilize the amount instantly to meet short-term loan requirement.</li>
	<li>Merchants can avail Merchant Instant Loan service for a maximum duration of 28 days; with the option to pay back early as well.</li>
	<li>The total loan limit for each Jazz user merchant is determined based on the financial engagement over JazzCash and usage of SIM. Credit limit will increase with the increased usage of JazzCash transactions and SIM usage. The loan limits vary from Rs. 5,000 to Rs. 50,000.</li>
	<li>For OMNO merchant, loan limit is determined only on JazzCash account usage. Loan limit will increase with increase in JazzCash account usage.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;Merchant can only get one loan of up to Rs 50,000 at one time. Loan amount depends on loan eligibility.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Account closure cannot be performed on Merchant account if there is any outstanding Merchant Instant Loan amount.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Merchant Instant Loan Eligibility: &nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Service is available for eligible merchants only.</li>
	<li>Merchant can self-check eligibility using USSD and App. If Merchant is not eligible for the Instant Loan, respective notification will be shared. Refer to Scenario 2 on how to check eligibility.</li>
	<li>Eligibility is auto set by Backend system accordingly to Merchant profile and JazzCash services usage.</li>
	<li>Eligibility cannot be changes/altered manually.</li>
	<li>Please note that Agent will not check eligibility or eligibility amount for merchant and only guide self-check process. Refer to scenario 2.1.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Merchant Instant Loan Fee &amp; Payment:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Merchant will have to pay daily charges of 1% of loan amount, over and above the loan amount. 1% charges will be on principle amount.</li>
	<li>Merchants will be charged up to 28 days with a daily fee of 1%. No fee will be charged after 28 days. However, merchants will be able to make early repayment of their outstanding loan (Principle + Fee) with no additional fee of paying early.</li>
	<li>Merchants must pay back their loan within 2 weeks. In case their repayment is late, JazzCash will automatically extend their due date by a week (up to maximum of 2 weeks).</li>
	<li>Merchant can repay full as well as partial loan amount.</li>
	<li>Merchant can deposit amount repayable or more into their JazzCash Mobile Account before the due date for an automatic repayment (Auto Debit). Auto Debit will run on the 15th Day of loan issuance.</li>
	<li>If merchant still does not repay the Merchant Instant Loan in full, they will be blacklisted from availing Merchant Instant Loan service in future and will also be reported as a defaulter to the State Bank of Pakistan.</li>
	<li>Remaining loan amount is less than Rs 1 (Decimals) need to inform Merchant that he/she can make Merchant Instant Loan full repayment option or Partial repayment option through App only. Refer to How to Processes 2.3</li>
	<li>If merchant requests agent to check repayment or loan amount, agent will first check the details in Ready Cash portal. If merchant details are not available in Reach Cash portal, agent will check in-house lending Portal.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>In-House lending Portal:&nbsp; </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will be provided with &ldquo;In &ndash; House Lending Portal&rdquo; to check merchant&rsquo;s Instant loan status. Agent can check following information in In-House Lending Portal.</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:40px">o&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant subscribed Loan Amount</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">o&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Loan Due date</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">o&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment Information</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">o&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Loan/repayment History</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will not have visibility of merchant&rsquo;s loan eligibility or the eligible amount.</li>
	<li>For all calls related to instant loan, agent will only route merchant for self-process to check their eligibility. Refer to scenario 2.1.</li>
	<li>Please note that for few months after the product is launched, both Ready Cash Portal and in-House lending Portal will be required by agent to get loan/repayment visibility.</li>
	<li>Upon merchant query agent will consult Ready Cash portal first. If details are not available, agent will move to in-house Lending Portal.</li>
	<li>Once Merchant Instant Loan service is fully moved to in-house Lending portal, Ready Cash will not be required. A formal communication will be shared once the Instant Loan service is fully shifted to in-house Lending Portal.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Insurance â€“ Crop Insurance 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Crop Insurance is a new product offered by JazzCash powered by Salaam Takaful Limited (STL).</li>
	<li>This service provide insurance policy to farmer in which Farmer&rsquo;s crops are insured under 4 perils and if any of the peril limits are breached, farmer is eligible for claim and will have the insurance amount automatically posted in JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>This is an annual insurance and is only available on JazzCash App.</li>
	<li>Basic farmer details will (Full name, CNIC, CNIC issue Date, Number and Location) will be taken automatically from JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>Farmer will be asked to enter few details to get coverage. The detail includes:</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Farm Location/District (City or District name)</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Crop Types (Wheat, Maize, Rice, Cotton)</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Type of Ownership (rented/Own)</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">o&nbsp;&nbsp; Farm Size (In Acres)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Farmer will be charged yearly Rs 1500 per acre.</li>
	<li>Farmer can claim Rs 5000 per peril (in total Rs 20,000) per acre</li>
	<li>STL is using satellite coverage to check weather of respective farmer area and provide visibility to STL team.</li>
	<li>The trigger/limit of each peril is shown to farmer at the time of subscription.</li>
	<li>Once the customer subscribed to service, active monitoring of perils will be activated and farmer can view the peril values in the policy dashboard.</li>
	<li>PFB the list of Perils and respective details:</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Peril</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Claim Amount </strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Claim Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Excessive Heats</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs 5000 per acre</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>STL have record of heat forecast for last 75 year. If the limit/trigger of weather (heat) is breached, claim is automatically triggered and farmer will get the insurance amount in their JazzCash Account. The trigger/limit of the heat peril is shown to farmer at the time of subscription.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Excessive Rainfall</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs 5000 per acre</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>STL have record of rainfall forecast for last 75 year. If the limit/trigger of rainfall is breached, claim is automatically triggered and farmer will get the insurance amount in their JazzCash Account. The trigger/limit of the rainfall peril is shown to farmer at the time of subscription.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Locust Attack</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs 5000 per acre</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This peril is monitored and managed as per government directives. The Crop is declared as Locust attack affected as per declaration and notification by the Government of Pakistan. Once the notification is received and farmer&rsquo;s crop is within the affected area, claim is automatically triggered and amount will be sent to farmer&rsquo;s JazzCash account.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Flood</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs 5000 per acre</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This peril is monitored and managed as per government directives. The Crop is declared as Flood affected as per declaration and notification by the Government of Pakistan. Once the notification is received and farmer&rsquo;s crop is within the affected area, claim is automatically triggered, and amount will be sent to farmer&rsquo;s JazzCash account.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>For each peril, customer is eligible for 5,000 Rs/acre claim amount with a total of 20,000 rs./acre if all the perils are breached.</li>
	<li>Claim against each peril will be provided only once in a year&rsquo;s time.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Payout Terms &amp; Conditions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Parametric Perils (Annual Acc. Of Rain &amp; Max. Temperature)
	<ul>
		<li>&nbsp;On Trigger (Monitoring will be activated for the region once farmer is registered. If the trigger is met anytime during the policy, we will payout)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Calamity Declaration Perils (Locust Attack &amp; Flood)
	<ul>
		<li>The loss sustained in the affected area and resulted in the actual yield being less&nbsp; than 50% of the reference yield of that area.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>That the said crop is situated in an area declared as calamity affected by the Government (competent authority) and declaration is also notified in the gazette.</li>
	<li>Exclusions mentioned in agreement
	<ul>
		<li>The maximum limit of liability of the Company for all claims would be 300% of contribution received.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Value Added Service </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In addition to Insurance services, customer will be able to check current weather Updates/Crop Advisory and Forecast in JazzCash App.</li>
	<li>Farmers will be provided with accurate and up-to-date weather forecasts to help them prepare potential weather &amp; related risks. Please find below the navigation to check Value added services:</li>
	<li>JazzCash App &gt;&gt; Insurance &gt;&gt; click Value Added services &gt;&gt; Click respective service (Weather, crop Advisory</li>
	<li>For all product info and claim related calls agent will transfer call on <strong>6032.</strong></li>
	<li>Customer can reverse the insurance subscription amount in 14 days.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Account Statement 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Mandatory Information</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Account Statement provides a summary of all account activities, including completed credit/debit transactions and balance details.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers with a valid email can receive the account statement via email, SMS, or check it in the JazzCash app or USSD.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can check last 1 month statement via USSD. Customer can check last 1 year statement via JazzCash App</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><br />
<strong>Product / Service Description: &nbsp; </strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>JazzCash Account Statement is a document that covers all the activity of your account.</li>
	<li>Account Statement includes all transaction details and balance of JazzCash account which is sent or received in JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>Account Statement includes all completed credit and debit transaction details.</li>
	<li>For Account Statement, customer must have a valid email address so that they can receive Account Statement in a selected file format on provided email address.</li>
	<li>If the customer already added their email to their account profile, the statement will be sent on that email.</li>
	<li>When making the statement, if the customer wants it sent to a different email, they can enter that email during statement generation request and the statement will be sent on provided email.</li>
	<li>Customer can update email in Account profile using below navigation.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>For USSD: </strong>*786# &gt;&gt; 6 For My Account &gt;&gt; 9 For Update Email</p>

<p><strong>For JazzCash APP: </strong>JazzCash App &gt;&gt; Click Profile &gt;&gt; Click Edit In front of Email option &gt;&gt; Enter New Email &gt;&gt; Click Continue</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will inform customer the complete process of getting statement according to customer requirement along with sending relevant ISMS.</li>
	<li>Account statement can be checked from USSD and JazzCash app.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Account Statement &ndash; USSD Info:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Account statement By SMS: Last 5 complete transaction perform in last 7 days can be checked</li>
	<li>Account statement By email: Last 30 days transactions can be checked.</li>
	<li>Customer will be able to enter start date and end date but number of days should not be more than 30.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Account Statement - JazzCash App Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In Transaction History Tab, last 20 Transactions will shown.</li>
	<li>Once customer performed a transaction, transaction will be updated within 2 hours in Account Statement and in Transaction History Tab.</li>
	<li>From JazzCash App, customer can check 1 Year statement in one go on Email through Transaction History Tab or Account Statement Tab.</li>
	<li>Customer can manually enter start date and end date to get a specific duration account statement.</li>
	<li>Customer can also get statement by pre-define options in Account Statement Tab.</li>
	<li>Customer can get account statement on existing Email.</li>
	<li>Customer can also get Account Statement on any other Email by clicking on Change Email Id while requesting &nbsp;statement.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
