<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Careem Voucher 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Careem Voucher.</li>
	<li>Customer can buy Careem Voucher from JazzCash via USSD and JazzCash App.</li>
	<li>These vouchers have fixed denominations (PKR 200, 500, 1000 &amp; 1500).</li>
	<li>After successful purchase, customer is sent a text message with voucher code.</li>
	<li>Customer can enter this voucher code in Careem App and redeem the amount i.e. top up Careem pay wallet.</li>
	<li>To use a Careem voucher, you need to have a Careem account and the Careem app on your phone.</li>
	<li>There is no specific service fee.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Cash Out 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Customer Cash-Out</li>
	<li>Customer can withdraw cash from his Mobile Account from any JazzCash Agent across Pakistan</li>
	<li>Customer can withdraw amount from retailer, franchise and experience center</li>
	<li>Customer will provide his JazzCash account MSISDN and will also share amount which he wants to withdraw.</li>
	<li>JazzCash Agent will enter customer MSISDN a popup will appear on JazzCash customer account holder screen he will enter MPIN to authorize transaction</li>
	<li>OMNO user need to login in JazzCash app retailer will enter customer MSISDN a popup will appear on JazzCash customer account holder screen he will enter MPIN to authorize transaction</li>
	<li>Customer cash-out is the Realtime transaction.</li>
	<li>Cash Out cannot be performed by Customer L0 Account</li>
	<li>If customer account is L0 and is unable to Perform Cash-Out agent will inform customer the account migration process from L0 to L1 (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Migration &ndash; Sop).</li>
	<li>When account is successfully migrated to L1 then customer can perform Cash-in and Cash-out.</li>
	<li>Once Cash-out transaction is completed it cannot be reversed in customers account</li>
	<li>Consecutive 2 cash out from the same retailer/franchise and experience cannot be processed and customer will have to wait for 10 minutes to get it done from same retailer/franchise and experience center.</li>
	<li>Cash Out Charges, Charge to only customer</li>
	<li>These Cash-out are deducted from customer account while performing Cash-out.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Amount Slab</strong></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Funds Withdrawal Via ATM 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Customer Cash withdrawal from ATM.</li>
	<li>Cash withdrawals electronically convert funds from your bank account, savings, or pension to physical cash in hand.</li>
	<li>Customer can withdraw amount via ATM from Master Debit Card, PayPak Debit Card, Visa Debit Card.</li>
	<li>Customer should create ATM Pin for using debit card and for amount withdraw ATM Pin will be not JazzCash Account MPIN</li>
	<li>For successful Cash Withdrawal ATM Card should be linked with JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>Customer will simply insert Atm Card in ATM Machine</li>
	<li>After inserting card, customer will enter Card PIN and enter amount or select predefined amount and amount will be withdrawn</li>
	<li>Customer will have to select Default option on withdrawing amount via ATM.</li>
	<li>Customer can withdraw maximum Rs.50,000 in one go from ATM</li>
	<li>Minimum withdrawal via ATM is Rs.500 Customer cannot withdraw amount such as (600, 700 etc.) need to be multiple of Rs.500</li>
	<li>Customer cash withdrawal charges are:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Amount Slab</strong></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Withdrawal Charges</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Jazz Postpaid Bill 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Jazz Postpaid Bill payments.</li>
	<li>Postpaid</li>
	<li>Customer can pay Jazz Postpaid Bill Payment by JazzCash App and USSD (*786#).</li>
	<li>Customer Postpaid Bill transaction can be identified in CPS by transaction type &ldquo;Indigo Bill Payment&rdquo; in transaction details</li>
	<li>Customer need to enter amount to pay JazzCash Postpaid bill.</li>
	<li>There is no additional service fee for Postpaid bill from JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>The minimum and maximum limits apply.</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via App Minimum Limit:50</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via App Maximum Limit:10,000</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via USSD Minimum Limit:50</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via USSD Maximum Limit: 10,000</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Money Transfer â€“ IBFT 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios relation money transfer IBFT.</li>
	<li>IBFT is the service which allows JazzCash customers to send and receive amount from JazzCash account to any bank account.</li>
	<li>IBFT sending and receiving limits are set as per customer account limit</li>
	<li>IBFT per limit transaction is 50,000, if customer has higher limit than 50,000 than customer can perform multiple transaction of 50,000.</li>
	<li>There are two types of ibft transaction.
	<ul>
		<li>Incoming Ibft Transaction</li>
		<li>Outgoing Ibft Transaction</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Transaction includes all transactions which is sent from bank account to JazzCash account</li>
	<li>Customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform customer to register complaint at Sender Bank.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This transaction includes transaction send from JazzCash account to bank account</li>
	<li>For IBFT via USSD, funds are transferred with a delay up to 30 minutes. Customer can cancel this outgoing ibft transaction within delayed time.</li>
	<li>For IBFT via APP, funds are transferred in real time. Customer cannot cancel this outgoing IBFT transaction.</li>
	<li>Account limits are set for send and receive amount.</li>
	<li>If customer is complaining that he/she sent money through IBFT or to Easy Paisa account and B party (receiver) didn&rsquo;t receive the amount yet.</li>
	<li>Agent will check system and if transaction is completed within a spam of 15 minutes.</li>
	<li>Agent will guide customer to wait for at least 15 minutes and if amount is still not received by B party (receiver) then call again and complaint will be taken</li>
	<li>There are two types of charges on outgoing ibft transations.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>1-link Charges</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will charged Rs. 1.55 from Rs. 0 to 25,000.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>When customer exceeds 25,000 limits now customer will be charged 0.02% of transaction in a same month from 25,001 to 200,000.</li>
	<li>From 200,000 to above customer will be charged Rs.40.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>SBP Charges:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>25,000 in a month is free after sending 25,000 customers will charged 0.116% of a transaction amount or Rs.232. From both charges which charges are less will charged to customer.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for service details</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status (Pending Active, Active, Dormant, Suspended, Frozen)</p>

<p><strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click review Transactions <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p><strong>To check Account Transaction Amount Limit:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click operation <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Rule Profile In Customer Info</p>

<p><strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click operation <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ JazzCash Debit Card Status 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a name="_Hlk133588217"></a></p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover call scenarios related to JazzCash Debit Card status.</li>
	<li>There are total three card statuses.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:474px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>JazzCash Debit Card Status value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">card in use</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Warm</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">temporary suspension</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Hot</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">permanent blocking</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>When a customer receives a Mastercard debit card that specific card is in active state and customer just need to generate ATM Card PIN.</li>
	<li>When a customer receives a Paypak debit card that specific card status is first time block agent will activate the card then will generate ATM PIN.</li>
	<li>If customer lost his card or any other issue with card and wanted to block his ATM Card</li>
	<li>Agent will provide two option to customer</li>
	<li>&sect;&nbsp; Temporary Block (Active to Warm)</li>
	<li>&sect;&nbsp; Permanent Block (Active to Hot)</li>
	<li>If customer card is in Warm state customer can activate his card again</li>
	<li>If customer card is in Warm state customer can also Permanent Block that specific card</li>
	<li>If customer card is in Hot state customer cannot activate that specific card and will order new card</li>
	<li>If customer Mastercard debit card is in Warm state he can activate card via USSD/App</li>
	<li>If Visa/Paypak debit card are in warm state card will be activated via helpline.</li>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check for Visa/Paypak Debit Card: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CNIC in Visa/PayPak Tab &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC/Card Number &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ID: 16145

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ JazzCash Debit Card PIN 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover call scenarios related to JazzCash Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>JazzCash Debit card PIN has 2 Value = No value/Empty, Normal</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0&nbsp; </strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>PIN Status Value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Action Required</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&ldquo;No Value/Empty&rdquo;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>New Debit card received but first time PIN not set</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Inform 1st time PIN set process.</p>

			<p>Generate JazzCash Debit&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Normal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>PIN is set and in active state</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Guide customer to use current PIN</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case customer does not remember PIN, need to generate Debit Card PIN</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>When a customer receives a Mastercard debit card that specific card is in active state, but customer just need to generate Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>When a customer receives a Paypak debit card that specific card status is first time block agent will have to activate the card then will generate Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>If customer forget his Debit Card PIN agent will generate pin from helpline and customer will not be able to use Debit Card PIN previously used Debit card PIN.</li>
	<li>For generating Debit Card PIN agent will conference the call on IVR 81111</li>
	<li>Inform Customer to use different PIN other than JazzCash account MPIN</li>
	<li>Customer will use 4-digit PIN of different Digits</li>
	<li>Customer will enter 4-digit PIN and will re-enter 4-digit PIN to confirm and PIN will be generated</li>
	<li>Customer can now use his ATM Card for POS Transaction, E-COM Transaction, Cash withdrawal via ATM</li>
	<li>For cash withdrawal via atm customer will use Default option for successful cash withdrawal</li>
	<li>Agent will inform customer to keep Debit card PIN secret and do not share with anyone</li>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:552px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>JazzCash Debit Card PIN &ndash; Information</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

	<li>Verification: L3</li>

	<li>Data to be Taken from CPS Only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent:</strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check for Visa/Paypak Debit Card: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CNIC in Visa/PayPak Tab &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC/Card Number &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - Account Closure - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Sop document will cover scenarios related to Merchant account closure.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Merchant account is a business bank account. Merchant has a legal right to close JazzCash Merchant account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can request for JazzCash Merchant account closure by calling helpline.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account closure request at helpline, agent will ask the reason of account closure to ensure better guidance to Merchant.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent must check account status (system navigation) before proceeding with account closure request. &nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status must be in Active or Pending Active.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Suspended state due to CNIC expiry, refer to account activation process and guide merchant to callback once account is activated.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Suspended state due to fraud, guide the merchant to visit MMBL bank for account closure.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Frozen state, guide merchant to visit Jazz Experience Center, franchise or MMBL for account closure.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Only original merchant can request for account closure from helpline. Below type of Merchant is considered as original merchant.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Mobile Account Owner</li>
	<li>&nbsp;SIM (CLI) Owner</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account cannot be closed if there is any balance available in account and Pending Instant Loan</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If account is on calling merchant name, and balance is available, merchant will be asked to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and callback once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisas (decimal value) than amount can only be transferred via JC Business app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1 Rs.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask Merchant to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Account Closure should be performed for all account types M0, M1, M2 from helpline.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A non-migrated merchant account is a merchant account that was created before a certain date and has not been migrated to a new platform or system.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non migrated merchant are those merchant which are unable to use Business app and USSD (*800#) there profiles are merchant but they use normal JazzCash App and USSD (*786#)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-Migrated merchant Account are those account which are not completely merchant but their profile is merchant</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 60 days check on merchant account closure is not applicable</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case calling Merchant does not know the account ownership but is the owner of calling SIM (CLI), and balance amount is greater than 50,000, route the merchant to MMBL branch or Jazz Experience Center for account closure as amount greater than 50,000 cannot be transferred to CNIC. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For successful account closure request at helpline, agent will check pre-requisites as mentioned in table 1.0 below:</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If these checks are cleared, agent will take account closure request as per scenarios 2.0.</p>

<p>&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:98%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Merchant Account Closure &ndash; Pre-requisite Checks</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account balance is not Zero</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account balance must be zero to process account closure from helpline. Inform merchant to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and callback once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisas than amount can only be transferred via JC business app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1</p>

			<p>If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask merchant to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Original Merchant not Available</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Caller should be the original merchant of account except if caller is the SIM owner and does not know the ownership of JazzCash business account registered on calling number. In this case, request will be taken.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3 not Verified</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Calling/original merchant has to be verified as per information available in NADRA Portal. If respective information that needs to be verified is not available in NADRA Portal, merchant will be considered as unverified. Additionally, route merchant to NADRA Center to get respective details updated.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Unpaid Instant Loan</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account will not be closed is there is any outstanding Instant loan. Agent will check Ready cash portal and guide merchant to call back for account closure after clearing the pending amount.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification = L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status = Active, Pending Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account balance = Zero, except for below scenarios:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Caller is not the owner of Mobile account</li>
	<li>Mobile Account owner is calling from CLI other than mobile account number</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No outstanding Instant loan</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent Action required/relevant in SOP: </strong></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status &gt;&gt; Active, Pending Active, Dormant</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (Normal Account):</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click KYC Info tab &gt;&gt; Check Personal Information</p>

<p><strong>Check Balance:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Account Info Tab &gt;&gt; Check Balance</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details.</p>

<p><strong>Create Account Closure Task in CPS: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; View Customer Info &gt;&gt; View Basic Info &gt;&gt; Select edit button in front of Identity Status &gt;&gt; Pop Up Menu appears &gt;&gt; Select &ldquo;closed&rdquo; in New Identity Status Option &gt;&gt; Enter Service Now ID in Remarks &gt;&gt; Click Submit to complete Task</p>

<p><strong>Check Merchant Portal &ndash; </strong>Merchant portal &gt;&gt; Search MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Status in Merchant Portal &gt;&gt; Below Icon of Close Account Appear &gt;&gt;Click to close the account</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Account Opening - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related with Merchant Account Opening</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Business App as your trusty tool for running your business smoothly, no matter where you are. It&#39;s there to solve your business problems quickly and efficiently.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It&#39;s an account for businesses to receive digital payments.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Businesses use QR codes for merchants to scan and Accept faster payments</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplifies account identification by linking it to the individual CNIC and mobile number</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Registration the merchant Account Mobile number must be register in your CNIC&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can register for a JazzCash Business account by downloading the JazzCash Business App from Play store / App Store or by going to any nearby JazzCash Agent.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To create a JazzCash Business Account, you just need your mobile number, your CNIC, and some basic business info.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account Opening Request will be processed within 2 Working day.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchants won&#39;t be allowed to proceed with the registration request if profane language is used in the business name and will only be able to proceed when the name is updated</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After the application approved enter the temporary MPIN sent to you on your mobile number to create your own 4-digit MPIN.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can open 2 JazzCash account on one CNIC, one customer account and one merchant account but on different MSISDN</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Need to check via merchant CNIC &amp; Same Calling MSISDN that account already exist or not.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant should have a valid business to open Merchant Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Anyone with a valid CNIC who runs a business can have a JazzCash Business Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant accounts are charged on QR/TIL ID payment which is 1%. E.g. (Rs:1000=Rs:10)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant accounts are charged 2% on receiving any transaction on MISIDN (IBFT, B2B) transaction E.g. (Rs:1000=Rs:20)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can Check QR/TIL ID via Business Application from USSD Merchant can only View TIL ID For Generation (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; QR Generation &ndash; SOP)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Can Generate QR /TIL ID from Business Application and from Helpline which received on registered Email Address which Linked with Business Application.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To update the Merchant Account Limit (Refer to Merchant Account Migration SOP)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enhanced limit is those which are higher limit such as KFC, Punjab Cash &amp; Carry</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Can enhanced their limit by submit their request in MMBL.</p>

<p><strong>Resolve Discrepancy</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant open the Account and for Any reason account not opened Incomplete /incorrect detail Like business name, Live Photo, Address error etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Then merchant Resolve the discrepancy from the merchant Application</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Resubmit the request with Correct details</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Account Limit Are Below Table 1.0</p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Deposit Money â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Deposit Money.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are total 4 ways to Deposit Money in JazzCash account.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Deposit Money Through JazzCash Agent</li>
	<li>Deposit Money Through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</li>
	<li>Deposit Money Through Debit Card</li>
	<li>Deposit Money Through Instant Loan</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through JazzCash Agent </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can deposit money through JazzCash Agent</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This deposit Money is also called Cash-In.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simply, provide your mobile number and cash to the Agent; money will be deposited into your Mobile Account instantly</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash-In charges and more information regarding to Cash-In</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; Deposit Money &ndash; Cash in &ndash; SOP</p>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can deposit money through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you have another Bank Account with an ATM Card, you can also visit your own Bank&rsquo;s ATM and transfer funds from your Bank directly to your Mobile Account through Inter-Bank Funds Transfer (IBFT) facility</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please note that this option will only be available at your Bank&rsquo;s own ATM, not on any other Bank&rsquo;s ATM.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simply select funds transfer option, select Mobilink Microfinance Bank (formerly known as Waseela Microfinance Bank) as the receiver bank and enter your mobile number as the receiver account number to transfer money into your Mobile Account instantly.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please note that your Bank may apply a fee for this transaction, please contact your Bank&rsquo;s helpline to find out more about this facility.</p>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Debit Card</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can deposit money through debit card</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash merchant can deposit amount directly in their JazzCash account via Debit Card of any Bank.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Just log in to your JazzCash business account via App, and go to &ldquo;Add money&rdquo;, whereby select the &ldquo;Deposit via Debit Card&rdquo; option</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Card information is saved by default for future use after performing a successful Deposit via</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Debit Card transaction. Once the card information is saved, it will show as linked debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Deposit via Debit Card charges and more information regarding to Deposit Via Debit Card</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; SOP</p>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Instant Loan</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can deposit money through Instant Loan</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Instant Loan is a loan service for JazzCash Mobile Account Merchants to avail short-term loans of small denominations through JazzCash Business App and USSD (*800#).</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For More Information about Instant Loan Refer to (JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; Instant Loan-Sop)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>JazzCash Deposit Money</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Consultation Portal</p>
			</td>

			<p>CPS, Nadra</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

</table>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Loyalty Point â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Loyalty Point.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash merchants will earn loyalty points on completing different challenges.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; They will use these loyalty points once they click on loyalty program and are routed to a separate section for items under &lsquo;Redeem&rsquo; where each item/transaction will have a specific value assigned to it.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; We will be presenting challenges to our merchant, e.g. Month Reward (Challenge name),</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is no limit to the amount of loyalty points you can earn in a day.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchants can use their loyalty points multiple time, until their points don&rsquo;t run out.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can manage loyalty using JazzCash Business app, this appears under the Loyalty Program progress bar on the homepage</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A merchant must not be allowed to redeem any specific redemption use case twice in a 24-hour duration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Loyalty Point use at Mobile Load, SMS bundles, M-Tag Recharge or make donations.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is a total of three loyalty levels</p>

<ul>
	<li>Silver</li>
	<li>Gold</li>
	<li>Platinum</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Each level has a certain point you need to gain before you can unlock the next.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you have gained enough points you can level up.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For loyalty point redeeming you don&rsquo;t need mobile balance availability</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant shall complete a challenge based on the prompt they receive in their phone.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Redemption is 1 loyalty point = Rs 0.01</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Redemption notification prompted with in business app</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash - Merchant â€“ Non-Migrated â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk150245343">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Non-Migrated Merchant Account</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A non-migrated merchant account is a merchant account that was created before a certain date and has not been migrated to a new platform or system.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-Migrated merchant Account are those account which are not completely merchant but their profile is merchant</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant accounts have different features, fees, and requirements than migrated ones</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant account is used via consumer USSD (*786#) and JazzCash Consumer application.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant accounts can avail all the services which are available for JazzCash customer account but there is some difference between them.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant account can&rsquo;t check there QR code and TIL ID from application &amp; USSD.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-<a name="_Hlk150246410">Migrated merchant accounts are charged 2% on receiving any transaction on MISIDN (IBFT, C2C, B2C) transaction E.g. (Rs:1000=Rs:20)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated <a name="_Hlk150246674">merchant accounts are charged on QR/TIL ID payment which is 1%. </a>E.g. (Rs:1000=Rs:10)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant can reset, change, Mpin via JazzCash app and USSD Code *786# (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer - Mpin SOP)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-migrated merchant account transfer money to any bank account or customer account (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer - money transfer- C2C- SOP) &amp; (to JazzCash &ndash; Customer - money transfer- IBFT-SOP)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Non-Migrated Merchant account via USSD, funds are transferred with a delay up to 30 minutes.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Non-Migrated account cancel the transaction via USSD within 30 minutes</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For non-Migrated Account there are no weekly, monthly and yearly counts.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For non-migrated merchant account limit are as per merchant account (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; Account Limit)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If non-migrated account wants to close the account (Refer to Account Closure request)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<p><strong>To Check MPIN Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Merchant MSISDN &gt;&gt; Operations &gt;&gt; Info &gt;&gt; Device &amp; Security Tab &gt;&gt; Credential Type &gt;&gt; PIN &gt;&gt; Status</p>

<p><strong>To Reset MPIN:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Info Tab &gt;&gt; Click Reset MPIN &gt;&gt; Write &ldquo;L3 Verified&rdquo; in Reason Text Box &gt;&gt; Click Submit</p>

<p><strong>To Check MPIN Notification Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; My function &gt;&gt; Reporting &gt;&gt; Notification Log &gt;&gt; Enter Merchant MSISDN with 92 (92xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Check Start -End Date &gt;&gt; Click Search &gt;&gt; Verify Internal Status against MPIN Notification type. (Success, Failed)</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ SMS Marketing â€“ SOP  
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description:</strong></a><a name="_Hlk133588217"></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to SMS Marketing.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A form of marketing that businesses use to send promotions to customers via text messages</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One of the most common types of SMS marketing, promotions involve sending customers special deals or discounts on your product or service.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Making SMS marketing a highly relevant solution for reaching people with mobile devices</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One SMS campaign cannot be repeated in a week</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The repeat button will be enabled for period of one week after the campaign is run.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When repeating a campaign, the user can edit the following:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Campaign Name</li>
	<li>Customers</li>
	<li>SMS template &amp; message</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A campaign will not be sent to the same customers twice within a week.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Following are the main features of the product:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Send SMS in bulk</li>
	<li>SMS campaign dashboard with campaign success metrics &ndash; SMS conversion&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Send SMS to their QR customers&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Built in SMS templates for Discounts, Sales &amp; Promotions and New Product/location in English, Urdu &amp; Roman Urdu&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Option to schedule SMS campaigns for a selected date or repeat previously run campaigns to save time</li>
	<li>No SMS Expiry (SMS package bought will not be expired)</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This is only Available in Business Application.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; User can select one template for campaign at a time.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can buy a SMS while running a campaign if available SMS is low</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Profane language will not be allowed resulting in this campaign when used.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Price per unit is assumed at 0.32 + 16% FED</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SMS bundles pricing is as per below:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>SMS Quantity</p>
			</td>

			</td>

			<p>KMS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Communication Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Deposit Money 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Deposit Money.</li>
	<li>There are total 4 ways to Deposit Money in JazzCash account.
	<ul>
		<li>Deposit Money Through JazzCash Agent</li>
		<li>Deposit Money Through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</li>
		<li>Deposit Money Through Debit Card</li>
		<li>Deposit Money Through Banks App/Online Banking</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through JazzCash Agent </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can deposit money through JazzCash Agent</li>
	<li>This deposit Money is also called Cashin.</li>
	<li>Simply, provide your mobile number and cash to the Agent; money will be deposited into your Mobile Account instantly</li>
	<li>Cashin charges and more information regarding to Cashin</li>
	<li>Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Deposit Money &ndash; Cash in &ndash; SOP</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can deposit money through Bank&rsquo;s ATM</li>
	<li>If you have another Bank Account with an ATM Card, you can also visit your own Bank&rsquo;s ATM and transfer funds from your Bank directly to your Mobile Account through Inter-Bank Funds Transfer (IBFT) facility</li>
	<li>Please note that this option will only be available at your Bank&rsquo;s own ATM, not on any other Bank&rsquo;s ATM.</li>
	<li>Simply select funds transfer option, select Mobilink Microfinance Bank (formerly known as Waseela Microfinance Bank) as the receiver bank and enter your mobile number as the receiver account number to transfer money into your Mobile Account instantly.</li>
	<li>Please note that your Bank may apply a fee for this transaction, please contact your Bank&rsquo;s helpline to find out more about this facility.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Debit Card</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can deposit money through debit card</li>
	<li>JazzCash customer can deposit amount directly in their JazzCash account via Debit Card of any Bank.</li>
	<li>Just log in to your JazzCash account via App, and go to &ldquo;Add money&rdquo;, whereby select the &ldquo;Deposit via Debit Card&rdquo; option</li>
	<li>Card information is saved by default for future use after performing a successful Deposit via</li>
	<li>Debit Card transaction. Once the card information is saved, it will show as linked debit card.</li>
	<li>Deposit via Debit Card charges and more information regarding to Deposit Via Debit Card</li>
	<li>Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Deposit via Debit Card &ndash; SOP</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deposit Money Through Banks App/Online Banking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can deposit money through Banks App/Online Banking</li>
	<li>If you have another Bank Account, you can log on to the Online Banking page or App of your bank and transfer money directly into your JazzCash Account</li>
	<li>This amount will be sent from via 1 Link or Raast.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

ID: 16167

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Incentive 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Jazz Cash free incentives.</li>
	<li>Free incentive is reward which customer receive on balance maintaining in JazzCash account or performing load.</li>
	<li>There are two type of incentive customer can receive.
	<ul>
		<li>JazzCash Daily Balance Maintenance Incentive</li>
		<li>Jazz Cash Mobile Load Incentive</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>There are no charges to check incentives (refer to How to Processes) &nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Jazz Cash Daily Balance Maintenance Incentive:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can get free Minutes and free SMS on maintaining balance in JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>This offer is valid only for prepaid customers.</li>
	<li>The minimum balance to get free Minutes and SMS are 5000</li>
	<li>If customer balance is less than minimum balance than customer will not receive free incentives</li>
	<li>Jazz Cash account balance from 5,000 to 7,499 customer will receive 30 Minutes and 30 SMS</li>
	<li>Jazz Cash account balance from 7,500 to 9,999 customer will receive 60 Minutes and 60 SMS</li>
	<li>Jazz Cash account balance from 10,000 to above customer will receive 100 Minutes and 100 SMS</li>
	<li>If customer maintain balance on 1st June and perform any debit transaction from his account on 1st June then customer will receive free incentives on 3rd June.</li>
	<li>If customer maintain account balance by performing Cash-In in Account then no need to perform any debit transaction if Cash-In is performed on 1st June he will start receiving incentive on 3rd June.</li>
	<li>A customer will stop receiving incentive if has not conducted any product transaction (Cash-In, Cash-Out, UBP, Mobile Load or any charged transaction etc.) in the last 30 days</li>
	<li>When customer receives free Minutes and SMS customer will charged 15 paisa on every call when free minutes are used. These free minutes and SMS cannot used from 6 pm to 9 pm.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If customer has activated a bundle and he is also receiving Jazz Cash free incentives then firstly customer bundle will be used when bundle is exhausted then free incentives can be used.</li>
	<li>Corporate accounts/profiles such as Food Panda riders, will not be eligible for this offer.</li>
	<li>Those customers who are subscribed for Bachat Account or JazzCash Beema are not eligible for this offer.</li>
	<li>If a customer MSISDN is on Jazz network and customer profile in CPS is OMNO and if customer does not receive JazzCash Free Incentive agent will forward complaint for profile rectification Refer to (JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management)</li>
	<li>Offers are subject to suspension on special occasions at company&rsquo;s discretion e.g. Eid&rsquo;s, Special Holiday&rsquo;s etc.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Jazz Cash Mobile Load Incentive:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer can get free incentives on performing load.</li>
	<li>This offer is only for Jazz/Warid prepaid customers</li>
	<li>Customer purchases Rs. 100 or more than Rs. 100 Load via Jazz cash account for Jazz or Warid Mobile number, customer will be incentivized with 1,000 min 1,000 SMS and 100 MBS</li>
	<li>Load can be purchase via USSD *786# or from Jazz Cash App</li>
	<li>&nbsp;In case load is purchase via USSD *786# Incentive will be posted in real time</li>
	<li>In case load is purchase via Jazz Cash App Incentive will be posted after 24 hours</li>
	<li>Incentive posted on 1st June can be used till 2nd June.</li>
	<li>Free minutes cannot be used during 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM</li>
	<li>Free MB&rsquo;s cannot be used during 9:00 PM to 1:00 AM</li>
	<li>Call setup charges of 15 paisa will be consumed to make calls from free minutes.</li>
	<li>Offers are subject to suspension on special occasions at company&rsquo;s discretion e.g. Eid&rsquo;s, Special Holiday&rsquo;s etc.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Jazz Cash Incentive</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, ADA, L2</p>

		</tr>

<p><strong>How &ndash; To Scenarios </strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:510px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Scenario 2.0. Jazz Cash Incentive &ndash; How &ndash; to Processes </strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>How &ndash; to Work Code</strong></p>
			</td>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Incentive in CSRTB: </strong>CSRTB &gt;&gt; Click Contract &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Get Consumption</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Jazz Bundle 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Jazz Bundle.</li>
	<li>Customer can subscribe Jazz Bundle via App and USSD.</li>
	<li>Customer can subscribe SMS Bundle, Minutes Bundle, Data Bundles, Social Bundles, MBB Bundles and All in One Bundles etc.</li>
	<li>Customer can subscribe Hourly, Daily, Weekly and Monthly Bundles from JazzCash.</li>
	<li>If customer perform Jazz Bundle transaction from JazzCash and instead of bundle load is posted, and load is used due to data usage, Jazz Advance or any other extra services then agent will process complaint and customer will be posted with differential amount. Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Jazz Bundle &ndash; Complaint Management</li>
	<li>If customer perform Jazz Bundle transaction from JazzCash and Load is posted and after that customer buys any other bundle by self-service, then no complaint will be processed, and no amount will be posted as compensation to customer or differential amount will be posted if any.</li>
	<li>If customer buys bundle from JazzCash and instead of bundle load is posted and that specific load amount is consumed for sharing sim balance to another sim account. No complaint will be processed, and no amount will be posted as compensation to customer.</li>
	<li>If customer buys a bundle from JazzCash and load is posted and load is available against MSISDN agent will inform customer to activate bundle by self-service.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>RU Handling&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Valid case will be where Jazz load is received instead of bundle.</li>
	<li>RU to validate the cases whether concern is legitimate or not.</li>
	<li>Where customer has consumed available balance to purchase other bundle, jazz load for personal use (share balance on other number) and if balance is available in SIM account, only differential amount will be posted as waiver.</li>
	<li>Complete amount can also be posted if Jazz load has been consumed fully due to VAS services or using internet on standard rates.</li>
	<li>RU to compile complete list of bundle failure cases and will share cases in 4 different intervals (10 AM, 2PM, 6PM &amp; 10 PM).</li>
	<li>DFS VMT to provide the approval against bundle failure cases.</li>
	<li>After receiving an approval from DFS VMT, RU will create ticket in Super office.</li>
	<li>Call backs to be made where required as per RU callback process.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Consumer â€“ Money Transfer â€“ C2C transaction 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer-to-Customer (C2C) Transaction is a money transfer service allowing JazzCash customers to send and receive funds between JazzCash accounts</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can send amount via JazzCash App and USSD. Fund are transferred within 30 minutes via USSD and from app funds are transferred in Realtime.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Daily transaction count is capped at 5 for both sending and receiving, with amount as per your account limits Cancellation is only possible for USSD transactions if not completed within the delay.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><br />
<strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer-to-Customer (C2C) Transaction is a Money Transfer service where a JazzCash customer can transfer funds to another JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>There are two type of C2C transaction
	<ul>
		<li>Incoming C2C Transaction</li>
		<li>Outgoing C2C Transaction</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For C2C via App, funds are transferred in real time.</li>
	<li>Transaction performed via App/IVR cannot be Cancelled.</li>
	<li>For C2C via USSD, funds are transferred with a delay up to 30 minutes.C2C transaction will be completed within delayed time.</li>
	<li>Customer can cancel this outgoing C2C transaction which is performed via USSD where transaction is not completed within delayed time.</li>
	<li>For C2C via IVR, funds are transferred in real time &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Amounts &amp; count limits are set as per customer account level.</li>
	<li>Amounts &amp; count limits are set for both sending and receiving C2C transactions.</li>
	<li>Only Daily sending and receiving count on C2C are applicable which is 5.</li>
	<li>If customer send and receive 5 C2C transaction in a day, he will not be able to receive or send C2C transaction more on a specific day.</li>
	<li>There are no weekly, monthly and yearly counts.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for transaction amount limit for C2C as per account level.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Account Level</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Daily Limit</strong></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Sending/Receiving</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Weekly Limit</strong></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Sending/Receiving</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Monthly Limit</strong></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Sending/Receiving</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Yearly Limit</strong></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Sending/Receiving</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">L0</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">50,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">100,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">200,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">1,200,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">L1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">50,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">100,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">200,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">1,200,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">ADA&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">400,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">100,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">1,000,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">12,000,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>No specific limits are set for L2 standard JazzCash account limit apply on L2 account</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 2.0 for service details.</li>

<p><strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p><strong>To check Account Transaction Amount Limit/Count Limit:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; Click Rule Profile in Customer Info</p>

<p><strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - Transaction Status 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover call handling scenarios where merchant is inquiring status of transaction.</li>
	<li>This process provides general guidelines to handle transaction Status related calls.</li>
	<li>This document has two sections that covers the call handling SOPs for respective transaction type as shown in below table.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Section</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Transaction type</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Product &amp; Services</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Section 1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Outgoing Transactions</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This section will cover processes to check status of all outgoing transactions for following products &amp; services.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Money Transfer (B2C, IBFT, B2B), UBP, Mobile Load, Mobile Bundles, Government Payments, Loan Payments, Fee Payments, voucher/challan payments</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Section 2</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Incoming Transactions</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This section will cover processes to check status of all incoming transactions of following products &amp; services.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Money Transfer (C2B, IBFT, B2B)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Transaction status is a value mentioned in CPS which shows the state of a transaction.</li>
	<li>Agent can view status of a transaction using below navigation.</li>
</ul>

<p>CPS &gt;&gt; transaction Tab &gt;&gt; Search by receipt No. &gt;&gt; Enter transaction ID &gt;&gt; Check transaction Status</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent can also check status of a transaction from merchant transaction history via below navigation.</li>
</ul>

<p>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History &gt;&gt; Enter Search Criteria &gt;&gt; Click Search &gt;&gt; Identify transaction from list &gt;&gt; Check Transaction Status</p>

<ul>
	<li>Each transaction status value has specific meaning which helps agent to identify the outcome of transaction.</li>
	<li>Please refer to table 1.0 below for possible transaction statuses and their description.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:630px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Transaction Status value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complete</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is successfully completed.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Expired</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction was not completed in specific time and got expired. Balance will be returned to the merchant account.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Cancelled</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is not completed by merchant.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Declined</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is not completed by CPS due to specific error/limitation.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pending Authorized</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is in process and will be completed within specific time</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Authorized</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction was not completed within specific time. Merchant balance is reserved. This is an exception and will be catered as per scenario.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>For transactions, where status is either Pending Authorized or Authorized, initial wait time is shared with merchant.</li>
	<li>If transaction is in Authorized state and merchant called after initial wait time, complaint needs to be made to update transaction state. Refer to Transaction with Authorized status complaint handling process</li>
	<li>Please refer to table 2.0 for service details.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 2.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:633px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Merchant Transaction Status &ndash; Information</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0, M1, M2</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; App Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee (weekly)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification (where required)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>All Active JazzCash user</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:624px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Scenario 1. Merchant Transaction Status &ndash; Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Transaction Status &ndash; Complete</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Transaction Status &ndash; Expired</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status (Pending Active, Active, Dormant, Suspended, Frozen)</p>

<p><strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p><strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions&gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Jazz Load 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Merchant Jazz Load</li>
	<li>The service is available for all JazzCash mobile account users</li>
	<li>Merchant can purchase load for any prepaid Jazz number (Including Port-in numbers).</li>
	<li>Jazz Load Minimum Limit for USSD: Rs.49.</li>
	<li>Jazz Load Maximum Limit for USSD: Rs.2000</li>
	<li>Jazz Load Minimum Limit for Business App: Rs.100.</li>
	<li>Jazz Load Maximum Limit for Business App: Rs.5000</li>
	<li>Merchant JazzCash account balance has to be greater than Jazz Load amount + Platform fee.</li>
	<li>If merchant is availing Jazz Advance Service, merchant will not be able to purchase Jazz Load for amount that is less than the Jazz Advance amount taken. Need to perform load more than Jazz advance + Tax.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Jazz Postpaid Bill 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Jazz Postpaid Bill payments.</li>
	<li>Merchant can pay Jazz Postpaid Bill Payment by JazzCash Business App and USSD (*800#).</li>
	<li>Merchant Postpaid Bill transaction can be identified in CPS by transaction type &ldquo;Indigo Bill Payment&rdquo; in transaction details</li>
	<li>Merchant need to enter amount to pay JazzCash Postpaid bill.</li>
	<li>There is no additional service fee for Postpaid bill from JazzCash Business Account.</li>
	<li>The minimum and maximum limits apply.</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via App Minimum Limit:50</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via App Maximum Limit:10,000</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via USSD Minimum Limit:50</li>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid Bill via USSD Maximum Limit:10,000</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>

<p><strong>How &ndash; To Scenarios </strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:538px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

	<li>Verification = L3</li>
	<li>Account status = Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS Only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Paid Invoices in CSRTB: </strong>CSRTB &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN IN Consumer Tab &gt;&gt; Click Paid Invoices &gt;&gt; Check Invoices</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Careem Voucher 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Merchant Careem Voucher.</li>
	<li>Merchant can buy Careem Voucher from JazzCash Business App and via USSD</li>
	<li>These vouchers have fixed denominations (PKR 200, 500, 1000 &amp; 1500).</li>
	<li>After successful purchase, merchant is sent a text message with voucher code.</li>
	<li>Merchant can enter this voucher code in Careem App and redeem the amount i.e. top up Careem pay wallet.</li>
	<li>To use a Careem voucher, you need to have a Careem account and the Careem app on your phone.</li>
	<li>Careem captains will now be able to onboard via a deep link. If the captain is an already existing merchant, the deep link will open the app for them. In case the captain is not an existing merchant, they will be directed towards play store to download the app and onboard.</li>
	<li>There is no specific service fee.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>
