ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - JazzCash Debit Card Status
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover scenarios related to JazzCash Debit Card Status.</li>
	<li>There are total three card status.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:454px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Merchant JazzCash Debit Card Status value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>card in use</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Warm</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>temporary suspension</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hot</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>permanent blocking</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>When a merchant received a Mastercard debit card that specific card is in active state merchant just need to generate ATM Card PIN.</li>
	<li>When a merchant received PayPak debit card that specific card status is first time block agent will activate the card then will generate ATM PIN.</li>
	<li>If merchant lost his card or any other issue with card and wanted to block his ATM Card</li>
	<li>Agent will provide two option to merchant
	<ul>
		<li>Temporary Block (Active to Warm)</li>
		<li>Permanent Block (Active to Hot)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If merchant card is in Warm state merchant can activate his card again</li>
	<li>If merchant card is in Warm state merchant can also Permanent Block that specific card</li>
	<li>If merchant card is in Hot state merchant cannot activate that specific card and will order new card</li>
	<li>If merchant Mastercard debit card is in Warm state he can activate card via USSD/App</li>
	<li>If Visa/Paypak debit card are in warm state card will be activated via helpline.</li>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:567px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Value</strong></p>

		</tr>

			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>

		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0, M1, M2</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

		</tr>

			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check for Visa/Paypak Debit Card: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CNIC in Visa/PayPak Tab &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC/Card Number &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ JazzCash Debit Card PIN 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a name="_Hlk133588217"></a></p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover call scenarios related to JazzCash Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>JazzCash Debit card PIN has 2 Value = No value/Empty, Normal</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0&nbsp; </strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>PIN Status Value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Action Required</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&ldquo;No Value/Empty&rdquo;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>New Debit card received but first time PIN not set</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Inform 1st time PIN set process.</p>

			<p>Generate JazzCash Debit&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Normal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>PIN is set and in active state</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Guide merchant to use current PIN</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case merchant does not remember PIN, need to generate Debit Card PIN</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>When a merchant received a Mastercard debit card that specific card is in active state merchant just need to generate Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>When a merchant received PayPak debit card that specific card status is first time block agent will activate the card then will generate Debit Card PIN.</li>
	<li>If merchant forget his Debit Card PIN agent will generate merchant will not be able to use Debit Card PIN previously used Debit card PIN.</li>
	<li>For generating Debit Card PIN agent will conference the call on IVR 81111</li>
	<li>Inform Merchant to use different PIN other than JazzCash account MPIN</li>
	<li>Merchant will use 4-digit PIN of different Digits</li>
	<li>Merchant will enter 4-digit PIN and will re-enter 4-digit PIN to confirm and PIN will be generated</li>
	<li>Merchant can now use his ATM Card for POS Transaction, E-COM Transaction, Cash withdrawal via ATM</li>
	<li>For cash withdrawal via ATM merchant will use Default option for successful cash withdrawal</li>
	<li>Agent will inform merchant to keep Debit card PIN secret and do not share with anyone</li>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:623px">

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status = Active</li>

</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent:</strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check for Visa/Paypak Debit Card: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CNIC in Visa/PayPak Tab &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC/Card Number &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Account Balance 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover all the information related to Jazz Cash Business Account Balance.</li>
	<li>Merchant can easily check his account balance through USSD and JazzCash Business App.</li>
	<li>Merchant will be charged 0.50 paisa of checking account balance via USSD.</li>
	<li>Merchant will be able to check account balance via App without any charges.</li>
	<li>If merchant calls on helpline and inquire about account balance inform merchant the account balance as per CPS after verification</li>
	<li>For Suspend or Frozen Account agent will not inform any account balance of merchant account.</li>
	<li>Merchant can also check account balance via Account statement. Customer can get their account statement through email via JazzCash App and USSD. Account statement will contain transaction details and available balance. Please refer to (JazzCash &ndash; Merchant - Account statement- SOP).</li>
	<li>Every account level has specific limit to maintain balance. This maximum balance maintenance limit is as per customer account level as shown below.</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Account Level</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Maximum Balance (Rs.)</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

<p><strong>Check Account Balance: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; In Account Info Tab Available balance will be shown</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Balance in Transaction History Option:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Review Transaction &gt;&gt; In Account Info Tab under Account Statement Available balance will be shown</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ID: 16197

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Jazz Bundle 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Jazz Bundle.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Merchant can subscribe Jazz Bundle via App and USSD.</li>
	<li>Merchant can subscribe SMS Bundle, Minutes Bundle, Data Bundles, Social Bundles, MBB Bundles and All in One Bundles etc.</li>
	<li>Merchant can subscribe Hourly, Daily, Weekly and Monthly Bundles from JazzCash Business App.</li>
	<li>If merchant perform Jazz Bundle from JazzCash and instead of bundle load is posted and load is used due to data usage, Jazz Advance or any other extra services then agent will process complaint and merchant will be posted with differential amount which is used previously.</li>
	<li>If merchant perform Jazz Bundle from JazzCash Business and Load is posted after that merchant perform any other bundle by self-service then no complaint will be processed and no amount will be posted as compensation to customer/Merchant.</li>
	<li>If merchant perform bundle from JazzCash Business load is posted and that specific load amount is used for transferring load to any other number in that specific case no complaint will be processed and no amount will be posted as compensation to customer/Merchant.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If merchant perform bundle from JazzCash Business and load is available against MSISDN agent will inform merchant the bundle subscription process and also send relevant bundle ISMS.</li>
	<li>Agent will forward complaint to TL/Supervisor and mention in complaint notes TID and bundle amount.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Supervisor/TL Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>When Team Lead Escalation is registered for TL/Supervisor. TL will check bundle details and forward email for approval of differential amount.</li>
	<li>When successful approval is received TL will forward Complimentary SR and merchant will provided with differential amount</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Cash Out 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Cash-Out</li>
	<li>Merchant can withdraw cash from his Mobile Account from any JazzCash Agent across Pakistan</li>
	<li>Merchant can withdraw amount from retailer, franchise and experience center</li>
	<li>Merchant will provide his JazzCash Business account MSISDN and will also amount which he wants to withdraw.</li>
	<li>JazzCash Agent will enter Merchant MSISDN a popup will appear on JazzCash merchant account holder screen he will enter MPIN to authorize transaction</li>
	<li>OMNO user need to login in JazzCash Business app retailer will enter merchant MSISDN a popup will appear on JazzCash merchant account holder screen he will enter MPIN to authorize transaction</li>
	<li>Merchant cash-out is the Realtime transaction.</li>
	<li>If merchant account is M0 and is unable to Perform Cash-Out agent will inform merchant the account migration process from M0 to M1 (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; Account Migration &ndash; Sop).</li>
	<li>Once Cash-out transaction is completed it cannot be reversed in merchant account</li>
	<li>These Cash-out are deducted from merchant account while performing Cash-out.</li>
	<li>Cash Out Charges, Charge to only Merchant</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ FBR-PRAL 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to FBR-PRAL.</li>
	<li>PRAL (Pakistan Revenue Authority Limited) is a government entity that JazzCash have partnered with to provide the following three services to JazzCash customers, via the app and USSD channel.</li>
	<li>Upon using the service, the information shown on JazzCash App/USSD is provided by FBR directly. If there is any information missing or incorrect, guide user to firstly check the inputs (CNIC, NTN etc.), if the provided input is correct, please guide user to contact FBR to update his/her details. JazzCash is not responsible for authenticity of any information shared by FBR and will display the results as received by FBR.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Active Taxpayer List (ATL):</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This service shall facilitate jazz cash users, throughout the term of this Agreement, to verify whether it has an active filing status with FBR or not. The service accepts CNIC/NTN as an input parameter, and responds with either relevant error message or basic information e.g., name &amp; filing status (Active/In-Active).</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>National Taxpayer Number (NTN)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This service shall facilitate jazz cash users, throughout the term of this Agreement, to verify whether it is registered with FBR or not. The service accepts CNIC/NTN as an input parameter and resulting information includes; registration no., NTN, STRN, Reg Inc No., Tax payer type, Business Name and Principal Activity.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>One Verifier</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This service verifies all kinds of FBR status of refusal or approval to the reference ID which will be input and the response will specify Reference ID, Submission Date, Status and Status date</li>
	<li>In one verifier customer will fill form after customer will enter Task Code. This Task Code will be given by FBR to customer.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Charges:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will be charged Rs 12. Incl FED. This amount is not refundable.</li>
	<li>Platform fee USSD/App to apply</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Traffic Challan
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Traffic Challan</li>
	<li>You can pay your Traffic Police Challan immediately when you&rsquo;re fined using JazzCash Wallet using either JazzCash Business app or USSD Menu.</li>
	<li>A challan is a document issued to a motor vehicle driver on violating the traffic rules and regulations.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;It&#39;s issued by law enforcement when a driver violates rules.</li>
	<li>You can pay the fine or contest the ticket. Instant &amp; safe Challan payment like never before</li>
	<li>You can receive SMS confirmations that replaces the deposit slips</li>
	<li>You Can Pay Two Traffic Challan
	<ul>
		<li>Punjab Traffic Challan</li>
		<li>Islamabad Traffic Police</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>
	<li>L3 verification is must for all scenarios where agent is sharing information related to merchant account</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ TAX Certificate
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Tax Certificate.</li>
	<li>A tax statement of mobile account is a document that shows the amount of tax that has been deducted from your wallet account or merchant account.</li>
	<li>An account tax statement can help you to file your tax return, claim a refund, or adjust your tax liability.</li>
	<li>Merchant can manually enter start date and end date to get a specific duration Tax Certificate.</li>
	<li>Merchant can also get Tax Certificate by pre-define options in Account Tax Statement Tab.</li>
	<li>Merchant can get Tax statement on existing Email.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Donation 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Merchant Donation</li>
	<li>A donation is something which someone gives to a charity or other organization. A donation is a voluntary contribution.</li>
	<li>It involves giving money, goods, or time and Made to support charitable cause</li>
	<li>You can Donate up to Rs:50,000</li>
	<li>From JazzCash Business App you can donate to these Organization</li>
	<li>Edhi Foundation</li>
	<li>Relief Funds</li>
	<li>SKMCH (Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital and Research Centers)</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

	<li>Data to be taken from CPS only</li>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Funds Withdrawal Via ATM 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Cash withdrawal from ATM</li>
	<li>Cash withdrawal electronically converts funds from your bank account, savings, or pension to physical cash in hand.</li>
	<li>Merchant can withdraw amount via ATM from Master Debit Card, PayPak Debit Card, Visa Debit Card.</li>
	<li>Merchant should create ATM Pin for using debit card and for amount withdraw ATM Pin will be not JazzCash Account MPIN</li>
	<li>For successful Cash Withdrawal ATM Card should be linked with JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>Merchant will simply insert Atm Card into ATM Machine</li>
	<li>After inserting card, merchant will enter Card PIN and enter amount or select predefined amount and amount will be withdrawn</li>
	<li>Merchant will have to select Default option on withdrawing amount via ATM.</li>
	<li>Merchant can withdraw maximum Rs.50,000 in one go from ATM</li>
	<li>Minimum withdrawal via ATM is Rs.500 Merchant cannot withdraw amount such as (600, 700 etc.) need to be multiple of Rs.500</li>
	<li>ATM cash withdrawals: Free up to Rs 50,000 in a month, subsequent transactions shall be charged at Rs 25 per transaction</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Account Limits 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover all the information related to JazzCash Account Limits.</li>
	<li>The limit is the specific amount that customer can send or receive in JazzCash account.</li>
	<li>Customer can check only daily and monthly limit via USSD.</li>
	<li>Customer can check daily monthly, and yearly limit via JazzCash App.</li>
	<li>If customer wants to know account limits inform customer, the complete How &ndash; to Process and send Limit Check <strong>ISMS</strong></li>
	<li>If customer still insists and wanted to check it from helpline then agent will inform customer after taking complete verification the account limits and send relevant limits check <strong>ISMS</strong></li>
	<li>There is also specific amount is set that you can keep in your account balance.</li>
	<li>Utility Bill limit in a month is 150,000</li>
	<li>Payoneer daily limit is 150,000 and monthly limits is 500,000</li>
	<li>Cash in per transaction limits is 50,000</li>
	<li>IBFT per transaction limit is 50,000, if customer has higher limit than 50,000 than customer can perform multiple transaction of 50,000</li>
	<li>Raast per transaction limit is 50,000, if customer has higher limit than 50,000 than customer can perform multiple transaction of 50,000</li>
	<li>Customer can send maximum of Rs: 25,000 on a CNIC in one go</li>
	<li>&nbsp;For general account limit refer to Table 1.0</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verification: L3</li>
	<li>Account status: Active</li>
	<li>Data to be taken from cps only</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ Income Protection Plan 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenario related to Income Protection Plan Insurance</li>
	<li>Income Protection Insurance is discontinued from JazzCash</li>
	<li>This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited.</li>
	<li>Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,500</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Lumpsum Benefit (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>600,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accident Medical Expense (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>10,000 per year with sublimit of PKR 5,000 per event</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year, as per premium payment from the date of enrolment</li>
	<li>Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;70 years</li>
	<li>A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Income Protection Plan offered by Chubb Insurance.</li>
	<li>In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</li>
	<li>This is not a life policy and the premiums will not accumulate. The policy does not have any maturity and the benefit will only be paid if accidental death or accidental disability occurs during the coverage period.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Insurance will cover below features
	<ul>
		<li>Financial protection in case of hospitalization</li>
		<li>Visit any facility of your choice. No condition on panel hospitals</li>
		<li>Generous cash benefit amounts</li>
		<li>Simple and easy to understand coverage</li>
		<li>Fast and electronic claims processing</li>
		<li>Accidental medical reimbursement cover</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Conditions in which a claim is not payable
	<ul>
		<li>Pregnancy and related complications</li>
		<li>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</li>
		<li>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</li>
		<li>A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply if after remaining admitted in a hospital for thirty (30) days, a customer is again admitted due to same causes</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Claim Form duly filled/completed</li>
	<li>Copy of Policyholder&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
	<li>Copy of Beneficiary&rsquo;s CNIC (if different)</li>
	<li>Death Certificate from Union Council (in case of Accidental Death claim)</li>
	<li>Copy of Succession Certificate from the Honorable Court which has jurisdiction to entertain the succession application of the Policyholder (in case of Accidental Death claim)</li>
	<li>Evidence of Injury if available (in case of Accident Medical Expense claim)</li>
	<li>Details of treatment provided (e.g. Medical expense invoices) if available (in case of Accident Medical Expense claim)</li>
	<li>Copy of hospital record</li>
	<li>Copy of FIR (in case of police involvement)</li>
	<li>Any other documents to support your claim (If any)</li>
	<li>Claims are settled within seven (7) business days, after completed documents are receive</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenario 1.2: Income Protection Additional Information &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</li>
	<li>Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against Income Protection.</li>
	<li>Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</li>
	<li>Customer want to talk with Income Protection agent.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6265</p>

</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ Sehat Sahulat 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenario related to Sehat Sahulat Insurance</li>
	<li>Sehat Sahulat Insurance is discontinued from JazzCash</li>
	<li>An innovative Health Insurance facility that covers all financial needs to ensure complete health coverage</li>
	<li>This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with MicroEnsure Pakistan.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Yearly Plan</strong></p>

<p>Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges for 1 year (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>999</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization benefit&ndash; Daily (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,500</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Daily (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accidental Coverage &ndash; Annual (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>30,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accidental Death (Rs.) &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>200,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Benefit of up to 30 days, payable for one admission</li>
	<li>No limit on the number of admissions in hospital during coverage period</li>
	<li>Reimbursement for expenses incurred at hospitals/clinics for treatment of injuries due to any accident</li>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrollment and will continue for 1 year</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65; waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply</li>
	<li>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition, are excluded</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Monthly Plan</strong></p>

<p>Monthly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Detail</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges &amp; Benefit</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Monthly Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>83</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization benefit&ndash; Daily (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,500</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Daily (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>3,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accidental Coverage &ndash; Annual (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>30,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accidental Death (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>200,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Benefit of up to 30 days, payable for one admission</li>
	<li>No limit on the number of admissions in hospital during coverage period</li>
	<li>Reimbursement for expenses incurred at hospitals/clinics for treatment of injuries due to any accident</li>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 month from the date of enrolment</li>
	<li>On each monthly due date or within applicable grace period, the applicable premium will be automatically collected from customer&rsquo;s JazzCash mobile account and cover will renew for next one month</li>
	<li>A grace period of 10 days will be allowed for collection of each renewal monthly premium. Cover will be effective during grace period and in case of any claim, outstanding premium will be collected from payable claim amount</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65; waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply</li>
	<li>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition, are excluded</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Insurance will cover below features</li>
	<li>Financial protection in case of hospitalization</li>
	<li>Visit any facility of your choice. No condition on panel hospitals</li>
	<li>Generous cash benefit amounts</li>
	<li>Simple and easy to understand coverage</li>
	<li>Fast and electronic claims processing</li>
	<li>Accidental medical reimbursement cover</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Conditions in which a claim is not payable</li>
	<li>Pregnancy and related complications</li>
	<li>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</li>
	<li>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</li>
	<li>A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply if after remaining admitted in a hospital for thirty (30) days, a customer is again admitted due to same causes</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Claim process is very easy. If a customer is admitted in hospital they should follow following instructions:</li>
	<li>Submit claim from JazzCash App or inform about the hospitalization on claims helpline no. 021-33129293. A person accompanying the customer can inform the helpline also.</li>
	<li>Notify the claims helpline when the customer is discharged. Our representative will help the customer in making the claim. It is important to inform within fifteen (15) days of discharge from the hospital</li>
	<li>We request customer to provide following documents at the time of claim:
	<ul>
		<li>Treatment record of hospital which includes dates of admission and discharge, medical diagnosis and treatment</li>
		<li>A copy of customer&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
		<li>A certificate issued by the doctor</li>
		<li>Claim form with signature</li>
		<li>Police and medico legal reports are required in case of hospitalization due to accident, violence and attempted suicide</li>
		<li>In case of accident, receipts of treatment expenses and prescriptions issued by doctor and the hospital.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Claims are settled within five (5) working days (days on which banks are open), after complete documents are received. Claim payments are made via JazzCash mobile wallet or cheque. Submission of documents within fifteen (15) days of discharge from hospital is required for claim payment.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Outbound Call:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will receive outbound call from 051-7080507</li>
	<li>Outbound agent will inform details about Term Takaful</li>
	<li>If customer agrees to buy policy, agent will initiate request in system.</li>
	<li>Customer will receive flash message on his/her mobile with details of policy name &amp; amount</li>
	<li>Customer will enter MPIN to authorize transaction.</li>
	<li>Policy will be subscribed successfully. Customer will get confirmation notification</li>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:624px">
	<tbody>

			</td>

			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; App Platform fee</p>

		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>999 Rs/year</p>

			<p>83 Rs/monthly</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Enrolment Age</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>18&mdash; 65 years</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Age</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>18&mdash; 65 years</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Validity</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1 Year (Starts from the day of subscription)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Look Free Period</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>14 days (Starts from the day of subscription)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Elimination Period</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>14 days (Starts from the day of subscription)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation/Exclusion from Policy</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which a complication of a pre-existing condition is, are excluded.</p>

			<p>Conditions in which a claim is not payable</p>

			<p>Pregnancy and related complications</p>

			<p>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</p>

			<p>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</p>

			<p>A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply if after remaining admitted in a hospital for thirty (30) days, a customer is again admitted due to same causes</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Refer to Sehat Sahulat Insurance SOP Process overview</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenario related to Beema Insurance</li>
	<li>Beema Insurance is discontinued from JazzCash</li>
	<li>This policy is being offered by JazzCash in partnership with MicroEnsure.</li>
	<li>Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>300</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Loss of Life (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>100,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accident Medical Expense (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>100,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrollment</li>
	<li>Enrolment Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 64 years</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Insurance will cover below features
	<ul>
		<li>Simple and easy to understand coverage</li>
		<li>Fast electronic claims processing</li>
		<li>Generous cash benefit</li>
		<li>Cost effective</li>
		<li>Annually renewable</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Suicide, death due to criminal and illegal act, death in first thirty (30) days of enrolment due to a pre-existing disease or accident</li>
	<li>No additional benefit of accidental death will be paid in case of murder or travel to war inflicted areas</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer&rsquo;s CNIC and Death Certificate</li>
	<li>Hospital record if death occurred in a hospital</li>
	<li>Claimant&rsquo;s statement and CNIC</li>
	<li>Police &amp; medico legal reports will be required in case of death due to accident and/or violence</li>
	<li>Claims are settled within five (5) business days, after complete documents are received.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Beema Insurance Additional Information &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</li>
	<li>Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against Beema Insurance.</li>
	<li>Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</li>
	<li>Customer want to talk with Beema Insurance agent.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6465</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ Family Tahafuz Premium 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenario related to Family Tahafuz Premium Insurance</li>
	<li>Family Tahafuz Premium Insurance is discontinued by JazzCash</li>
	<li>This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited.</li>
	<li>Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:479px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>

			<p>Monthly Charges</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>4,499 (Annual)</p>

			<p>370 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; Customer &amp; Spouse (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>5,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Customer &amp; Spouse (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>10,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; Children (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500 (Annual)</p>

			<p>2,500 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Children (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>5,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65 years for customer and his or her spouse. Coverage will terminate on 65th birthday</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</li>
	<li>To be eligible for coverage, children should be single and economically dependent on parents</li>
	<li>Waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply for hospitalization due to illness. Coverage for accidents will start immediately</li>
	<li>A waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply between consecutive hospitalizations</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Insurance will cover below features
	<ul>
		<li>Financial protection in case of hospitalization</li>
		<li>Coverage for customer and his family (spouse and children)</li>
		<li>Visit any facility of your choice. No condition of visiting only panel hospitals</li>
		<li>Generous cash benefit amounts</li>
		<li>Simple and easy to understand coverage</li>
		<li>Fast and electronic claims processing</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;Conditions in which a claim is not payable
	<ul>
		<li>Pregnancy and related complications</li>
		<li>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition</li>
		<li>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</li>
		<li>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</li>
		<li>Cosmetic and dental treatment</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>Claim process is very easy. If a customer is admitted in hospital they should follow following instructions:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Submit claim from JazzCash App or inform about the hospitalization on claims helpline no. 021-33129293. A person accompanying the customer can inform the helpline also.</li>
	<li>Notify the claims helpline when the customer is discharged. Our representative will help the customer in making the claim. It is important to inform within fifteen (15) days of discharge from the hospital</li>
	<li>We request customer to provide following documents at the time of claim
	<ul>
		<li>Treatment record of hospital which includes dates of admission and discharge, medical diagnosis and treatment</li>
		<li>A copy of customer&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
		<li>&nbsp;A certificate issued by the doctor</li>
		<li>Claim form with signature</li>
		<li>&nbsp;Police and medico legal reports are required in case of hospitalization due to accident, violence and attempted suicide</li>
		<li>&nbsp;In case of accident, receipts of treatment expenses and prescriptions issued by doctor and the hospital</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Claims are settled within five (5) working days (days on which banks are open) after complete documents are received. Claim payments are made via JazzCash mobile wallet or cheque. Submission of documents within fifteen (15) days of discharge from hospital is required for claim payment.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Family Tahafuz Premium Insurance Additional Information &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</li>
	<li>Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against Family Tahafuz Premium Insurance.</li>
	<li>Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</li>
	<li>Customer want to talk with Family Tahafuz Premium Insurance agent.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6465</p>

<ul>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

			<p>KMS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Communication Tab <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> USSD Platform fee</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ Family Tahafuz
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenario related to Family Tahafuz plane Insurance</li>
	<li>Family Tahafuz Insurance is discontinued from JazzCash</li>
	<li>This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited.</li>
	<li>Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:488px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,999 (Annual)</p>

			<p>165 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; Customer &amp; Spouse (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>1,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Customer &amp; Spouse (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>2,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>2,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; Children (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500 (Annual)</p>

			<p>500 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Hospitalization benefit &ndash; ICU &ndash; Children (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>1,000 (Annual)</p>

			<p>1,000 (Monthly)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 18 &ndash; 65 years for customer and his or her spouse. Coverage will terminate on 65th birthday</li>
	<li>Age Limit: 1 &ndash; 22 years for children of subscribed customer. Coverage will terminate on 22nd birthday</li>
	<li>To be eligible for coverage, children should be single and economically dependent on parents</li>
	<li>Waiting period of 15 days upon enrolment will apply for hospitalization due to illness. Coverage for accidents will start immediately</li>
	<li>waiting period of thirty (30) days will apply between consecutive hospitalizations</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>This Insurance will cover below features
	<ul>
		<li>Financial protection in case of hospitalization</li>
		<li>Coverage for customer and his family (spouse and children)</li>
		<li>Visit any facility of your choice. No condition on panel hospitals</li>
		<li>Generous cash benefit amounts</li>
		<li>Simple and easy to understand coverage</li>
		<li>Fast and digital claims processing</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Conditions in which a claim is not payable
	<ul>
		<li>Pregnancy and related complications</li>
		<li>Treatment of pre-existing condition and any disease, illness, medical condition or injury which is a complication of a pre-existing condition</li>
		<li>Attempted suicide, self-inflicted injury whether intentional or unintentional</li>
		<li>Consumption of narcotics, alcohol and poison</li>
		<li>Cosmetic and dental treatment</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Claim process is very easy. If a customer is admitted in hospital they should follow following instructions:</li>
	<li>Submit claim from JazzCash App or inform about the hospitalization on claims helpline no. 051 &ndash; 8 466 466. A person accompanying the customer can inform the helpline also.</li>
	<li>Notify the claims helpline when the customer is discharged. Our representative will help the customer in making the claim. It is important to inform within fifteen (15) days of discharge from the hospital</li>
	<li>We request customer to provide following documents at the time of claim:
	<ul>
		<li>Treatment record of hospital which includes dates of admission and discharge, medical diagnosis and treatment</li>
		<li>A copy of customer&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
		<li>A certificate issued by the doctor</li>
		<li>Claim form with signature</li>
		<li>Police and medico legal reports are required in case of hospitalization due to accident, violence and attempted suicide</li>
		<li>In case of accident, receipts of treatment expenses and prescriptions issued by doctor and the hospital</li>
		<li>Claims are settled within five (5) working days (days on which banks are open) after complete documents are received. Claim payments are made via JazzCash mobile wallet or cheque. Submission of documents within fifteen (15) days of discharge from hospital is required for claim payment</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Family Tahafuz Insurance Additional Information &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</li>
	<li>Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against Family Tahafuz Insurance.</li>
	<li>Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</li>
	<li>Customer want to talk with Family Tahafuz Insurance agent.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6465</p>

<ul>
	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Customer Donation</li>
	<li>A donation is something which someone gives to a charity or other organization.</li>
	<li>A donation is a voluntary contribution.</li>
	<li>It involves giving money, goods, or time and Made to support charitable cause</li>
	<li>You can Donate up to Rs: 50,000</li>
	<li>If customer perform transaction for donation and transaction status is authorized inform customer that transaction will be completed or reversed in 24 Hours</li>
	<li>From JazzCash App you can donate to these Organization
	<ul>
		<li>KBL</li>
		<li>KASHF</li>
		<li>Kashf Foundation Nowshera</li>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h1>&nbsp;</h1>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Traffic Challan</li>
	<li>You can pay your Traffic Police Challan immediately when you&rsquo;re fined using JazzCash Account</li>
	<li>You can pay traffic challan via USSD and App</li>
	<li>A challan is a document issued to a motor vehicle driver on violating the traffic rules and regulations.</li>
	<li>You Can Pay Two Traffic Challan
	<ul>
		<li>Punjab Traffic Challan</li>
		<li>Islamabad Traffic Police</li>
		<li>Karachi Traffic Police (available only on USSD)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Complaint Call Handling â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process covers handlings of complaint related calls for cases mentioned in Table 1.0.</p>

<p>&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:89%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Call Handling Cases</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Not Lodged &ndash; Pre-requisite not complied</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer complaint but unable to comply pre-requisite.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Status Resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer wants to know the status of already lodged complaint. Complaint is in resolved state.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Pending - TAT Not lapsed</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in Pending state and resolution time is not over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Pending - TAT Lapsed</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in pending state and complaint resolution time is over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Resolved &ndash; Customer Not satisfied</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in resolved state but resolution is not as per customer satisfaction.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Known Issue/Outage</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer is unable to use JazzCash service due to service outage or a known issue with the service.&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; L3 verification is must for cases where agent is sharing information related to customer account or transaction history.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to respective Product/Service Complaint Handling document for relevant work codes.</p>

	<tbody>
		<tr>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Education Payment â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Education Payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Education Payment refer to the money paid for educational expenses including school fee, university fee, college fee, educational institute etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can pay school/university/ board fee via JazzCash account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Can pay Below Mention Education Fee through JazzCash</p>

<p><strong>School </strong></p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; The Educators</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; The Cresecent Educational Trust</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; The Academy</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; SBTE (Sindh Board of Technical Education)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Leadership school</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Kuickpay</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; KCPS</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Karachi Public School</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Jadeed Dastgir School</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Head Start School</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Hamdard Public School</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Green Crecent Trust</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; APS Multan</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Aitchison Model School</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; AIMSS</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; The Aspire Group of Colleges</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Paypro</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Kuickpay</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Government Payment â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Government Payment.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Taxes are mandatory financial contributions imposed by governments on individuals, businesses, or other entities to fund public services and government operations.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These contributions are usually based on income, property, goods, services, or other financial transactions</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The specific types and rates of taxes vary from one country to another and are governed by tax laws and regulations.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer pay Below Mention Tax of Government through <strong>JazzCash App</strong></p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Punjab Revenue Authority (PRA)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; NIS</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Islamabad Vehicle Token Tax</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Govt. of Sindh- Vehicle Token Tax</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP- Government of Punjab</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP-Punjab Land Record</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP- Industries</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP-Excise &amp; Taxation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP-Board of Revenue</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; GOP-E-Abiana</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Federal Board of Revenue (FBR)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Evacuee Trust Property Board</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Covid Vaccination Payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer pay Below Mention Tax of Government through <strong>JazzCash USSD</strong></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Loyalty Point â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Customer Loyalty Point.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; We will be giving out loyalty points on every QR transaction payment</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; We will be presenting challenges to our customers, e.g. Monday Reward (Challenge name), complete 4 transactions via QR Payment and get 200 loyalty points</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Upon completing multiple rewards, the customer earns points which he/she can redeem in the &lsquo;Redeem tab&rsquo; by buying Mobile prepaid, mobile postpaid bill payments SMS bundles, M-Tag Recharge, Careem vouchers, DARAZ wallet top up and can make donations.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers cannot redeem their loyalty points for the same load, bundle, or donation within a 24-hour period. If they attempt to do so, they will be prompted to try again after 24 hours.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There is a total of three loyalty levels; Silver, Gold and Platinum. Each level has a certain number of points you need to gain before you can unlock the next. Once you have gained enough points you can level up.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Redemption 1 loyalty point = Rs.0.02</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A 13-month expiry time has implemented on Loyalty points earned by customer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All points that users have before this Loyalty expiry is implemented will have unlimited expiry, meaning they will not expire until all of them are utilized.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Expiry is only applicable on points that are received after the launch this loyalty expiry feature.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Point mechanism is yearly so any points accumulated in an entire month will have expiry of 13 months. Example: Points earned in June, 2023 will expire on 1 July 2024 and so on for each month.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on QR transactions:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In this feature, as part of our loyalty program, we will allow our customers to make full use of redeeming their loyalty points at any QR payment. This can be done regardless of whatever kind of QR payment is to be made by the customer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once the customer has gained 100 points and above, then the toggle option for redemption with loyalty points can start to get utilized on whichever payment they want to redeem on.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If they have enough loyalty points, they can utilize them all to pay for the item they are purchasing or making payment for. First all available loyalty points can be redeemed, then your wallet amount gets deducted.&nbsp; The amount discounted will not show on the customer review screen but will be seen in the SMS that the customer received upon this redemption.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on Pre-paid &amp; Post-Paid Load (Jazz and OMNO):</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers now have the option to redeem their loyalty points for prepaid and postpaid load on Jazz and OMNO networks. Each load amount is associated with a specific number of loyalty points that can only be redeemed if the customer has enough points available.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Incase customer complaint about loyalty points are redeemed but load is not posted, please follow standard jazz/OMNO Load complaint process.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on Pre-paid Bundles (Jazz and OMNO):</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers now have the option to redeem their loyalty points for prepaid bundles on Jazz and OMNO networks. Each bundle is associated with a specific number of loyalty points that can only be redeemed if the customer has enough points available.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Incase customer complaint about loyalty points are redeemed but bundle is not posted, please follow standard OMNO bundle complaint process.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on Daraz Wallet:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; We have added the facility of redemption at Daraz wallet where customers can click on the redemption card and enter the number linked to their Daraz wallet. An amount that is preset for this will automatically be sent to your Daraz wallet and you can utilize it for your next purchase.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on Careem Vouchers:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers use Careem in their daily commute and what better way to allow them utility for use than giving them a voucher code. Once you click on the redemption card and enter the number against your Careem wallet and you get a successful redemption receipt, a voucher code will be present on it. You will then use that voucher code for when you travel.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on Donations:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers now have the option to redeem their loyalty points for making donations to charitable institutions. Each transaction amount is associated with a specific number of loyalty points that can only be redeemed if the customer has enough points available.</p>

<p><strong>Redemption on M-Tag Recharge:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers now have the option to redeem their loyalty points for recharging M-Tag account. Each transaction amount is associated with a specific number of loyalty points that can only be redeemed if the customer has enough points available.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Customer Loyalty Point</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>App, USSD</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2</p>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Refer to process overview</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ OMNO Load/Bundle/ Postpaid Bill â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Omno load, bundle and postpaid bill. </a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Other network includes Zong, Telenor &amp; Ufone.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk145768613">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The main difference between mobile load and bundle is that mobile load allows you to pay for what you use, while bundle gives you a fixed amount of services for a fixed price </a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Customer perform OMNO bundle or load and facing third-party error guide wait for 2 hours it is temporary error</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Also inform Customer if advance loan service is taken on beneficiary number first clear advance loan then perform bundle or load.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Customer perform OMNO load/bundle on wrong number/network or more than the amount then there no reversal is possible</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Zong load sending Minimum and Maximum limit:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Minimum Prepaid Load: Rs. 80</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Maximum Prepaid Load: Rs:20,000</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Telenor load sending Minimum and Maximum limit:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Minimum Prepaid Load: Rs 100</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Maximum Prepaid Load: Rs:5000</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ufone load sending Minimum and Maximum limit:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Minimum Prepaid Load: Rs :90</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Maximum Prepaid Load: RS :5000</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A postpaid bill is a bill that you receive after using a service, such as a mobile phone plan, for a certain period of time</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You pay the bill after you have used the service, not before</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Below postpaid limit is same for Both USSD/App</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ MasterCard Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related MasterCard Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MasterCard allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy funds management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Mastercard debit card is auto enabled for all online/E-commerce payments within Pakistan (domestic platforms).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For online transaction customer need to activate online transaction Refer to How to process 2.3.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Set your desired transaction limits for JazzCash Mastercard debit card using JazzCash mobile application.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Mastercard debit card is auto activated for payments at retail merchants/all POS machines&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can Order card from:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Website (www.jazzcash.com.pk)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Mobile App</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; USSD &ndash; dial *786#</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mastercard debit card will be received within 15 Working days on provided address and card fee will be deducted from your JazzCash Mobile Account upon confirmation of your order. You do not have to pay the fee in cash.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If your card returned to the Courier service, call the helpline and provide details for the card to be re-dispatched to you again. (Refer to JazzCash-Customer-Mastercard-complaint)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you do not call the helpline for card delivery, your card will be discarded after 60 days from date of 1st return and fee will not be refunded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Master Debit Card is rejected, your card fee will be refunded in your Mobile Account within 2 working days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case Customer calls and ask about ATM card reissuance charges we need to guide the customer master debit card is not free of cost</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Visit MMBL branch and order an instant card free of charge</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Master Card Order Fees is Rs:799</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Master Card Annual Charges is Rs:99(Annual fee will be charges to those Customers which orders MasterCard&nbsp;after 1st April in 2024)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When you Order from MMBL you will Provide CNIC and JazzCash Account Number and visit along with your JazzCash account number For Confirmation you will enter the MPIN</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Customer &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can with draw amount from all ATM while withdrawing the amount your ATM PIN also generated and Use the Default option to use</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals Charges are</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

			</td>
		</tr>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer - PayPak Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Customer PayPak Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy fund management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak debit card does not support online purchases</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can Order card from:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Website (www.jazzcash.com.pk)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Mobile App</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; USSD &ndash; dial *786#</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card will be received within 15 Working days on provided address and card fee will be deducted from your JazzCash Mobile Account upon confirmation of your order. You do not have to pay the fee in cash.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If your card returned to the Courier service call the helpline and provide details for the card to be re-dispatched to you again. (Refer to JazzCash- Customer -PayPak complaint)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you do not call the helpline for card delivery, your card will be discarded after 60 days from date of 1st return and fee will not be refunded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If PayPak Debit Card rejected Your card fee will be refunded in your Mobile Account within 2 working days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card Order Fees is Rs:999</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card Annual Charges is Rs:299</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Customer &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can withdraw funds via ATM using JazzCash debit card by using default option while withdrawing</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals Charges are:</p>
