ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Railway Payment â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related to Railway Payment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Now you can purchase Pakistan Railways tickets with an ease using Jazzcash as payment medium. All you need to do is visit <a href="https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/SeatAvailability.aspx">https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/SeatAvailability.aspx</a> or download Pakistan Railways app, select your train and pay through JazzCash using your:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Mobile Account</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Debit/Credit cards</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Or by visiting nearest JazzCash retailer using voucher number</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can book tickets of any train 12 hours before the departure of the train.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will visit railways website <a href="https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/">https://www.pakrail.gov.pk/</a> or Pakistan railways app for booking of tickets</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can perform Railway Payment from retailer or consumer JazzCash Account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From retailer customer need to generate voucher to perform payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash account customer can perform payment via voucher or directly from JazzCash account.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer payment is updated at Pakistan Railway end and customer want to cancel respective ticket. Customer will proceed cancellation request at Pakistan Railway and amount will be reversed within 1 working day</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Also guide that reversal will be received in JazzCash account if ticket was booked from the same number and same CNIC of JazzCash user.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case railway ticket was booked for another CNIC then amount will be reversed on the traveler CNIC</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case railway ticket was booked from retailer/JazzCash Account against voucher and customer then cancelled the ticket then amount will be reversed on the traveler CNIC</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case customer booked railway ticket and used debit/credit card as a payment option, complaint for dispute will be locked from that specific bank.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer cancelled his ticket and amount does not refund then customer will call on helpline with cancellation id this id will be received from Pakistan railway end</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to Table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Pakistan Railway</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Possible Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App, Railways Website</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; App Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p><strong>To check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Amount against Receiver CNIC</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; My Functions &gt;&gt; Operations &gt;&gt; G2P/P2P Payment Management &gt;&gt; search Receiver CNIC</p>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 17283

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Ready Cash by Alfalah â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Ready Cash by Alfalah</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ready Cash by Alfalah is an instant loan service for JazzCash Mobile Account customers to avail short-term loans of small denominations through JazzCash App or USSD.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can only get one loan of up to Rs 30,000 at a time. Loan amount depends on loan eligibility.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will have to pay weekly charges of Ready Cash loan facility, over and above the loan amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account closure and change of MSISDN cannot be performed on customer account if there is any outstanding Ready Cash by Alfalah loan amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; NOC is only shown to the customers who have taken the Ready Cash by Alfalah loan and have paid successfully. This shall Not be shown in case customer is not eligible for the service or has not taken the loan before.&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Ready Cash by Alfalah Loan Eligibility</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Service is available for eligible customer only.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Eligibility is auto set by Backend system accordingly to customer profile and JazzCash services usage.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Eligibility cannot be changed/altered manually.</p>

<p><strong>Ready Cash by Alfalah Loan Payment:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will have to pay weekly fee on the loan amount with in due date as agreed in T&amp;C</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can repay full as well as partial loan amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once the due date is crossed, Jazz Cash will have the authority to deduct the total outstanding amount from customer&rsquo;s wallet.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer still does not repay the Ready Cash Alfalah loan in full, they will be blacklisted from availing Ready Cash Alfalah service in future and will also be reported as a defaulter to the State Bank of Pakistan.</p>

<p><strong>Alfalah Loan Fee Structure:</strong></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ TAX Certificate â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Tax Certificate.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A JazzCash tax statement of mobile account is a document that shows the amount of tax that has been deducted from your JazzCash Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; An account tax statement can help you to file your tax return, claim a refund, or adjust your tax liability.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can manually enter start date and end date to get a specific duration Tax Certificate.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can also get Tax Certificate by pre-define options in Account Tax Statement Tab.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can get Tax statement on existing Email.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can get Tax statement of one year maximum</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will inform customer that Tax certificate will only be available to those customers where with holding tax is deducted from customer account</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer inform that withholding tax is deducted from his JazzCash Account then Agent will inform customer the JazzCash App flow for getting Tax Certificate.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:#333333">JazzCash App &gt;&gt; Click My Account &gt;&gt; Click Tax Certificate &gt;&gt; Click 2023 &ndash; 2024 &gt;&gt; Click Generate Certificate</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">If the customer reports they are unable to obtain their Tax Certificate, the agent will inform customer that they are only eligible for a Tax Certificate if Withholding Tax has been deducted from their account</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">below are the two points in which with holding tax is deducted</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:#333333">JazzCash Saving Plan Users with Profit:</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tax certification will be available for users who have used or are currently using the JazzCash Saving Plan and have received profit from it.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:#333333">Withdrawals Over 50K:</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tax certification will be available for users who had a withdrawal amount greater than 50,000 PKR in a day.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:black">If the customer claims that Withholding Tax was deducted from their account, the agent will verify by checking the transaction history in CPS, applying a 1-year filter. The Withholding Tax details can be found under the <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Details</span></strong> tab in CPS (e.g., &quot;WHT on Saving Plan&quot;)</span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">. If any Withholding Tax is deducted from customer account agent will process tax certificate request</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Visa Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Customer Visa Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Visa Debit Card allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy fund management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Visa debit card is not auto enabled for all online/E-commerce payments within Pakistan (domestic platforms).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer call over helpline and will activate online session for online using</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can&rsquo;t Order Visa Debit card</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Customer &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can with draw amount from all ATM while withdrawing the amount your ATM PIN also generated and Use the Default option to use</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals charges are:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Amount</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges</p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>

		</tr>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong>Pre-requisite</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; L3 verification is must for all scenarios where agent is sharing information related to Customer account</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Visa Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ USSD (*786#) Issues â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related to USSD (*786#).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz user can transfer use USSD string to transfer amount, load, bundle, bill payments etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can also create his account via USSD.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases, where customer calls over helpline 4444 and complaints that he/she is unable to create new account via USSD *786# and is receiving an error, &ldquo;CNIC is blacklisted&rdquo;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In such cases, agent will ask customer to coordinate with nearest MMBL branch.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where customer is unable to use USSD menu agent will ask the customer about specific error</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; While creating JazzCash account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No complaint will be locked if customer received below errors ask customer to try again as this error occurs when USSD is not responded by customer</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Invalid MMI code</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Time out</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Incorrect issuance date of CNIC mentioned</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Menu of <strong>*786#</strong> is</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *786# &gt;&gt; 1 For Send Money &gt;&gt; 2 For Pay Bills &gt;&gt; 3 for Load &amp; Bundle &gt;&gt; 4 for Ready Cash &gt;&gt; 5 for Payments &gt;&gt; 6 for My Account &gt;&gt; 7 for Saving &gt;&gt; 8 for Rs Jazz Load &gt;&gt; 9 for Contact Us &gt;&gt; 10 for Till Payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to Table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer Account â€“ Account Opening - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related with Customer Account Opening</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Mobile Account is an actual bank account that is tagged with your mobile number and can be operated through your phone</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any customer whether postpaid or prepaid with a valid NADRA CNIC can sign up for a JazzCash Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The following services are being offered through JazzCash Account:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Money transfer</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Deposit/ Withdraw money</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bill Payment/ Mobile Load</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Utility bill payment</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Freelance payment</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; International Remittance</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Online payments/Ticket payments/Education fee payment/Internet bill payment/Government Challan payment/ Loan repayment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplifies account identification by linking it to the individual CNIC and mobile number</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can register for a JazzCash account by downloading the JazzCash App from Play store / App Store or USSD (786#) or by going to any nearby JazzCash Agent.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To create a JazzCash Account, you just need your mobile number, your CNIC</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account Opening Request will be processed within 24 hours from App</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account Opening Request from USSD &amp; JazzCash Agent real time Account Open</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After the application approved enter the temporary MPIN sent to you on your mobile number to create your own 4-digit MPIN.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can open 2 JazzCash account on one CNIC, one customer account and one Business account on different MSISDN</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers can create L1 account from in App BVS option</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No complaint will be locked if customer receives below errors and ask customer to try again as this error occurs when USSD is not responded by customer</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Invalid MMI code</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Time out</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Incorrect issuance date of CNIC mentioned</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where customer is unable to create JazzCash account via App and error occurs that <strong>CNIC is Blacklisted</strong> validate account existence in CPS and inform customer to visit MMBL</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To update the Customer Account Limit (Refer to Customer Account Migration SOP)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Account Limit Are Below Table 1.0</p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>JazzCash Next Gen Account (minor Account):</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Guardian can open the next gen Account through JazzCash App or Retailer</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1 guardian can open 2 next gen account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Transaction limits are same as L1 account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For next gent Account registration following document require</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Guardian&rsquo;s CNIC</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;JazzCash Account Number,</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Minor&rsquo;s CNIC/B-Form number</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; date of issuance.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Guardian Biometric Verification</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Age Limit of Minor account are 12 to 17 years 10 months.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Minor Account Limit are below</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Dormant To Active â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related to Customer Account Dormant</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer want to activate his dormant account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash account is a normal wallet account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash account will be marked Dormant if account is not used in previous 180 Days.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When a JazzCash account is marked dormant customer will not be able to use account for transferring fund. However, funds can be received but not sent from dormant account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For proper account usage, customer needs to activate account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash account can be activated from BVS enabled retailers, Franchise and Experience Centre.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dormant account will be activated in real time from retailer, franchise and experience Centre through BVS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account activation via BVS customer need to visit retailer, franchise and experience Centre along with sim on which account is present</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Inform customer the relevant retailers, Franchise and experience centre location check process and also send relevant ISMS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can also activate account from JazzCash App through unikrew. Refer to JazzCash Unikrew Process.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash app dormant account will take 5 minutes to activate.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Guide customer self process for dormant to active, in case customer insists, proceed with service request in Service Now. (System Navigation)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer requires MPIN Reset inform customer, the how to reset MPIN process along with sending relevant isms.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After activating account successfully customer can reset his MPIN via self process.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer account is dormant and CNIC is expired, then agent will ask customer whether he updated his CNIC or not if customer updated CNIC expiry agent will inform customer the complete how to process&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will validate NADRA portal to confirm CNIC Updation before taking request from helpline for activation</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to Table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk135161069"><strong>System Navigation for Agent Action required/relevant in SOP: </strong></a></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Balance:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Account Info Tab &gt;&gt; Check Balance</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details.</p>

<p><strong>Create Dormant to Active Task in CPS - </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Create Task &gt;&gt; Account closure task &gt;&gt; enter Service Now Request ID in reason &gt;&gt; Pop Up Menu appears. Select &ldquo;Active&rdquo; &gt;&gt; Submit Task</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ WebDoc (Women Health) â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Dost Muhafiz Women Health Insurance</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with WebDoc Pakistan Limited.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Detail</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges &amp; Benefit</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 2,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization &ndash; Maximum Annual Limit</p>

			<p>Co-payment (in case of Treatment at a Non-Panel Hospital</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 100,000</p>

			<p>100% re-imbursement</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ambulance Maximum</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Room and board General ward</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>up to Rs. 5,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Accidental Emergencies</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 120,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Maternity</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 30,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>In case of accident limit</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 10,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pre-Existing Conditions (PEC)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Not covered</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>MRI, CT scan, Endoscopy,</p>

			<p>Angiography, Thallium Scan</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>(during hospitalization only)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz Cash Women wallet users only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit:18-65 years</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit for Maternity:18-45 years</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Risk Protection: The product offers a financial safety net to customers against the costs of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Call A DOC: A service that provides free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers&rsquo; family members can also call for telephonic consultation.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fluent Process: The paperless enrollment process allows for enrollment in just a few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrollment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Financial protection in case of hospitalization</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage for customer and Free online consultation for entire family</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No condition on panel hospitals</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Generous cash benefit amounts</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplified coverages tailored as per your needs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Instant claims processing through digital medium</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 0348-1112242. after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Condition</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claims will be calculated according to the normal charges of the hospital in the city where the claimant reside.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The maximum limit for surgeon fees is Rs. 10,000/- in the case of surgical procedures. Other charges such as anesthesia and operation room charges will be calculated at standard rates.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of a disease related to fever, claimants must provide a PCR/corona report.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nursing charges are not payable.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Medicines upon discharge are not covered.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Food charges are excluded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A 7-day waiting period is applied.</p>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment of claims is subject to exclusions, as outlined below. Health Insurance Cover shall not cover</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any pre-existing conditions are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Congenital diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; HIV/Aids-related diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Intentional and injuries due to quarrels are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outpatient department (OPD) of all sorts &ndash; any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and will not be covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Surgical procedures such as cosmetic surgeries, joint replacements, and dental procedures are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Regular medications such as insulin are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any special investigations that are not due to the admission or being an inpatient are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; War, strikes, riots, civil commotion, and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that result in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level are not covered</p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The company must be notified of the occurrence of an insured claim as soon as possible but no later than 15 (fifteen) days from the date of discharge from the hospital.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Failure to do so will result in the claim being considered time-barred, and the company will not be liable to pay the claim</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; For each Claim reported, the Company shall obtain:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Admission Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Discharge Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Doctor Prescription/Note for admission or Medical History</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Medical Reports if any</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any Bills to be claimed.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC Both Sides</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In the case of income loss compensation, the customer must submit proof of income loss i.e. salary slip etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If there is a dispute, suspected fraudulent activity on the claim, or a unique situation that requires further clarification, the payment period may be extended but shall not exceed fifteen (15) working days. If the dispute is resolved through the legal system, the payment period may be extended for a longer duration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 051-8466336 after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These products will currently be offered through outbound call center and USSD only for self-subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Following is a high-level process for sales through call center</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JC will share lead set with WebDoc</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WebDoc will run a robocall to that lead set. If the customer is interested to opt for the product they&rsquo;ll press 1 or end the call</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Individuals who show interest to opt for the product. The agent will call them explain the product and if they are willing to purchase it the agent will send an MPIN request to them for premium deduction through insurance portal.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Upon premium deduction customer will receive an SMS for successful subscription and premium deduction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will also receive their policy T&amp;Cs through SMS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

			<p>Any pre-existing conditions are not covered.</p>

			<p>Congenital diseases are not covered.</p>

			<p>HIV/Aids-related diseases are not covered.</p>

			<p>Intentional and injuries due to quarrels are not covered.</p>

			<p>Outpatient department (OPD) of all sorts &ndash; any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and will not be covered.</p>

			<p>Surgical procedures such as cosmetic surgeries, joint replacements, and dental procedures are not covered.</p>

			<p>Regular medications such as insulin are not covered.</p>

			<p>Any special investigations that are not due to the admission or being an inpatient are not covered.</p>

			<p>War, strikes, riots, civil commotion, and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that result in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level are not covered</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ WebDoc (Dost Muhafiz) â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Dost Muhafiz Insurance</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with WebDoc Pakistan Limited.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Detail</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges &amp; Benefit</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1,160</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization &ndash; Maximum Annual Limit</p>

			<p>Co-payment (in case of Treatment at a Non-Panel Hospital</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 200,000</p>

			<p>100% re-imbursement</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ambulance Maximum</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>In case of accident limit</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>110% Covered</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pre-Existing Conditions (PEC)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Not covered</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Loss of Income during Hospitalization (maximum 30 days)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1,000 per day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Burial Charges</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 25,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz Cash wallet users only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit:18-65 years</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Risk Protection: The product offers a financial safety net to customers against the costs of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Call A DOC: A service that provides free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers&rsquo; family members can also call for telephonic consultation.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fluent Process: The paperless enrollment process allows for enrollment in just a few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrollment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Financial protection in case of hospitalization</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage for customer and Free online consultation for entire family</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No condition on panel hospitals</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Generous cash benefit amounts</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplified coverages tailored as per your needs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Instant claims processing through digital medium</p>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Condition</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claims will be calculated according to the normal charges of the hospital in the city where the claimant reside.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The maximum limit for surgeon fees is Rs. 10,000/- in the case of surgical procedures. Other charges such as anesthesia and operation room charges will be calculated at standard rates.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of a disease related to fever, claimants must provide a PCR/corona report.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nursing charges are not payable.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Medicines upon discharge are not covered.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Food charges are excluded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A 7-day waiting period is applied.</p>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment of claims is subject to exclusions, as outlined below. Health Insurance Cover shall not cover</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any pre-existing conditions are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Congenital diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; HIV/Aids-related diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Intentional and injuries due to quarrels are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outpatient department (OPD) of all sorts &ndash; any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and will not be covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Surgical procedures such as cosmetic surgeries, joint replacements, and dental procedures are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Regular medications such as insulin are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any special investigations that are not due to the admission or being an inpatient are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; War, strikes, riots, civil commotion, and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that result in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level are not covered</p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The company must be notified of the occurrence of an insured claim as soon as possible but no later than 15 (fifteen) days from the date of discharge from the hospital.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Failure to do so will result in the claim being considered time-barred, and the company will not be liable to pay the claim</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; For each Claim reported, the Company shall obtain:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Admission Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Discharge Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Doctor Prescription/Note for admission or Medical History</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Medical Reports if any</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any Bills to be claimed.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC Both Sides</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In the case of income loss compensation, the customer must submit proof of income loss i.e. salary slip etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If there is a dispute, suspected fraudulent activity on the claim, or a unique situation that requires further clarification, the payment period may be extended but shall not exceed fifteen (15) working days. If the dispute is resolved through the legal system, the payment period may be extended for a longer duration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 051-8466336 after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These products will currently be offered through outbound call center and USSD only for self-subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Following is a high-level process for sales through call center</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JC will share lead set with WebDoc</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WebDoc will run a robocall to that lead set. If the customer is interested to opt for the product they&rsquo;ll press 1 or end the call</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Individuals who show interest to opt for the product. The agent will call them explain the product and if they are willing to purchase it the agent will send an MPIN request to them for premium deduction through insurance portal.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Upon premium deduction customer will receive an SMS for successful subscription and premium deduction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will also receive their policy T&amp;Cs through SMS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk133588217">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Table 1.0</a></p>

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>18 to 65 years for general insurance</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation/Exclusion from Policy</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Main product is only doctor consultancy for whole family members</p>

			<p>on 051-8466336. Insurance is free with WebDoc Health Services only</p>

			<p>for Mobile account holder who activates the service. For Insurance age limit is 18-65 years.</p>

			<p>Time to claim insurance is 7 working days. Claims cannot be submitted after 15 days of admission in Hospital.</p>

			<p>7 Day maturity time for claims.</p>

			<p>No limit to call a physician within subscription period.</p>

			<p>Male &amp; female both can subscribe women health service</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Refer to Process Overview of WebDoc Insurance SOP</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Consultation Portal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Customer Loan Repayment</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Loan Repayment means giving back the money you borrowed</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash provides a convenient and simple solution to help the customer of various Microfinance Banks and institutions to pay their loan installment on a regular basis</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily reporting made to the organization for collection made to the microfinance banks/institutions to ensure borrower accounts are updated</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash you can repay the loan to these microfinance banks/institutions</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; KBL</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; KASHF</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Kashf Foundation Naushehra</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Transaction Status â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process will cover call handling scenarios where customer is inquiring status of transaction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process provides general guidelines to handle transaction Status related calls.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This document has two sections that covers the call handling SOPs for respective transaction type as shown in below table.</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Section</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Transaction type</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Product &amp; Services</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Section 1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Outgoing Transactions</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This section will cover processes to check status of all outgoing transactions for following products &amp; services.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Money Transfer (C2C, IBFT, Raast, CNIC), UBP, Mobile Load, Mobile Bundles, Government Payments, MTAG, Loan Payments, Fee Payments, voucher/challan payments</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Section 2</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Incoming Transactions</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>This section will cover processes to check status of all incoming transactions of following products &amp; services.</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Money Transfer (C2C, IBFT, RAAST) and Payoneer</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Transaction status is a value mentioned in CPS which shows the state of a transaction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent can view status of a transaction using below navigation.</p>

<p>CPS &gt;&gt; transaction Tab &gt;&gt; Search by receipt No. &gt;&gt; Enter transaction ID &gt;&gt; Check transaction Status</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent can also check status of a transaction from customer&rsquo;s transaction history via below navigation.</p>

<p>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History &gt;&gt; Enter Search Criteria &gt;&gt; Click Search &gt;&gt; Identify transaction from list &gt;&gt; Check Transaction Status</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Each transaction status value has specific meaning which helps agent to identify the outcome of transaction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to table 1.0 below for possible transaction statuses and their description.</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:612px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Transaction Status value</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complete</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is successfully completed as per CPS.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Expired</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction was not complete in specific time and gets expired. Balance will be returned to the customer account as per CPS.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Cancelled</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is not completed by customer or is cancelled by system.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Declined</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is not completed by CPS due to specific error/limitation.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pending Authorized</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction is in process and will be completed within specific time</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Authorized</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Transaction was not completed within specific time. Customer balance is reserved. This is an exception and will be catered as per scenario.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For transactions, where status is either Pending Authorized or Authorized, initial wait time is shared with customer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If transaction is in Authorized state and customer called after initial wait time, complaint needs to be made to update transaction state. Refer to Transaction with Authorized status complaint handling Process.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to table 2.0 for service details.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Table 2.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Transaction Status &ndash; Information</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App, IVR</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA,</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee (weekly)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification (where required)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>All Active JazzCash customers</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk135925583"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></a></p>

<p><strong>Info Scenario </strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:546px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk135925592"><strong>Scenario 1. Transaction Status &ndash; Scenarios</strong></a></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: Transaction Status &ndash; Complete</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.2: Transaction Status &ndash; Expired</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.3: Transaction Status &ndash; Cancelled</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.4: Transaction Status &ndash; Declined</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.5: Transaction Status &ndash; Pending Authorized</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.6: Transaction Status &ndash; Authorized</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk137556804"><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status (Pending Active, Active, Dormant, Suspended, Frozen)</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk149234157">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Payoneer â€“ SOP  
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Mandatory Information</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash customers can link or create a Payoneer account via the app to receive funds in GBP, USD, or Euro and use Payoneer&rsquo;s Billing Service (BLS) to request payments from international clients.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After successfully linking or creating Payoneer account, customer can receive funds in JazzCash account through Payoneer.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Payoneer withdrawals via JazzCash have limits based on account level with a minimum withdrawal of $5, allowing up to 10 daily and 30 monthly transactions</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process will cover all the information related to Payoneer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Freelancers can now register their new Payoneer account through JazzCash mobile account via application or simply link their current Payoneer account with JazzCash.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any communication from Payoneer related to your account registration will be done on your registered email address</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After successfully linking or creating Payoneer account, customer can receive funds in JazzCash account through Payoneer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; At the time of registration of new Payoneer account or linking with JazzCash application, customer needs IBAN Number. The system generated IBAN at the time of registration, which you should verify to make sure it is &ldquo;PK29JAZZ0000000000000001&rdquo;. This has nothing to do with your mobile account number and is just a system level code.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two IDs for the transaction one is the Payoneer transaction ID and the other is the receipt number, for tracking the complaints we need receipt number. Customer goes to &ldquo;Manage account&rdquo;, taps &ldquo;transaction history&rdquo; where all past transactions are mentioned.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The IBAN is a JazzCash and Payoneer mutually agreed IBAN code which makes sure your JazzCash mobile account, which is being used for registration, is linked with your new Payoneer Account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are total 3 currencies in which amount can be withdrawal from Payoneer account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; GBP, Dollar and Euro are the three currencies.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Minimum Withdrawal from Payoneer is 5 Dollar.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2 Free ATM cash withdrawal can be availed within the Calendar month of receiving Freelance Payment. 3rd Cash withdrawal and onwards will be charged as per JazzCash standard charges</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer daily withdrawal limit is 150,000.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer daily Withdrawal per transaction counts are 10.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer monthly withdrawal limit is 500,000.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer monthly withdrawal count per transactions are 30.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer charges a standard fee of 2% per withdrawal. No charges by JazzCash applicable on Payoneer withdrawal.</p>

<p><strong>Payoneer Billing Service (Request a Payment Service)</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Customers can initiate a payment request to their international clients, which would allow them to receive payments directly into their Payoneer account (once paid by the Payer) in dollars, GBP, and Euro and then transfer that to their JazzCash account as per the current flow</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk134608463">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Freelancers mostly work on marketplaces i.e. Upwork/fiver etc. where they must pay 10% &amp; 20% fees on the payments they receive from their clients. Through Payoneer Billing Service they can now send a payment request to their clients directly and avoid fees charged by the marketplaces.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Request payments from clients anywhere in the world.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Their clients can pay via credit/debit card, e-check and bank transfer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Manage and track their earnings with ease using JazzCash&#39;s user-friendly dashboard.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers who haven&rsquo;t used BLS (billing service) before, have to subscribe to it through an opt-in process from JazzCash App.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once opt-in, customers would be able to raise a request and fill in their client details for the processing of the request.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can also track the request status by visiting track request option from JazzCash App</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payoneer account has to be linked before opting in for the Request a Payment option.&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Limits:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Minimum limit: 20 USD, Euro and GBP</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Max Limit: USD 20,000, Euro/GBP 15,000</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Note: Please note that these limits are for using the Payoneer billing service. For transferring funds from Payoneer to JazzCash, limits are same (Daily 150,000 and monthly 500,000)</p>

<p><strong>Opt-In via Request a Payment option &ndash; New Customer:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will select the &ldquo;Request a Payment&rdquo; option from the Payoneer homepage.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will click on the &ldquo;Send Email&rdquo; option to proceed with Opt-In. A prompt will be shown that an email has been shared on registered email address at Payoneer. Email will be sent by the Payoneer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer would have to visit the link (Payoneer website link, which is sent from Payoneer on his/her email) and provide required details.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Details will be verified by Payoneer within 5 working day. Once details are verified by Payoneer, a confirmation email will be sent to Customer. Customer can now use Request a Payment service.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will login JazzCash app and link Payoneer account (if not linked) and would be able to use service from homepage by clicking &ldquo;Request a Payment&rdquo;.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If documents are missing or not properly submitted, and if Customer visits Payoneer in JazzCash App, Customer will get the pop-up that documents are not completed. A link will be shown to Customer where they would be directed to the Payoneer website to check on the status of their submission of their documents.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Payoneer approval is under process, and if Customer visits Payoneer in JazzCash App, Customer will get the pop-up that request is still under review. And Customer will get confirmation email once approved.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If request of approval is rejected from Payoneer, and if Customer visits Payoneer in JazzCash App, Customer will get the pop-up that Customer is not eligible for request to payment service. Customer can contact Payoneer for details.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Money Transfer â€“ RAAST â€“ Sop
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash enables seamless RAAST money transfers, allowing instant and free transactions using mobile numbers as RAAST IDs.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can link their RAAST ID with JazzCash for real-time incoming/outgoing transactions via app or *786#.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can send amount as per their account limits. Per transaction limit is Rs 50,000</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Money Transfer RAAST.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash in collaboration with RAAST brings the ability to make seamless money transfers to its customers</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; RAAST is a flagship initiative of the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP). It allows people to make instantaneous and free money transfers between people by simply using their mobile numbers as RAAST IDs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers can now easily send money to other bank accounts through a recipient&rsquo;s mobile number by creating their RAAST ID through the JazzCash app or by dialing *786#</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payments via RAAST would be received and sent instantly and without any delay</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can have one RAAST ID against a CNIC at a time. Customer can link his RAAST ID with another msisdn by delinking from previous bank.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; As per current SBP directions, currently only one mobile number/ RAAST ID can be linked with one bank account therefore if a customer would already have their RAAST ID linked with HBL, they would have to de-link their RAAST ID from HBL to be able to link their RAAST ID to their JazzCash account to receive funds via RAAST through JazzCash</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When a customer would be sending funds via RAAST to a recipient and the recipient would not have a JazzCash account but a RAAST ID already linked with another bank, funds would be sent to the recipients RAAST ID which would be linked to their bank account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For performing transaction via RAAST customer firstly need to link RAAST ID with specific account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For JazzCash RAAST ID should be linked with account for successfully receiving transaction via RAAST</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If RAAST ID is linked with account customer will not be able to perform Change of MSISDN for Change of MSISDN RAAST ID should de-linked.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two type of RAAST transaction</p>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Transaction includes all transactions which is sent from bank account to JazzCash account via RAAST</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank via RAAST but not received in JazzCash account inform customer to register complaint at Sender Bank.</p>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This transaction includes transaction send from JazzCash account to bank account via RAAST</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Via RAAST transaction are performed in real-time</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Via RAAST transaction are free of cost.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account limits are set for send and receive amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer is complaining that he/she sent money through RAAST or to Easy Paisa account and B party (receiver) didn&rsquo;t receive the amount yet.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will check system and if transaction is completed within a span of 15 minutes.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will guide customer to wait for at least 15 minutes and if amount is still not received by B party (receiver) then call again and complaint will be taken</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for service details</p>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>RAAST Transaction &ndash; Product Information</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Possible Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<h1>&nbsp;</h1>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation for Agent: </strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Account Status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status (Pending Active, Active, Dormant, Suspended, Frozen)</p>

<p><strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click review Transactions <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p><strong>To check Account Transaction Amount Limit:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click operation <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Rule Profile In Customer Info</p>

<p><strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click operation <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>
