ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Master Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Merchant Master Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MasterCard allow users to make online payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to JazzCash mobile wallet for easy fund management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Mastercard debit card is auto enabled for all online/E-commerce payments within Pakistan (domestic platforms).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Set your desired transaction limits for JazzCash Mastercard debit card using JazzCash Business mobile application.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Business Account customers on Telenor network can only withdraw cash from ATM</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Mastercard debit card is auto activated for payments at retail merchants/all POS machines&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can Order card from:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JazzCash Website (www.jazzcash.com.pk)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JazzCash Business Mobile App</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;USSD &ndash; dial *800#</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Master card is received within 15 Working days on provided address and card fee will be deducted from your JazzCash Mobile Account upon confirmation of your order. You do not have to pay the fee in cash.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If your card is returned to the Courier service call the helpline and provide details for the card to be re-dispatched to you again. (Refer to JazzCash-Merchant-Mastercard-complaint)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you do not call the helpline for card delivery, your card will be discarded after 60 days from date of 1st return and fee will not be refunded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Master Debit Card is rejected, your card fee will be refunded in your Mobile Account within 2 working days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case merchant calls and ask about ATM card reissuance charges we need to guide the merchant master debit card is not free of cost</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Visit MMBL branch and order an instant card free of charge</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For first time order from web portal / JazzCash Business App Master card price is 1 Rs and second time the Mastercard fee implement</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Master Card Order Fees is Rs:799</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Master Card Annual Charges is Rs:99</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When you Order a card from MMBL you will Provide CNIC and JazzCash Business Account Number and will visit along with your Jazz Business account number, For Confirmation you will enter the MPIN</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Merchant &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can with draw amount from all ATM while withdrawing the amount your ATM PIN also generated and Use the Default option to use</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals: Free up to Rs 50,000 in a month, subsequent transactions shall be charged at Rs 25 per transaction</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash can only be withdrawn in multiples of 500 at ATM(s)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Master Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in Master Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - PayPak Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant PayPak Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy fund management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak debit card does not support online purchases</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can Order card from:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Website (www.jazzcash.com.pk)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; JazzCash Business Mobile App</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; USSD &ndash; dial *800#</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card will be received within 15 Working days on provided address and card fee will be deducted from your JazzCash Mobile Account upon confirmation of your order. You do not have to pay the fee in cash.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If your card returned to the Courier service call the helpline and provide details for the card to be re-dispatched to you again. (Refer to JazzCash- Merchant -PayPak complaint)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If you do not call the helpline for card delivery, your card will be discarded after 60 days from date of 1st return and fee will not be refunded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If PayPak Debit Card rejected Your card fee will be refunded in your Mobile Account within 2 working days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card Order Fees is Rs:999</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; PayPak Debit Card Annual Charges is Rs:299</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Merchant &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can withdraw funds via ATM using JazzCash debit card by using default option while withdrawing</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals: Free up to Rs 50,000 in a month, subsequent transactions shall be charged at Rs 25 per transaction</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash can only be withdrawn in multiples of 500 at ATM(s)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Merchant PayPak Debit Card</strong></a></p>
			</td>

			<p><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong>Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS only</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Card from Visa Debit Card Portal (VDC): </strong>Visa Debit Card Portal &gt;&gt;Search Order &gt;&gt;Enter MISIDN &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

<p><strong>Check PayPak Card from CTI Portal: </strong>CTI Portal &gt;&gt; Search CLI in PayPak Card Tab &gt;&gt; Enter mobile number (with 92&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;&times;) &gt;&gt; Check Card Status</p>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related to USSD (*800#).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz user can transfer use USSD string to transfer amount, load, bundle, bill payments etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz Merchant can also Use his account via USSD.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Menu of <strong>*800#</strong> is</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; *800# &gt;&gt; 1 For Send Money &gt;&gt; 2 For Pay Bills &gt;&gt; 3 for Mobile Load &amp; Bundle &gt;&gt; 4 for Instant Loan &gt;&gt; 5 for My Account &gt;&gt; 6 for Payment &gt;&gt; 7 for TIL payment &gt;&gt; 8 for View my TIL ID &gt;&gt; 9 for Loyalty Point</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Visa Debit card â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Visa Debit card.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Visa Debit Card allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy fund management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Visa debit card is not auto enabled for all online/E-commerce payments within Pakistan (domestic platforms).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant call over helpline and will activate online session for online using</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can&rsquo;t Order Visa Debit card</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contactless transaction limit is the amount you can spend without using a PIN or inserting your card when making a payment. (Tap &amp; Pay payment)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Card Status Refer to (Merchant &ndash; Card Status &ndash; Sop)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can with draw amount from all ATM while withdrawing the amount your ATM PIN also generated and Use the Default option to use</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM cash withdrawals: Free up to Rs 50,000 in a month, subsequent transactions shall be charged at Rs 25 per transaction</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash can only be withdrawn in multiples of 500 at ATM(s)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - Account â€“ App Related Issue - SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related JazzCash Business App Issue</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can use JazzCash application for different purposes such as Load, Bundle, IBFT, Bill Payment, Government Payment etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant login in JazzCash Business app but is unable to login in JazzCash Business App due to errors</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &ldquo;Oops! Look like you have already linked maximum number of JazzCash accounts on this handset. Please contact us for further assistance&rdquo;.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &ldquo;Oops! Look like you have already linked your JazzCash account on multiple handsets. Please contact us for further assistance&rdquo;.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will ask merchant the specific error while login JazzCash Business App if errors is any one of above error</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Then no compliant will locked and agent will inform merchant to wait for 30 days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If merchant is facing an error, &ldquo;<strong>Registration already in process with other device&rdquo;,</strong> CCR will guide merchant to wait for 2 working day as it takes 2 working day for account registration and complaint will be lodged if initial TAT (2working day) has lapsed</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant is facing error while login in <strong>Redirect to device registration</strong> this error is temporary and only specific for IOS user inform merchant re-install App</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where merchant is unable to create JazzCash Business account via JazzCash Business App and error occurs that <strong>CNIC is Blacklisted</strong> validate account existence in CPS and inform merchant to visit MMBL</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For status where merchant is unable to perform transaction via JazzCash Business App agent will validate merchant concern and after validation agent will process complaint (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p><strong>OTP Issues </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If merchant is trying to login in JazzCash Business App and merchant is not <strong>receiving OTP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent need to first confirm from the merchant verbally to check handset SMS memory if it is full ask merchant to delete old SMS so that merchant can receive SMS from 8558</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ask merchant to confirm his Screened numbers/Blacklist in case 8558 is added in any of the list that needs to be deleted immediately in order to get SMS from 8558</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SMS Storage available = Yes, 8558 number Blacklisted = No</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will process compliant as per incoming SMS from 8558 not received (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; 8558 SMS &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant is trying to login JazzCash Business App and receiving OTP but <strong>OTP does not fetch</strong></p>

<p><strong>Android user Checklist</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For android user&rsquo;s sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Needs to verify whether merchant has given permissions for all operations to JazzCash Business app</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Device needs to be PTA approved</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After verifying the complete checklist, complaint will be locked in service now.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App needs to be updated to the latest version</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If all above checklist is fulfilled agent will proceed with complaint registration in service now (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p><strong>IOS User Checklist</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; iPhone does not auto-fetch OTP while logging into JazzCash Business app.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Users will have to enter the OTP within 20 seconds.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After verifying the complete checklist complaint will be locked in service now.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App needs to be updated to the latest version</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If all above checklist is fulfilled agent will proceed with complaint registration in service now (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to Table 3.0 for high level understanding</p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>System Navigation</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status (Pending Active, Active, Dormant, Suspended, Frozen)</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Review Transaction <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification = L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status = Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS only</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Loan Repayment â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Merchant Loan Repayment</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Loan Repayment means giving back the money you borrowed</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash provides a convenient and simple solution to help the merchant of various Microfinance Banks and institutions to pay their loan installment on a regular basis</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily reporting made to the organization for collection made to the microfinance banks/institutions to ensure borrower accounts are updated</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash Business App you can repay the loan to these microfinance banks/institutions</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; NRSP (National Rural Support Program)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; OPD Support Program</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mobilink Microfinance bank</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; SRSO (Sindh Rural Support Organization)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; BRAC</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Thardeep</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; KASHF foundation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Advans Microfinance Bank</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Khushhali Bank</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; DAMEN (Development Action for Mobilization &amp; Emancipation)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; SAFCO Support Foundation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; MOJAZ</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; WASIL</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; OPP (Orangi Pilot Project)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; RCDS (Rural Community Development Society)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Government Payment 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Government taxes</li>
	<li>Taxes are mandatory financial contributions imposed by governments on individuals, businesses, or other entities to fund public services and government operations.</li>
	<li>These contributions are usually based on income, property, goods, services, or other financial transactions</li>
	<li>Taxes can serve various purposes, such as funding infrastructure, healthcare, education, and social welfare programs</li>
	<li>The specific types and rates of taxes vary from one country to another and are governed by tax laws and regulations.</li>
	<li>Merchant pay Below Mention Tax of Government through Business App
	<ul>
		<li>Islamabad Vehicle Tax</li>
		<li>GOP Industries</li>
		<li>GOP &ndash; Punjab Land Record</li>
		<li>GOP - Excise &amp; Taxation</li>
		<li>Punjab revenue Authority</li>
		<li>Baluchistan Excise and taxation</li>
		<li>Govt. OF Sindh &ndash; Vehicle Token Tax</li>
		<li>GOP - Board of Revenue</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

			</td>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash - Merchant â€“ MPIN 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant MPIN.</li>
	<li>Mobile Personal Identification Number (MPIN) is a 4-digit security code that is required to login to JazzCash account or to authorize any transactions.</li>
	<li>Upon successful registration, you can access JazzCash Business account menu through JazzCash Business App or Merchant can dial *800# and enter their desired 4-digit MPIN.</li>
	<li>All transactions from the JazzCash Business account are encrypted for security purposes.</li>
	<li>No transaction can be made without MPIN which has to be entered from your Mobile.</li>
	<li>If you ever forget your MPIN, you can Reset by Yourself by JazzCash Business App or By Dialing USSD and Calling On helpline.</li>
	<li>If merchant complains that MPIN has been reset but temporary MPIN is not received from 8558. Agent must check MPIN Notification status (system navigation).
	<ul>
		<li>If status is failed: agent will proceed with resetting MPIN on same call.</li>
		<li>If status is success: agent will ask merchant to check handset for below setting:</li>
		<li>&nbsp;8558 SMS number should not be in screened numbers, blocked or black-list numbers.</li>
		<li>Phone memory should not be full.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If merchant claims that above setting has been checked. Agent will proceed with MPIN reset on same call and verify if temporary MPIN is received during the call. If temporary MPIN is still not received, agent will proceed with making complaint of Incoming SMS from 8558.</li>
	<li>Agent must not reset MPIN multiple times during same call.</li>
	<li>If merchant calls for MPIN reset, if merchant denies receiving MPIN on the same calls, ask merchant to wait for 15 minutes.</li>
	<li>Agent must guide merchant how-to processes of Setting up, changing, resetting MPIN after MPIN is reset.</li>
	<li>Educate merchant on belong points:
	<ul>
		<li>MPIN should be kept secret, and not to share with anyone</li>
		<li>Repeated digit or repeated MPIN Not used</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Non-migrated merchant can reset, change, MPIN via JazzCash app and USSD Code *786# (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer - MPIN SOP)</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<p><strong>To Reset MPIN:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Info Tab &gt;&gt; Click Reset MPIN &gt;&gt; Write &ldquo;L3 Verified&rdquo; in Reason Text Box &gt;&gt; Click Submit</p>

<p><strong>To Check MPIN Notification Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; My function &gt;&gt; Reporting &gt;&gt; Notification Log &gt;&gt; Enter Merchant MSISDN with 92 (92xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Check Start -End Date &gt;&gt; Click Search &gt;&gt; Verify Internal Status against MPIN Notification type. (Success, Failed)</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Money Transfer â€“ B2C/B2B 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Merchant-to-Merchant (B2B) Transaction is a Money Transfer service where a JazzCash merchant can transfer funds to another JazzCash Business account.</li>
	<li>Merchant-to-JazzCash Customer (B2C) Transaction is a money Transfer service where a JazzCash merchant can transfer fund to another JazzCash Customer Account.</li>
	<li>There are two type of B2C/B2B transaction
	<ul>
		<li>Incoming C2B/B2B Transaction</li>
		<li>Outgoing B2C/B2B Transaction</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For B2B/B2C via App, funds are transferred in real time and cannot be reversed</li>
	<li>If merchant Perform Wrong transaction of QR/TIL ID or JazzCash Customer refer to (JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; QR Transaction)</li>
	<li>From Merchant to Customer (B2C) no charges are implement</li>
	<li>For B2B outgoing Transaction the receiver received the transaction with 2% charges e.g. (Rs:1000=2%(Rs:20)</li>
	<li>For Non &ndash; Migrated Business Account via USSD, funds are transferred with a delay up to 30 minutes.</li>
	<li>Amounts limits are set as per merchant account level.</li>
	<li>Transaction will be completed. Both Sender and receiver will receive confirmation SMS.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for transaction amount limit as per account level.</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 2.0 for service details.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Table 2.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>B2C/B2B Merchant Transaction &ndash; Product Information</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Possible Value</strong></p>

<p><strong>To Check Transaction status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p><strong>To check Account Transaction Amount Limit/Count Limit:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; Click Rule Profile in Merchant Info</p>

<p><strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Account Limit 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process will cover all the information related to JazzCash Business Account Limit.</li>
	<li>The limit is the specific amount that merchant can send or receive in JazzCash Business account.</li>
	<li>Merchant can check via USSD only daily and monthly limit</li>
	<li>Merchant can check via App only daily, monthly and yearly limit.</li>
	<li>If merchant wants to know account limits inform customer, the complete How &ndash; to Process</li>
	<li>If merchant still insists and wanted to check it from helpline then agent will inform merchant after taking complete verification the account limits</li>
	<li>There is also specific amount is set that you can keep in your account balance.</li>
	<li>Utility Bill limit in a month is 100,000</li>
	<li>Cash in per transaction limits is 50,000</li>
	<li>IBFT per limit transaction is 50,000, if Merchant has higher limit than 50,000 than Merchant can perform multiple transaction of 50,000.</li>
	<li>For general account limit refer to Table 1.0</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:576px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Account Level</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Daily (Credit/Debit)</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Monthly (Credit/Debit)</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Yearly (Credit/Debit)</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Maximum Balance</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">M0</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">50,000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">50,000</p>
			</td>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer - Raast â€“ P2M QR â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process will cover all the information related to Raast P2M QR Transaction.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Raast is a Pakistan&rsquo;s first instant payment platform which enables end-to-end digital payments between individuals, businesses, and government entities</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; P2M mean Person to Merchant which perform payment through Raast P2M QR.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; QR codes offer quick fund transfer between businesses and customers</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can now scan Raast enable bank QR and send amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can also scan QR of JazzCash merchant to send amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant will be charged 1% of actual amount</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer or merchant will scan QR or enter Till ID while performing this transaction customer will be shown that QR is Raast P2M QR.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>Raast enabled QR will have will have 9 digit Till IDs. Same has been visible on Merchant Portal.</li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Other Bank account can also send amount via Raast P2M QR TO Jazz Cash Merchant account holders.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All merchants in categories M0, M1, and M2 will be registered for Raast.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Raast P2M QR functionality will not be accessible for merchants with multiple outlets such as KFC, McDonalds. This is due to a constraint within the SBP/Raast system, where a single CNIC can only be associated with one merchant alias (in our case, the till code).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Kindly be aware that our current JazzCash customers will not be affected, as they can carry out QR transactions with all merchants without any issues</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchants operating a single outlet/QR will function without any problems for both JazzCash and non-JazzCash customers</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The limitation applies only to non-JazzCash customers (such as HBL or Alfalah), who will be unable to perform Raast QR transactions to multiple outlet/QR.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can refund Raast P2M transaction</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Customer initiated payment to merchant QR</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Customer initiated payment to merchant alias</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Customer initiated payment to merchant alias till code</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ WebDoc (Sehat Salamti) â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Sehat Salamti Insurance</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sehat Salamti was previously called Dost Muhafiz.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dost Muhafiz (Sehat Salamti) is a health insurance where a policy holder is covered against the event of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with WebDoc Pakistan Limited.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Detail</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges &amp; Benefit</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Annual Premium</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1,499</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Monthly Premium</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 125</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Daily Premium</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 4</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Value Added Service</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Free virtual clinic facility for entire family</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Hospitalization &ndash; Maximum Annual Limit</p>

			<p>Co-payment (in case of Treatment at a Non-Panel Hospital</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 200,000</p>

			<p>100% re-imbursement</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Ambulance Maximum</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>In case of accident limit</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>110% Covered</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pre-Existing Conditions (PEC)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Not covered</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Loss of Income during Hospitalization (maximum 30 days)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 1,000 per day</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Burial Charges</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Rs. 25,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz Cash wallet users only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit:18-65 years</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Risk Protection: The product offers a financial safety net to customers against the costs of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Call A DOC: A service that provides free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers&rsquo; family members can also call for telephonic consultation.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fluent Process: The paperless enrollment process allows for enrollment in just a few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrollment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Financial protection in case of hospitalization</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage for customer and Free online consultation for entire family</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No condition on panel hospitals</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Generous cash benefit amounts</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplified coverages tailored as per your needs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Instant claims processing through digital medium</p>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Condition</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claims will be calculated according to the normal charges of the hospital in the city where the claimant reside.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The maximum limit for surgeon fees is Rs. 10,000/- in the case of surgical procedures. Other charges such as anesthesia and operation room charges will be calculated at standard rates.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of a disease related to fever, claimants must provide a PCR/corona report.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nursing charges are not payable.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Medicines upon discharge are not covered.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Food charges are excluded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A 7-day waiting period is applied.</p>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment of claims is subject to exclusions, as outlined below. Health Insurance Cover shall not cover</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any pre-existing conditions are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Congenital diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; HIV/Aids-related diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Intentional and injuries due to quarrels are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outpatient department (OPD) of all sorts &ndash; any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and will not be covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Surgical procedures such as cosmetic surgeries, joint replacements, and dental procedures are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Regular medications such as insulin are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any special investigations that are not due to the admission or being an inpatient are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; War, strikes, riots, civil commotion, and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that result in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level are not covered</p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The company must be notified of the occurrence of an insured claim as soon as possible but no later than 15 (fifteen) days from the date of discharge from the hospital.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Failure to do so will result in the claim being considered time-barred, and the company will not be liable to pay the claim</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; For each Claim reported, the Company shall obtain:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Admission Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Discharge Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Doctor Prescription/Note for admission or Medical History</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Medical Reports if any</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any Bills to be claimed.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC Both Sides</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In the case of income loss compensation, the customer must submit proof of income loss i.e. salary slip etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If there is a dispute, suspected fraudulent activity on the claim, or a unique situation that requires further clarification, the payment period may be extended but shall not exceed fifteen (15) working days. If the dispute is resolved through the legal system, the payment period may be extended for a longer duration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 051-8466336 after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These products will currently be offered through outbound call center and USSD only for self-subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Following is a high-level process for sales through call center</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JC will share lead set with Webdoc</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WebDoc will run a robocall to that lead set. If the customer is interested to opt for the product they&rsquo;ll press 1 or end the call</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Individuals who show interest to opt for the product. The agent will call them explain the product and if they are willing to purchase it the agent will send an MPIN request to them for premium deduction through insurance portal.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Upon premium deduction customer will receive an SMS for successful subscription and premium deduction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will also receive their policy T&amp;Cs through SMS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding<a name="_Hlk133588217"></a></p>

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Nissa Insurance</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nissa Insurance was previously known as</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Women Health Insurance (Nissa) is a woman dedicated health insurance where a policy holder is covered against the event of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with WebDoc Pakistan Limited.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Jazz Cash Women wallet users only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit:18-65 years</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Age Limit for Maternity:18-45 years</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Risk Protection: The product offers a financial safety net to customers against the costs of hospitalization.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Call A DOC: A service that provides free telephonic consultation with a professional doctor. Registered customers&rsquo; family members can also call for telephonic consultation.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fluent Process: The paperless enrollment process allows for enrollment in just a few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrollment.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Financial protection in case of hospitalization</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Coverage for customer and Free online consultation for entire family</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No condition on panel hospitals</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Generous cash benefit amounts</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Simplified coverages tailored as per your needs</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Instant claims processing through digital medium</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 0348-1112242. after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Condition</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Claims will be calculated according to the normal charges of the hospital in the city where the claimant reside.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The maximum limit for surgeon fees is Rs. 10,000/- in the case of surgical procedures. Other charges such as anesthesia and operation room charges will be calculated at standard rates.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case of a disease related to fever, claimants must provide a PCR/corona report.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nursing charges are not payable.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Medicines upon discharge are not covered.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Food charges are excluded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A 7-day waiting period is applied.</p>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment of claims is subject to exclusions, as outlined below. Health Insurance Cover shall not cover</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any pre-existing conditions are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Congenital diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; HIV/Aids-related diseases are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Intentional and injuries due to quarrels are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outpatient department (OPD) of all sorts &ndash; any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and will not be covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Surgical procedures such as cosmetic surgeries, joint replacements, and dental procedures are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Regular medications such as insulin are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any special investigations that are not due to the admission or being an inpatient are not covered.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; War, strikes, riots, civil commotion, and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that result in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level are not covered</p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The company must be notified of the occurrence of an insured claim as soon as possible but no later than 15 (fifteen) days from the date of discharge from the hospital.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Failure to do so will result in the claim being considered time-barred, and the company will not be liable to pay the claim</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; For each Claim reported, the Company shall obtain:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Admission Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Discharge Slip of Hospital</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Doctor Prescription/Note for admission or Medical History</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Medical Reports if any</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any Bills to be claimed.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC Both Sides</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In the case of income loss compensation, the customer must submit proof of income loss i.e. salary slip etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If there is a dispute, suspected fraudulent activity on the claim, or a unique situation that requires further clarification, the payment period may be extended but shall not exceed fifteen (15) working days. If the dispute is resolved through the legal system, the payment period may be extended for a longer duration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can dial 051-8466336 after subscription of service to avail the consultation services</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These products will currently be offered through outbound call center and USSD only for self-subscription.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Following is a high-level process for sales through call center</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JC will share lead set with WebDoc</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WebDoc will run a robocall to that lead set. If the customer is interested to opt for the product they&rsquo;ll press 1 or end the call</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Individuals who show interest to opt for the product. The agent will call them explain the product and if they are willing to purchase it the agent will send an MPIN request to them for premium deduction through insurance portal.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Upon premium deduction customer will receive an SMS for successful subscription and premium deduction.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer will also receive their policy T&amp;Cs through SMS.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For claims, please reach out to 4444 or 051-8466336</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Bus Ticket (Book-Me)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where merchant cancel purchase bus ticket Guide merchant to contact Book-Me helpline or email address for any assistance</p>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Contact</strong>: 03137786888&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Email</strong>: <a href="mailto:contact@bookme.pk">contact@bookme.pk</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Discount is shown at the time of booking via JazzCash business app on applying the promo code &ldquo;BUS50&rdquo;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Promo code is only applicable for travel days Wednesday &amp; Thursday</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a merchant complains about below any scenarios of &ldquo;Book-Me&rdquo; then route such merchant to Book-Me helpline and Email support.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Payment deducted but ticket not issued</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bus terminal refusing ticket/entry</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Cancellation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Refunds</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any other issue other than payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can change or cancel an order once, but only before the bus departure date.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Complains regarding bus delays or any other complain regarding the behavior of bus staff are not entertained by Book-Me and complaint with relevant bus service</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash App you can take below companies Service&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Rajput travel</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bahawalpur Express</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Power International</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bilal Daewoo Yutong Bus Service</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Refund Policy:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Daewoo tickets </strong>can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Bilal Travel tickets</strong> can be cancelled or changed 3 hours before departure and in that case 25% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Kainat Travels tickets</strong> can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Skyways, Islamabad Express and Niazi Express tickets</strong> can be cancelled or changed only 3 hours before departure</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Q Connect</strong></p>

<p>All tickets bought online for Q connect have a penalty of 10% if cancelled 3 hours before the departure time. In case of Q connect only customer can get a refund from bus terminal as well and for that a copy of CNIC is required</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any refund requested by Jazz cash mobile account merchant will be posted to respective jazz cash mobile account with in 24 hrs.</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios where merchant will be routed to Book-Me:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant amount has been deducted but payment status on Book-Me merchant portal is showing failed or pending</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Book-Me offer variable pricing model to its merchant and discounts are offered on first come first serve basis because of this merchant raises complain of not getting discounts.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Seat plan is not showing to select seats.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Complains regarding the refund or timings change</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Complaints with double deduction</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment Successful at JazzCash end but ticket not booked at merchant end</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ QR/Till ID Generation Requestâ€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process will cover all the information related to merchant QR Generation</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Merchant QR is typically used by businesses to facilitate cashless payments, making transactions smoother and more efficient.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant account holder has a specific QR and against specific QR merchant has TILL ID which is consist of 8 digits</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant Can received Payment Via TIL ID or By Scanning QR code</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can receive payment from JazzCash Account via QR or Till ID. Customer can perform QR or Till ID transaction through USSD (*786#) OR JazzCash App</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; On the USSD menu, enter an 8-digit TIL ID for transfers.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer perform TILL ID payment through *786#</p>

<p>*786# &gt;&gt; 10 for TIL payment `&gt;&gt; Enter 8 digit TIL ID &gt;&gt; Enter Amount &gt;&gt; Enter MPIN</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; On Business App merchant can check both QR &amp; TIL ID while from USSD only view TIL ID.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; On receiving payment via QR/TIL ID 1% charges deducted from merchant. (Rs 1000=Rs 10)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

<p><strong>Check Merchant Portal: </strong>Merchant Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“Merchant - Account Status -SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenario related to merchant account status</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process is the first step in diagnosis of any merchant inquiry, service request, and complaint.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status is a value in CPS that shows the status of a JazzCash account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status Work Code will be used where only account status is informed to merchant</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status has 4 particular value sets stated below:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Account Status</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pending Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is registered but restricted due as 1st MPIN is not set by merchant.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is fully functional.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Suspended</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is restricted due to CNIC expiry or instructions by Bank.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Frozen</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is restricted as per instruction from Bank.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Pending Active:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant created his JazzCash Business Account but did not set his first time MPIN account status is pending.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For proper account usage merchant need set his MPIN then account status will be marked as active.</p>

<p><strong>Active:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Business Account is in active state and merchant can use his account normally.</p>

<p><strong>Suspended&nbsp; </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant account status is Suspended</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two reason by which account can be suspended</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Due to CNIC expiry</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Due to Instruction by Bank</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will validate merchant account CNIC expiry if CNIC is expired agent will process account activation in Service Now (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Merchant &ndash; Account Management).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If CNIC is not expired agent will inform merchant the account status and also inform merchant to visit nearest MMBL with<strong> CNIC</strong> and inform merchant the complete address of MMBL.</p>

<p><strong>Frozen: </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account will be marked frozen by government authorities or deceased person account will be marked as frozen</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account activation/closure inform merchant to nearest Experience center or MMBL</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Account Status</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0, M1, M2</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; App Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant having JazzCash Account</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation (as per scenarios)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk137723218">Consultation Portal</a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Info Scenarios</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:586px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Scenario 1: Account Status Info - Scenarios</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Workcode</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: What is Account Status?</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status Info</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation</strong></p>

<p>To check Account Status: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“Merchant - Complaint Call Handling - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process covers handlings of complaint related calls for cases mentioned in Table 1.0.</p>

<p>&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:92%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Call Handling Cases</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Not Lodged &ndash; Pre-requisite not complied</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant complaint but unable to comply pre-requisite.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Status Resolved</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant wants to know the status of already lodged complaint. Complaint is in resolved state.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Pending - TAT Not lapsed</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in Pending state and resolution time is not over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Pending - TAT Lapsed</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in pending state and complaint resolution time is over.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complaint Resolved &ndash; Merchant Not satisfied</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Complain is in resolved state but resolution is not as per Merchant satisfaction.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Known Issue/Outage</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Merchant is unable to use JazzCash Business service due to service outage or a known issue with the service.&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; L3 verification is must for cases where agent is sharing information related to Merchant account or transaction history.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to respective Product/Service Complaint Handling document for relevant work codes.</p>

	<tbody>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Money Transfer â€“ IBFT â€“ Sop
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description:</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios relation money transfer IBFT.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IBFT is the service which allows JazzCash Merchants to send or receive amount from JazzCash account to any bank account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IBFT sending and receiving limits are set as per Merchant account limit</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IBFT per limit transaction is 50,000, if Merchant has higher limit than 50,000 than Merchant can perform multiple transaction of 50,000.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two types of ibft transaction.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Incoming Ibft Transaction</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Outgoing Ibft Transaction</p>

<p><strong>Incoming IBFT:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Transaction includes all transactions which is from bank account to JazzCash account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant calls on helpline that amount is sent from any bank but not received in JazzCash account inform Merchant to register complaint at Sender Bank.</p>

<p><strong>Outgoing IBFT:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This transaction includes transaction send from JazzCash account to bank account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Funds are transferred <a name="_Hlk133588217">in real time. Merchant cannot cancel this outgoing IBFT transaction.</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account limits are set for send and receive amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Merchant is complaining that he/she sent money through IBFT or to Easy Paisa account and B party (receiver) didn&rsquo;t receive the amount yet.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will check system and if transaction is completed within a spam of 15 minutes.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will guide Merchant to wait for at least 15 minutes and if amount is still not received by B party (receiver) then call again and complaint will be taken</p>

<p><strong>SBP Charges:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Free up-to Rs. 50,000 per month, subsequent transactions charged at 0.116% or Rs.200 whichever is less.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for service details</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To Check Transaction status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To check Account Transaction Amount Limit:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click operation &gt;&gt; Click Rule Profile in Merchant Info</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>To Check Failure Description:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click operation &gt;&gt; Review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Bus Ticket â€“ SOP Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Bus Ticket (Book-Me)</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where customer cancel purchase bus ticket Guide customer to contact Book-Me helpline or email address for any assistance</p>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Contact</strong>: 03137786888&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Email</strong>: <a href="mailto:contact@bookme.pk">contact@bookme.pk</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Discount is shown at the time of booking via JazzCash app on applying the promo code &ldquo;BUS50&rdquo;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Promo code is only applicable for travel days Wednesday &amp; Thursday</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a customer complains about below any scenarios of &ldquo;Book-Me&rdquo; then route such customers to Book-Me helpline and Email support.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Payment deducted but ticket not issued</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bus terminal refusing ticket/entry</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Cancellation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Refunds</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Any other issue other than payment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; You can change or cancel an order once, but only before the bus departure date.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Complains regarding bus delays or any other complain regarding the behavior of bus staff are not entertained by Book-Me and complaint with relevant bus service</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From JazzCash App you can take below companies Service &nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mian &amp; Company</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mehran Shahid &amp; Nosheen Co</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Wains Transport</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bashir Sons</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Dilawar khan travel</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bahawalpur Express</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Power International</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Bilal Daewoo Yutong Bus Service</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Refund Policy:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Daewoo tickets </strong>can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty and 70% amount will be refunded</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Bilal Travel tickets</strong> can be cancelled or changed 3 hours before departure and in that case 25% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty and 75% amount will be refunded</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Kainat Travels tickets</strong> can be cancelled 6 hours before departure and in that case 30% of ticket price will be charged to customer as a penalty and 70% amount will be refunded</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Skyways, Islamabad Express and Niazi Express tickets</strong> can be cancelled or changed only 3 hours before departure</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Q Connect</strong></p>

<p>All tickets bought online for Q connect have a penalty of 10% if cancelled 3 hours before the departure time. In case of Q connect only customer can get a refund from bus terminal as well and for that a copy of CNIC is required</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any refund requested by Jazz cash mobile account customer will be posted to respective jazz cash mobile account with in 24 hrs.</p>

<p><strong>Scenarios where customer will be routed to Book-Me:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer amount has been deducted but payment status on Book-Me merchant portal is showing failed or pending</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Book-Me offer variable pricing model to its customers and discounts are offered on first come first serve basis because of this customer raises complain of not getting discounts.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Seat plan is not showing to select seats.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Complains regarding the refund or timings change</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Complaints with double deduction</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment Successful at JazzCash end but ticket not booked at merchant end</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>
