ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Deposit Money/Cash-In â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Cash In/Cash deposit</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant accounts i.e. M0, M1 and M2 can perform Cashin from Retailer, Franchise and experience Centre</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant perform cash in amount will deposited in Merchant account in real time.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For all how to processes inform Merchant to visit Retailer, Franchise and Experience Centre and also sent relevant ISMS of Retailer, Franchise and experience Centre address location and sent relevant ISMS.</p>

<p><strong>Cash-In limit</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Type</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Monthly Cash In Allowed (PKR)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>50,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M2</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>500,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Type</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Max. Cash-In Allowed Per Transaction (PKR)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M0</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>50,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>50,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>M2</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>100,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Charges:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; On performing cash in Merchant will be charged on cash in amount while performing cash in.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From 50 to 20000 cash in amount fee will be 0.50% percent of amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From 20,001 to above cash in amount fee will be Rs 100 flat</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant will be charged FED in accordance with government regulations.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The province/city of retailer/franchise from where Merchant is getting Cash-In does not affect the tax calculation. Tax percentage is determined based on the province in which the Merchant&#39;s account was originally registered.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The fee and tax will be deducted from the Cash-In amount, and the remaining balance will be deposited into the Merchant&#39;s account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For information on the tax percentages with respective provinces, please refer below:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;Federal&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 16%</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;Sindh&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 13%</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;Punjab&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;16%</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;KPK&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 15%</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; &nbsp;Baluchistan&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 15%</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Tax percentage is charged on the fee, not the Cash-In amount.</p>

<p><strong>Example:</strong></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash In amount = 1000</a></p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Service Fee = 0.50% of Cash in Amount = 5 Rs.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; FED = 16% of Service Fee = 16% of 5 Rs. = 0.65</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Total Cash in charge = service fee + FED = 5 + 0.65 = 5.65</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Example for amount greater than 20,001 to above</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cash in Amount = 30,000</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Service Fee = Flat Rs. 100</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; FED = 13 % of Service Fee = 13% of 100 Rs.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Total Cash in charge = service fee + FED = 100 + 13 = 113 Rs.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Account Management â€“ SOP Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Customer Account Management</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can view his profile is JazzCash App where he can see all his personal and Business Details</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Details which are shown in profile is</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC and CNIC Expiry</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Email (Customer can edit Email by Edit in front of Email)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; IBAN Number</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; MPIN (Customer can change MPIN by clicking edit in front of MPIN)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account Management includes</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Profile Rectifications</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; KYC Updation</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CNIC Expiry of Active Account</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Suspend Account Due to CNIC Expiry</p>

<p><strong>Profile Rectification: </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Profile Rectification includes all the products which is tagged to customer account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer account linked with any company or any product like food panda which tagged with customer account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer profile is OMNO and number is Jazz network and customer account has wrong profile tagged and customer is unable to avail services due to wrong tagged profile agent will process complaint and rectify customer profile (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer is unable to perform transaction or is unable to avail any services due to tagged products (i.e. HR account etc.) agent will inform customer and then agent will process complaint and rectify customer profile (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management).</p>

<p><strong>KYC Updation:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KYC stands for Know Your Customer</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; KYC includes Name, Place of Birth, Date of Birth, Mother Name</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer cannot change his Business name for changing business name customer will close his account then open new account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If any of the KYC is wrong as per customer then agent will validate details as per NADRA if detail is correct as per NADRA then agent will update customer KYC (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IF KYC is not correct and details are missing in both (CPS, NADRA) Portal, and customer is claiming that as per his CNIC details are correct. Then agent will ask the customer to share his CNIC picture with his concern at <a href="mailto:complaints@jazz.com.pk">complaints@jazz.com.pk</a>.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After getting the information via email, the CU agent will handle the KYC update request. (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management).</p>

<p><strong>CNIC Expiry of Active Account:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can update his CNIC expiry by JazzCash App and USSD (*786#) for how to details (Refer to Scenario 2.1).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer need to update to update CNIC as soon as possible for proper account usage.</p>

<p><strong>Suspend Due to CNIC Expiry:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer account will be marked suspended due to CNIC expiry</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer does not update his CNIC expiry then customer account will be marked suspended</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Suspend account due to CNIC expiry agent will proceed with complaint registration Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management &ndash; Complaint Management</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account will be marked active and CNIC will be updated as well and then customer will be able to use account properly.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk135925583"><strong>Info Scenario </strong></a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:534px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk135925592"><strong>Scenario 1. Account Management &ndash; Information Scenarios</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Information Work Codes</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 1.1: What is Customer Account Management?</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC Expiry of Active Account Info - Customer - Complaint Not Lodge</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC expiry of active account - Product issue</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer KYC Updation Info - Complaint Not Lodged</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Suspended Account - CNIC Expired - Info</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136358794"><strong>How &ndash; To Scenarios </strong></a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:534px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Scenario 2. Account Management &ndash; How &ndash; to Processes </strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>How &ndash; to Work Code</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Scenario 2.1: How to update CNIC Expiry</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CNIC Expiry of Active Account Info - Customer</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong>Pre-requisite </strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS only</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Account Status -SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenario related to customer account status</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This process is the first step in diagnosis of any customer inquiry, service request, and complaint.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status is a value in CPS that shows the status of a JazzCash account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status WorkCode will be used where only account status is informed to customer</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status has 5 particular value sets stated below:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Account Status</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Pending Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is registered but restricted due as 1st MPIN is not set by customer.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Active</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is fully functional.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Dormant</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is in restricted state due to inactivity.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Suspended</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is restricted due to CNIC expiry or instructions by Bank.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Frozen</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account is restricted as per instruction from Bank.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Pending Active:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer created his JazzCash Account but did not set his first time MPIN account status is Pending Active.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For proper account usage customer need set his MPIN then account status will be marked as active.</p>

<p><strong>Active:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Account is in active state and customer can use his account normally.</p>

<p><strong>Dormant</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account is marked dormant due to non-usage of account from last 180 days.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For activation customer can activate account via in App BVS or visit nearest retailer, Franchise and Experience Centre and perform BVS account will be marked as active (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Dormant to Active &ndash; SOP)</p>

<p><strong>Suspended&nbsp; </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer account status is Suspended</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are two reason by which account can be suspended</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Due to CNIC expiry</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Due to Instruction by Bank</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will validate customer account CNIC expiry if CNIC is expired agent will process account activation in Service Now (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Account Management).&nbsp; Agent will also inform the self process for updating CNIC for future reference</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span dir="ltr">If&nbsp;CNIC is not expired as per CPS agent will inform customer the account status and also inform </span>advise customers to share their concern over the email <span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> <span style="background-color:yellow"><a href="mailto:complaints@jazzcash.com.pk" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">complaints@jazzcash.com.pk</a></span></span></span></li>
	<li>After receiving the case over the email , comm Unit(CU) will share all cases with FRM (<a href="mailto:FRM@mobilinkbank.com" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">FRM@mobilinkbank.com</a>) to confirm the reason of suspension and way forward for unblocking these accounts.</li>
	<li>Once response is received from FRM, CU will callback customers and request customers to share the required details for account activation. Upon receiving written justification or debit consent, CU will send details to FRM for account activation.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Frozen:&nbsp; </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account will be marked frozen by government authorities or deceased person account will be marked as frozen</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account activation/closure inform customer to nearest Franchise, Experience center or MMBL</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk136191481"><strong>Account Status</strong></a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Value</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA,</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; App Platform Fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Service Fee</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Status</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Verification</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Eligibility</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer having JazzCash Account</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation (as per scenarios)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><a name="_Hlk137723218">Consultation Portal</a></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:552px">

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Insurance â€“ Mahfooz Mustaqbilâ€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Mahfooz Mustaqbil plane Insurance</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mahfooz Mustaqbil Insurance is discontinued from JazzCash</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Coverage Detail</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Charges &amp; Benefit</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>One Time (Annual) Charges (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>549</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Cash benefit in case of death or permanent disability due to Accident (Rs.)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>400,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Enrolment Age Limit: 18&mdash;70 years</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Mahfooz Mustaqbil offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Financial Protection: Lump sum payment of Rs. 400,000 will be provided to Insured&rsquo;s Children (or their legal guardian) to guarantee financial protection in case of Death or Permanent Disability of the Policy Holder due to Accident</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Paperless Enrolment Process: Paperless enrolment process allows enrolment in a matter of few minutes. No medical examinations are required for enrolment</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash in partnership with Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited, brings JazzCash Mahfooz Mustaqbil providing financial</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; coverage of Rs. 400,000 in case of your Accidental Death &amp;/or Accidental Permanent Total Disability</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Exclusions</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; General Exclusions include but are not limited to:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Pregnancy or Childbirth</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Suicide</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; War</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Military Service</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mental or Nervous Disorder</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Drug Addiction and Alcoholism</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Natural Death</p>

<p><strong>Claim Info</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For claims, please call Chubb Insurance Pakistan Limited at nationwide toll-free number 0800 54321 or UAN 021-111-789-789 or email: Pakistan@chubb.com</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Or call our JazzCash helpline number 4444. Our representative will guide through the claim process</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Claim Form</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Copy of Policyholder&rsquo;s CNIC</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Copy of Beneficiary&rsquo;s CNIC (if different)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Death Certificate from Union Council (in case of Accidental death claim)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Evidence of Injury (in case of Permanent Total Disability claim)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Copy of Hospital Record and Details of treatment provided (in case of Permanent Total Disability claim)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Copy of FIR (in case of police involvement)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Copy of Succession Certificate from the Honorable Court which has jurisdiction to entertain the succession application of the Policyholder (in case of Accidental death claim)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Claims are settled within seven (7) business days, after completed documents are received</p>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Limitation/Exclusion from Policy</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>A Policyholder shall not be covered under more than one Mahfooz Mustaqbil Plan offered by Chubb Insurance. In the event that a Policyholder is covered under more than one such Plan, Chubb will consider that person to be insured under the Plan first issued. Chubb will refund any duplicated insurance premium payment which may have been made by or on behalf of the Policyholder.</p>

			<p>General Exclusions include but are not limited to:</p>

			<p>Pregnancy or Childbirth</p>

			<p>Suicide</p>

			<p>War</p>

			<p>Military Service</p>

			<p>Mental or Nervous Disorder</p>

			<p>Drug Addiction and Alcoholism</p>

			<p>Death or Disability due to pre-existing disease.</p>

			<p>Natural Death</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>T&amp;C</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>N/A</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Consultation Portal</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>CPS, Service Now, Konnect, NADRA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ TID/SMS Resend (G2P) â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><a name="_Hlk139326304">&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to TID/SMS Resend (G2P).</a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; An TID/SMS Resend (G2P) is money from the government given to farms and agricultural businesses to support their income, control the supply of agricultural goods, and impact their cost and availability.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If amount not received on CNIC then guide customer to call on FDMA Helpline or relevant organization where amount is received</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Amount posted on CNIC to the customer from Government received by customer</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Send CNIC without dashes to &lsquo;<strong>939312</strong>&rsquo; to receive amount SMS for FDMA short code to receive TID again.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Where payment is received as per customer from FDMA then <strong>FDMA Payment - TID SMS Sent</strong> WorkCode will be used</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cases where payment is received from any other organization then <strong>TID SMS/Passcode Reset Request - G2P - SMS Sent </strong>WorkCode will be used</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer Account â€“ App Related Issue - SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related JazzCash App Issue</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can use JazzCash application for different purposes such as Load, Bundle, IBFT, Bill Payment, Government Payment, Raast etc.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer login in JazzCash app but is unable to login in JazzCash App due to errors</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;Oops! Look like you have already linked maximum number of JazzCash accounts on this handset. Please contact us for further assistance&rdquo;.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &ldquo;Oops! Look like you have already linked your JazzCash account on multiple handsets. Please contact us for further assistance&rdquo;.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will ask customer the specific error while login JazzCash App if errors is any one of above error</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Then no compliant will locked and agent will inform customer to wait for 30 days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer is facing an error, &ldquo;<strong>Registration already in process with other device&rdquo;,</strong> CCR will guide customer to wait for 24 hours as it takes 24 hours for account registration and complaint will be lodged if initial TAT (24 Hours) has lapsed</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer is facing error while login in <strong>Redirect to device registration</strong> this error is temporary and only specific for IOS user inform customer re-install App</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For cases where customer is unable to create JazzCash account via JazzCash App and error occurs that <strong>CNIC is Blacklisted</strong> validate account existence in CPS and inform customer to visit MMBL</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For status where customer is unable to perform transaction via JazzCash App agent will validate customer concern and after validation agent will process complaint (Refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p><strong>OTP Issues </strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer is trying to login in JazzCash App and customer is not <strong>receiving OTP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent need to first confirm from the customer verbally to check handset SMS memory if it is full ask customer to delete old SMS so that customer can receive SMS from 8558</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ask customer to confirm his Screened numbers/Blacklist in case 8558 is added in any of the list that needs to be deleted immediately in order to get SMS from 8558</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SMS Storage available = Yes, 8558 number Blacklisted = No</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will process compliant as per incoming SMS from 8558 not received (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Incoming ISMS Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer is trying to login JazzCash App and receiving OTP but <strong>OTP does not fetch</strong></p>

<p><strong>Android user Checklist</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For android user&rsquo;s sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Needs to verify whether customer has given permissions for all operations to JazzCash app</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Device needs to be PTA approved</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After verifying the complete checklist, complaint will be locked in service now.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App needs to be updated to the latest version</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If all above checklist is fulfilled agent will proceed with complaint registration in service now (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p><strong>IOS User Checklist</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Sim has to be in slot 1 and same device.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; iPhone does not auto-fetch OTP while logging into JazzCash app.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Users will have to enter the OTP within 20 seconds.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After verifying the complete checklist complaint will be locked in service now.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; App needs to be updated to the latest version</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If all above checklist is fulfilled agent will proceed with complaint registration in service now (refer to JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; App related Issue &ndash; Complaint Management)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Please refer to Table 3.0 for high level understanding</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Account Migration â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related Merchant Account Migration.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account migration refers to the process of upgrading a merchant&#39;s account from one level to another, often involving an upgrade to a higher limit or more feature-rich account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are total of 3 levels of Merchant accounts.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; M0 Account</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; M1 Account</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; M2 account</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can migrate/upgrade their account from current level to above/next level account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once the account is successfully migrated, account level cannot reverse back to previous level.</p>

<p><strong>Account Migration &ndash; from M0 to M1</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; M0 account is a basis, non-BVS verified account (with minimal limits) which can be opened using JazzCash Business App.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant can migrate from M0 account to M1 account via JazzCash Business app using Unikrew BVS functionality (refer to Merchant Unikrew &ndash; SOP document).</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Through JazzCash Business App, merchant account will be migrated From M0 to M1 within 5 minutes.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are no charges on migrating account from M0 to M1.</p>

<p><strong>Account Migration &ndash; From M1 to M2</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For M2 Migration, merchant need to visit MMBL with supportive documents such as Original CNIC and CNIC Copy and Source of Income.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; There are no charges for migrating to M2 account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once M2 migration request is submitted, merchant account will be migrated within 3 working days.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Merchant cannot migrate account from M0 to M2 directly.</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk139326304"><strong>Merchant Account level &amp; Limit </strong></a></p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong>Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</strong></a></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status: Active</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Data to be taken from CPS only</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; L3 verification is must for all scenarios where agent is sharing information related to Merchant account</p>

<p><strong>System Navigation:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the merchant) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 17505

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer Account â€“ Account Closure - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenario related to JazzCash Account Closure.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For account closure request at helpline, agent will ask the reason of account closure to ensure better guidance to customer.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; If customer wants to open JazzCash account on other number, agent will offer the customer to use &ldquo;Change of MSISDN&rdquo; option available at any Jazz experience centre, franchise and BVS enabled retailers instead of closing the account.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; If customer wants to close JazzCash account due to change of sim ownership, agent will offer the customer to use &ldquo;Change of MSISDN&rdquo; option available at any Jazz experience centre, franchise and BVS enabled retailers instead of closing the account.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; If customer wants&nbsp;to close his/her JazzCash account without the intention of opening a new one, such as discontinuing the use of JazzCash services, then there is no need to guide the change of MSISDN option and agent will proceed the request for closure.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent must check account status (system navigation) before proceeding with account closure request. &nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status must be in Active, Pending Active or Dormant state.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For Suspended state due to CNIC expiry, refer to account activation process https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/15843 and guide customer to callback once account is activated</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For suspended account, Refer to <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17456" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17456</a> </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For frozen account, Refer to <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17456" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17456</a> </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Only original customer can request for account closure from helpline. Below type of customer is considered as original customer.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mobile Account Owner</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; SIM (CLI) Owner</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Guardian (In case of NextGen Account)&nbsp;</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account can be closed despite of balance amount.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If balance is zero, agent can proceed with account closure after checking remaining pre-requisites.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If the account balance is not zero, the agent must inquire how the customer intends to settle the balance and provide below options to customer:</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk144829122">1-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer him/herself </a>can use USSD/App or Cash out from a retailer and make account balance zero.</p>

<p>2-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If the balance is Rs. 100 or more, give the customer the option that JazzCash will transfer the balance to their CNIC. They can then withdraw the money from retailer/franchise using biometric. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</p>

<p>3-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If the balance is less than Rs. 100, offer the customer the option to close their account. In parallel, agent will explain that their remaining balance will be held by JazzCash, and they can claim it later if they want. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If the customer opts for account closure with a balance (Option 2 &amp; 3), agent will create an activity for account closure with balance in the BBCR tab of Service Now after following the pre-requisite checks (Table 1.0) and follow the account closure scenarios.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer wants to clear account balance themselves, guide customer to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and callback once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisa&rsquo;s than amount can only be transferred via JC app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask customer to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For NextGen (Minor Account), only guardian can request for account closure. Account request will not be entertained on Minor&rsquo;s request.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For successful account closure request at helpline, agent will check pre-requisites as mentioned in table 1.0 below:</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If these checks are cleared, agent will take account closure request as per scenarios 2.0.</p>

<p>&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:98%">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Account Closure &ndash; Pre-requisite Checks</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>Description</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account registration date is less than 60 days old</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account closure requires a minimum of 60 days from the registration date. Agent will inform registration date and ask customer to call back once 60 days are passed. If customer wants to close account immediately, agent will ask the customer to visit Franchise/Business Center.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Balance Validation</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>If the account balance is not zero, the agent must inquire how the customer intends to settle the balance and provide below options to customer:</p>

			<p>&sect;&nbsp; Customer him/herself can use USSD/App or Cash out from a retailer and make account balance zero.</p>

			<p>&sect;&nbsp; If the balance is Rs. 100 or more, give the customer the option that JazzCash will transfer the balance to their CNIC. They can then withdraw the money from retailer/franchise using biometric. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</p>

			<p>&sect;&nbsp; If the balance is less than Rs. 100, offer the customer the option to close their account. In parallel, agent will explain that their remaining balance will be held by JazzCash, and they can claim it later if they want. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>Use below work code if customer opt for option 1.</p>

			<p>Account Closure Process Info - Account Balance Not Zero</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Original Customer not Available</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Caller should be the original customer of account except if caller is the SIM owner and does not know the ownership of JazzCash account registered on calling number. In this case, request will be taken.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L3 not Verified</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Calling/original customer has to be verified as per information available in NADRA Portal. If respective information that needs to be verified is not available in NADRA Portal, customer will be considered as unverified. Additionally, route customer to NADRA Center to get respective details updated.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Unpaid Ready Cash Loan</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account will not be closed is there is any outstanding Ready Cash loan. Agent will check Ready cash portal and guide customer to call back for account closure after clearing the pending amount.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Balance &gt; 50000</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>In case calling customer does not know the account ownership but is the owner of calling SIM (CLI), and balance amount is greater than 50,000, route the customer to MMBL branch or Jazz Experience Center for account closure as amount greater than 50,000 cannot be transferred to CNIC.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>JazzCash Account Closure Deceased Person</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>For Account closure of a Deceased customer, Next of Kin will have to visit Jazz Experience Center, Franchise or MMBL branch with Death Certificate.</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

			<p>&sect;&nbsp; Account closure request will not be entertained if calling CLI is a PTCL number.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk136282136"><strong>Service Request</strong></a><strong> Scenarios</strong></p>

<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Pre-requisite to SOP</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification = L3</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account status = Active, Pending Active, Dormant</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account registration date &gt; 60 days</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can close his/her JazzCash account with balance in below scenarios:</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Customer can close his/her Jazzcash account with balance from same CLI.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Owners of Sims (CLIs) have the access to request the closure of any registered accounts on their sims.</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Mobile Account owner is calling from CLI other than mobile account number.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Caller = Original Customer (Mobile Account Owner/SIM Owner/Guardian in case of NextGen Account)</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No outstanding Ready Cash loan</p>

<p><a name="_Hlk135161069"><strong>System Navigation for Agent Action required/relevant in SOP: </strong></a></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status &gt;&gt; Active, Pending Active, Dormant</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (Normal Account):</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click KYC Info tab &gt;&gt; Check Personal Information</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (NextGen Account &ndash; Guardian Details):</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click KYC Info tab &gt;&gt; Check KIN Details &gt;&gt; Check Guardian Details</p>

<p><strong>Check Balance:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Account Info Tab &gt;&gt; Check Balance</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details.</p>

<p><strong>Create Account Closure Task in CPS - </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Info <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> View Customer Info &gt;&gt; View Basic Info &gt;&gt; Select edit button in front of Identity Status <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Pop Up Menu appears. Select &ldquo;closed&rdquo; in New Identity Status Option &gt;&gt; Enter Service Now ID in Remarks &gt;&gt; Click Submit to complete Task.</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ QR/Till ID Cashback Campaigns â€“ T&C 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This sop document will cover scenario related to QR/Till ID cashback T&amp;C.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can pay via JazzCash QR/Till ID to avail Realtime Cashback. If cashback is not received in Realtime then cashback will be deposited in customer account within approx. 24 hours after the eligible transaction is conducted.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Every month Cashback communication will be roll out</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Cashback Discount (%):</strong> Will Share in Campaign&rsquo;s KMS Communication.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Maximum Cashback (PKR):</strong> Will Share in Campaign&rsquo;s KMS Communication.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Minimum Amount Spent for Cashback (PKR):</strong> Will share in Campaign&rsquo;s KMS Communication.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <strong>Timeline:</strong> Will Share in Campaign&rsquo;s KMS Communication.</p>

<p><strong>Terms and Conditions:</strong></p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash has the right to finalize all eligible customers who have conducted the required action as per the campaign offer.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The discounts cannot be combined with group discounts, parties, special events or any other offers.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These JazzCash QR/Till ID Campaign Terms and Conditions (the &ldquo;Terms and Conditions&rdquo;) shall apply to all eligible customers participating in the campaign, and the eligible customer hereby consent to these Terms and Conditions through any such participation in the campaign.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Type of transactions will depend on the campaign mechanisms. The mechanisms for cashback campaign are:</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The customer must conduct their payment transaction through <strong>JazzCash QR/Till ID</strong>.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One customer can avail the total cashback amount (E.g.: Rs.200/Rs.250/Rs.2500) either via a single transaction or multiple transactions, at that specific Merchant during the campaign.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once the total cashback exceeds the limit (per customer), no more discounts shall be applicable to that customer, at that specific Merchant during the campaign.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The customer will only be eligible to receive a set percentage of their total invoice as the cashback (e.g.: 20% or 25%). A customer can receive only the set Maximum cashback amount (e.g.: Rs.200/Rs.250/Rs.2500) during the campaign.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A customer&rsquo;s cashback limit will be exhausted once the total maximum cashback has been rewarded.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can pay via JazzCash QR/Till ID to avail Realtime Cashback. If cashback is not received in Realtime then cashback will be deposited in customer account within approx. 24 hours after the eligible transaction is conducted.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account transactional limits apply.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash/MMBL reserves its absolute right to withdraw or alter any terms and conditions of the offer/campaign at any time without prior notice.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Campaign is applicable to eligible JazzCash Customer accounts only.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Campaign is not applicable for JazzCash merchant accounts.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Eligible Customers must not share any PIN code, passcode, passwords, etc. with anyone.</p>

<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; To qualify for cashback through QR/Till ID, customers must meet a minimum spending requirement, as specified in each campaign&#39;s KMS broadcast as the &#39;Minimum Spend&#39;.</p>

Submission Channel: 34
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer/Merchant â€“ Call Handling â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This sop document will cover scenarios related to Call Handling.</li>
	<li>There are 4 levels of verification</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Verification Level</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Check List</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>High Level Understanding</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Level 1</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Same Cli</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Same Cli (G2P Payment), Outages/Known Issue</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Level 2</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Same Cli + Customer Name</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Where agent is sharing complaint status/reopening of complaint</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Level 2.5</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Name</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date of Birth</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mother Name (if Mother name is missing in CPS, Agent will verify customer as per NADRA Portal, if mother name is missing in both CPS and Nadra then agent will verify customer as per Place of Birth)</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Additional check (voice discrimination)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Level 2.5 verification is mandatory in cases where agents are sharing details such as.</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; General product information (Where agents is confirming details from portal)</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer&rsquo;s eligibility of Product</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer Complaint Management/Service Request</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Transaction Status (Before guiding the details of status agent must go through the details mentioned below in Level 2.5 heading)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center">Level 3</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Same CLI (Calling Number = JC Account Number),</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Name</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC, Date of Birth</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mother Name (if Mother name is missing in CPS, Agent will verify customer as per NADRA Portal, if mother name is missing in both CPS and Nadra then agent will verify customer as per Place of Birth)</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Additional check (voice discrimination)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Level 3 verification is mandatory in cases where agents are sharing details such as</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Balance Information</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Transaction History</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MPIN Reset</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM PIN Reset and Card Status Change</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Account Status (except Complaint Calls</p>

			<p>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fraud Calls (Where MPIN Reset Required)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>Table 2.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:599px">
	<tbody>

			</td>

			<p>As per scenarios</p>

</table>

<p><strong>Level 1</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For TID/SMS Resend in G2P Payments</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Known Issue/Outage:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If a customer calls from the same CLI, then agent will inform the outage details without taking L3 verification after verifying the transaction details and validating the details that transaction is in outage</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Level 2</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will take verification level 2 for complaint status and reopening of complaint where customer is calling form same account number.</li>
	<li>If customer is calling from other Cli and previously complaint was lodged, agent will take verification 2.5 for guiding complaint status or reopening of complaint</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Level 2.5</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;Level 2.5 verification is mandatory in cases where agents are sharing details such as.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Fraud calls: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will forward complaint in fraud calls if customer is calling from other cli but will not reset MPIN and will just inform customer the MPIN self-service.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>General Account Information: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>There is no need for any verification where agent is sharing any product information such as What is product, How to Process (i.e., how to perform IBFT, Jazz load etc.).</li>
	<li>L 2.5 is mandatory for providing information related to account (where system consultation is required i.e. Ready Cash loan eligibility, incentive posting details etc.).</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Complaint/Service Request: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will take verification as per Level 2.5 where registering complaint/service request. If customer is calling from other cli and complaints while registering complaint in service now agent will mention the calling number in Calling Cli LOV.</li>
	<li>If customer is calling from other Cli and previously complaint was lodged, agent will take verification 2.5 for guiding complaint status or reopening of complaint.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Transaction Status</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>If a customer calls from a different phone number and wants to check a transaction, the agent will ask for the transaction date, time, amount and take (2.5) verification. The agent will then share the transaction status (i.e. Expired/declined/cancelled and reserve) but won&#39;t disclose the account balance.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If customer wants more details such as beneficiary account number agent can ask customer about beneficiary number and can confirm with &quot;Yes&quot; or &quot;No&quot; response.</li>
	<li>If the customer needs more details, like the sender&#39;s phone number, Name etc. the agent will guide the self- process/account statement process. If customer insists to get information from helpline, politely guide customer to call from same cli.</li>
	<li>Standard statement: Considering your account security, we cannot disclose your balance and any performed transaction details if you are calling from unregistered number. Please call from your registered number (JazzCash account number).</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Account Balance</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>When a customer contacts from a different CLI and inquire about their account balance, the agent will merely affirm with a &quot;Yes&quot; or &quot;No&quot; response; if the customer asks to confirm that their balance is &quot;123,&quot; the agent will not offer the precise balance figure information. And explain the self-service procedure, asking the customer to call from the same Cli for further information</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Known Issue/Outage:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If the customer is calling from a different CLI, there is no need to ask them to call from the same CLI, agent will inform the outage details after taking Level 2.5 verification (excluding same CLI) and verifying the transaction details and validating the details that transaction is in outage.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Level 3</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Level 3 verification is mandatory in cases where agents are sharing details such as</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Balance information</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will not share the exact balance without Level 3 verification but agent can confirm the account balance in Yes or No after verifying customer as per Level 2.5</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Transaction History sharing transaction details: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will only share transaction details such as (Transaction Date, time, amount, Beneficiary Account number etc.) after verifying customer as per Level 3</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>MPIN reset of Account:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Level 3 verification is mandatory while Resetting MPIN of Account?</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>MPIN reset and status change of Card?:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Level 3 verification is mandatory while Resetting Card PIN and status change of card</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Account Status (except complaint calls):</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will share account status by verifying customer as per Level 3.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Fraud calls: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Level 3 verification will be mandatory where agent is resetting MPIN of JazzCash Account while registering Fraud Complaint</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Masked CLI: </strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In receiving calls over 4444 helpline which are being generated through some Web-application/VOIP their appearance on the soft phone/hard phone will be other than normal display. PFB some examples:
	<ul>
		<li>MSISDN starting with 92 e.g. 9203028279780 0r 923028279780</li>
		<li>MSISDN starting with City Code like 02103028279780 or 213028279780</li>
		<li>Any short code</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For any kind of JazzCash related call, we need to guide customer to call from his/her Own MSISDN on which he owns JazzCash Account. If customer is on IR and says he/she is calling from abroad, it is suggested to guide customer to email at Jazz customer care with request and scan copy of CNIC front/back</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation </strong></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (Normal Account):</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click KYC Info tab &gt;&gt; Check Personal Information</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenario related to Mandatory Verification</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif"><span style="color:#333333">Please be informed that, in order to better serve our customers, we are revising the verification process for JazzCash customers. Agents will now verify the following information from customers:</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif"><span style="color:#333333">From Same CLI:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Name</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Mother&rsquo;s Name</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">CNIC&nbsp;(If customer is unable to provide the CNIC number then agent will procced customer request or complaint)</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif"><span style="color:#333333">From Different CLI:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Name</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">CNIC</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Mother&rsquo;s Name</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Date of Birth</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">If the mother&rsquo;s name is not available in either the NADRA or CPS portals, the agent will confirm the place of birth. If the place of birth is also not available in CPS, the agent will proceed with the customer&#39;s request or complaint.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">CNIC</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Amount of the problematic transaction.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif"><span style="color:#333333">If a complaint is made for a different CLI, the agent will verify only the following:</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Georgia&quot;,serif">Amount of the problematic transaction.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Dormant To Active
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A JazzCash account is marked dormant after 365 days of inactivity, restricting outgoing transactions while allowing incoming funds. Customers must reactivate the account to resume full functionality.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Dormant account holders can reactivate their accounts by visiting a JazzCash retailer, franchise, experience center, or using the JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Accounts can be reactivated in real time via BVS at authorized locations or within 2 days through the helpline. App-based reactivation via Unikrew takes 5 minutes</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp; &nbsp; This sop document will cover scenarios related to Customer Account Dormant</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash account will be marked Dormant if account is not used in previous 180 Days.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When a JazzCash account is marked dormant customer will not be able to use account for transferring fund. However, funds can be received but not sent from dormant account.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For proper account usage, customer needs to activate account.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case that the account is dormant, the agent will provide the customer the options below and handle his request accordingly:</li>
</ul>

<ol>
	<li>Guide the customer that JazzCash account can be activated from helpline within 4 working hours.</li>
	<li>Inform the customer that dormant account will be activated in real time from retailer, franchise and experience Centre through BVS.</li>
	<li>Inform the customer that account can be activated from JazzCash App through in app BVS (Unikrew). It will take 5 minutes to activate</li>
</ol>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If customer Opts the option 1 then (Adhere the below dormant to active service request scenario) and offer the self-process for future.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer Opts account activation via BVS customer need to visit retailer, franchise and experience Centre along with sim on which account is present.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Inform customer the relevant retailers, Franchise and experience center location check process and also send relevant ISMS.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer OPT for (option 3) then activate account from JazzCash App through Unikrew. Refer to JazzCash Unikrew Process.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer requires MPIN Reset inform customer, the how to reset MPIN process along with sending relevant isms.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; After activating account successfully customer can reset his MPIN via self-process.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer account is dormant and CNIC is expired, then agent will ask customer whether he updated his CNIC or not if customer updated CNIC expiry agent will inform customer the complete process of account activation</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Agent will validate NADRA portal to confirm CNIC Updation before taking request from helpline for activation</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refer to Table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>System Navigation: </strong></p>

<p>This section will cover step by step navigation of relevant system for required action by. E.g.</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status &gt;&gt; Dormant</p>

<p><strong>Check Account Ownership (Normal Account):</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click KYC Info tab &gt;&gt; Check Personal Information</p>

<p><strong>Check Balance:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Account Info Tab &gt;&gt; Check Balance</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details.</p>

<p><strong>Create Dormant to Active Task in CPS - </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Info &gt;&gt; Click Create Task &gt;&gt; Account closure task &gt;&gt; enter Service Now Request ID in reason &gt;&gt; Pop Up Menu appears. Select &ldquo;Active&rdquo; &gt;&gt; Submit Task</p>
