ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Book Me â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Book Me</li>
	<li>Book Me is&nbsp;Pakistan&#39;s first online ticket booking portal that supports major transport services, cinemas, hotels</li>
	<li>In JazzCash app, Book Me widget has been added in Travel Category. User can select the Book Me icon and app will redirect user to Book Me page to get below mentioned services.
	<ul>
		<li>Bus Tickets Info/Refund &ndash; Book Me Widget</li>
		<li>Railway Tickets Refund &ndash; Book Me Widget</li>
		<li>Flight Tickets &ndash; Book Me Widget</li>
		<li>Events Tickets Booking Info</li>
		<li>Movie Tickets Booking Info</li>
		<li>Car Rental Booking Info</li>
		<li>Tours Booking Info</li>
		<li>&nbsp;Hotels Booking Info</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For cases where customer is complaining against Book Me regarding any issue agent will inform customer to call on Book Me Helpline or email at <a href="mailto:contact@bookme.pk">contact@bookme.pk</a></li>
	<li>For cases where customer is amount is deducted twice agent will route customer Book Me.</li>
	<li>Cases where Railway Ticket is purchased via Book Me then agent will route customer to Book Me in case of complaint</li>
	<li>If Railway Ticket is not purchased via Book Me then handle Call as per JazzCash &ndash; Customer &ndash; Railway Payment SOP/Complaint Management.</li>
	<li>No complaints will be registered through JazzCash regarding any issue of Book Me just route customer to Book Me platform</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Refunds would be confirmed through Book Me in booking history option where user can initiate the refund process for refund.</li>
	<li>Railway tickets would have the following refund policy in software within 24 hours 30% deduction, within 48 hours 20% deduction, and 48-hour to above 10% deduction</li>
	<li>No refund or cancellation is available on Movie Tickets</li>
	<li>No refund or cancellation is available on Event Tickets</li>
	<li>If customer uses any of the above-mentioned services and have complaint regarding it, please guide customer to contact Book Me support at 042-111-266563 or email at <a href="mailto:contact@bookme.pk">contact@bookme.pk</a></li>
	<li>JazzCash is only the payment mode, generation of tickets/services are managed at Book Me</li>
	<li>Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</li>
</ul>

<p>Table 1.0</p>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>&nbsp;Book Me Integration</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Values</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Channel</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>USSD, App</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Customer Profile</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Jazz, OMNO</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Account Level</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>L0, L1, L2, ADA</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (USSD)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform fee</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Platform Fee (App)</p>
			</td>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Women Health Insurance for Debit Card Holder â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenario related to Women Health Insurance for Debit Card Holder.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The insurance is offered by ordering Women Mastercard Debit card and there are no charges for this specific insurance.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The insurance is only for Women specific which will cover<strong> </strong>MMC covering female cancer, Osteoporosis, Rheumatoid, Arthritis.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This policy is being offered by JazzCash in partnership with WebDoc.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Yearly Policy covers below benefits:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width:504px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Coverage Detail</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>Charges &amp; Benefit</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Maximum Limit MMC</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Rs. 50,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>C &ndash; Section Maternity</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Rs. 25,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Accumulated Cover</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Rs. 75,000</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Features</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This Insurance will cover below features
	<ul>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Women specific cover between the age 18-59 for MMC only.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Women specific cover between the age 18-42 for maternity C -section only</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Pre-existing conditions are not covered for last 3 months.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cover provided of 1 year.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Admission for more than 24 hours will be treated as IPD. MMC terms apply.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All other general health terms and conditions apply.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&nbsp;Exclusions</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Payment of claims is subject to exclusions, as outlined below. Health Insurance Cover shall not cover.
	<ul>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any Pre-existing conditions. Pre-existing is defined here as any diagnostics previously found before the date of the policy including waiting period.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any Dental procedures</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OPD &ndash; Any admission less than 24 hours and no overnight stay is considered as OPD and day care.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Day care surgeries</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cosmetic or any surgical procedures</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Regular medications such as Insulin etc.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any Special Investigations which are not due to the admission.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; War, strikes, riots, civil commotion and any natural or man-made perils (including chemical, nuclear, biological, and radiological) that results in the declaration of a state of emergency on a local or national level.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&nbsp;Claim Info</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Company shall be notified of the occurrence of Insured Claim as soon as possible, but not later than 30 (Thirty days) from the date of discharge from hospital, which it shall be treated as time barred and the Company shall not be bound to pay the Claim.
	<ul>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For each Claim reported, the Company shall obtain:</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Admission slips of hospital.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Discharge slip of hospital.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any bills to be claimed.</li>
		<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; CNIC both sides.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers can share required documents through WhatsApp at the provided phone number: 0309-3331610</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Women Health Insurance for Debit Card Holder &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</li>
	<li>Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against Women Health Insurance for Debit Card Holder.</li>
	<li>Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</li>
	<li>Customer want to talk with WebDoc Insurance agent.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to <strong>VDN </strong><strong>6467</strong></p>

	<li>Refer to table 1.0 for high level understanding</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Women Mastercard Debit Card â€“ SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Women Mastercard Debit Card.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The customers will be able to order another debit card variant (Women Mastercard Debit Card) from the application.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Any women having a valid JazzCash account is eligible for women debit card</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can order Women Mastercard debit from <strong>JazzCash App</strong>.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customers will receive within 15 working days after successful order.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mastercard debit card ordering charges are Rs.999</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Women Mastercard debit card annual charges are Rs.99</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer order one Women Mastercard and that specific card is in process Customer will not able to place another order in 20 working days of your first order. Or in case your first order was rejected, you will be able to place another order immediately after order rejection</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Once your card is dispatched to your provided address, customer will receive an order tracking ID through which you will be able to track your order.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customers already have a virtual card and if she orders Women Mastercard debit card then virtual card will be delinked from JazzCash Account customer will not be able to use Virtual card.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer already have a Women Mastercard debit card, she will not be able to order virtual card.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can have one card either Mastercard Debit Card or Mastercard Women Card at a time.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer already Mastercard debit card and customer orders Women Mastercard debit card, she will not be able to use her Mastercard debit card and that Mastercard debit card will be delinked from JazzCash Account.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MasterCard allow users to make payments and withdraw cash from ATMs</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It is connected to the JazzCash mobile wallet for easy funds management</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; It provides a convenient and secure way to manage finances and make electronic transactions.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JazzCash Woman Mastercard debit card is auto enabled for all online/E-commerce payments within Pakistan (domestic platforms)</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Women Mastercard debit card cannot be used internationally.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer can have either Mastercard Debit Card or Mastercard Women Card at a time. Proceeding to order Mastercard Debit Card will result in delinking of your current Women Debit card.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If customer card is not delivered and returned from courier, customer will have to call for redispatch again.</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; In case customer did not call the helpline for card redispatch, then card will be discarded after 60 days from date of 1st return and fee will not be refunded</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Daily Withdrawal and shopping limit are Rs.50,000 (no charges on shopping)</li>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ATM withdrawal charges are:</li>
</ul>

<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p>Only Women with active JazzCash account can order Women debit card</p>

<ul>
	<li>&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Verification: As per scenario <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17521">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/17521</a></li>

<p><strong>System Navigation</strong></p>

<p><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</p>

<p><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</p>

<p><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Salaam Saving â€“ SOP

Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Salaam Savings is a Takaful-based savings plan offered in partnership with Salaam Family Takaful Ltd where you can earn profits on your savings as per the different saving plans</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To subscribe to the Salaam Savings Plan via JazzCash App, users are required to define a specific savings goal</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash customers can choose from at least 6 saving plans via JazzCash App ranging from 5,00 to over 50,000 or more, offering an annual profit rate between 2% and 12% respectively</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This sop document will cover scenarios related to <strong><u>Salaam Savings</u></strong></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Salaam Saving was previously called <strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">SNPL (Islamic Saving).</span></strong> </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Salaam Savings</u></strong> is offered with partnership of Salaam Family Takaful Ltd.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Salaam Family Takaful is responsible for paying profit returns &amp; honoring claims. JazzCash remains the service provider to the extent expressed in these terms and conditions.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This product is a <strong><u>Takaful product</u></strong>, whereby the customers will be <strong><u>contributing </u></strong>funds from their JazzCash Wallet and into their Savings and protection plan.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The profits will be calculated on the balance contribution amount and visible to the customer daily. First plan starts at PKR 500</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To subscribe to the Salaam Savings Plan, users are required to define a specific savings goal. These goals include:</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Umrah/Hajj</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Wedding</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mobile</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">House</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Car</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Following are the Savings Plan to be offered to the customer:</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers have the freedom to withdraw funds into the JazzCash Wallet at any given moment, without any deduction on principal amount</span></span></span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">Min age at entry&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 18 years (Attained)</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">Max age at entry&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 59 years (Attained)</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">Max age at expiry 60 years (Attained)</span></span></span></span></span></span><br />
		&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt">Upon creating the goal, the customer is automatically eligible for accidental hospitalization takaful coverage.</span> </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To get life Takaful coverage, you need to keep 20% of your goal money in your Savings</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If you close your goal before finishing it, the insurance stops right away.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Insurance also stops if you finish and close your goal.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If you keep 20% but don&#39;t finish your goal on time, insurance stops when the time is up.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The plan has two parts: investing and insurance for death and hospitalization.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">SFTL gives insurance money up to PKR 5,000,000 if you die, based on the difference between your goal and investment.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For accident hospitalization, SFTL reimburses PKR 10,000.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">SNPL Information &ndash; Call Routed to Vendor</span></span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer wants to know what makes the product Shariat Compliant</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer want to know the profit posted details.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer wants to know about status of his/her goal.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer want to talk with Salaam Takaful agent.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer want to know about the insurance.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer wanted to claim insurance.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For all above scenario&rsquo;s agent will route call to 6033 VDN.</span></span></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">To check Account Status:</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Review Transaction&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">Check Amount against Receiver CNIC</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; My Functions &gt;&gt; Operations &gt;&gt; G2P/P2P Payment Management &gt;&gt; search Receiver CNIC</span></span></span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">You can also share your personal data easily.</span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can also select the auto monthly subscription option in which every month amount will be deducted automatically.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can only buy self-subscription via JazzCash App. </span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Account Status:</strong> CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 17639

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ JazzCash Khata 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to JazzCash Khata</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The scope of this system is to use khata system digitally within JazzCash App</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">There are two types of JazzCash Khata in JazzCash App</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Shared Khata</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Private Khata &nbsp;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Shared Khata:</strong> Both the participants can add and edit entries to the khata, if both are JazzCash Users</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Private Khata:</strong> Only you can add and edit the entries of the khata and the other person if JazzCash User, can just view the entries.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A private khata can be converted to a shared one but once a shared khata is created it cannot be converted to a private one.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can open a khata with anyone, but the other person will only be able to view or add entries if they are JazzCash users. Also, you can make real transactions on the go with JazzCash users.<a name="_Hlk139326304"></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can open up to 4 Khata&rsquo;s in total, they can be opened with anybody, be it an individual or a business. However, you can add unlimited entries within those Khata&rsquo;s.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A User can initiate 4 khatas in total, but they can have more than 4 khatas if the khata is being initiated by someone else, they can be opened with anybody, be it an individual or a business. However, you can add unlimited entries within those Khata&rsquo;s.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any entry to khata will have an additional mandatory field to enter description. The length of notes can be 160 characters.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">You can only edit or delete the entries added by you, you can delete an entry added by you.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a merchant has added a khata with the customer but the customer deletes the Khata from their app, then only the customer app will not show the entries anymore. In addition, the customer will stop receiving any notification for new entries.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a merchant has added a Khata with a customer and the merchant deletes the khata with their customer, then only the merchant app will not show the entries anymore. In addition, the merchant will stop receiving any notification for new entries.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Get your khata statement by opening the khata, clicking the PDF icon, and it will be instantly emailed to your registered or specified email address.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">We prioritize the security and privacy of your financial information. Only you can decide who you want to share your khata with and even if you want the other person to edit the khata or just view it</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong><span style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></span></strong></a></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per Scenario</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Price Oye 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Price Oye.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Price Oye is marketplace for buying original mobile phones and various electronics products. Price Oye is Pakistan&#39;s most trusted online store.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can now purchase electronic product from Price Oye via JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will click Price Oye Icon in JazzCash App where customer will be directed to Price Oye Main Page.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Price Oye icon will be added under Entertainment &amp; Online Purchases.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can buy different types of products from Price Oye. Following are the product list.</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mobile Phone </span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Smartwatch </span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tablet </span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Laptop</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Power Banks</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Wireless Earphones</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can track his order by clicking Track My Order in Price Oye interface.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Once the order has been placed, you cannot change the delivery address. You have to cancel the order and re-order the product with the correct address. The already made payments will be refunded to you.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">You can cancel your order by calling Price Oye directly on our helpline at 051-111 693 693.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If any issue is present in order and customer want to request for refund/replacement it can take 5 to 7 working days for a refund or replacement</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Charges:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will be charged Rs. 300 for every order</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Table 1.0</span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" class="MsoTableGrid" style="border-collapse:collapse; border:none">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:black; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:31px; vertical-align:top; width:187px">
			<p><span style="color:#ffffff"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Price Oye Transaction</strong></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:black; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:31px; vertical-align:top; width:358px">

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Payment Via Mobile NFC (Tap Pay) â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Jazzcash customers can use their account as a virtual debit card on POS machines anywhere in Pakistan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can avail Tap Pay services on Android devices (version 6+) that meet the required conditions: NFC-enabled, device lock set, and JazzCash Popup feature enabled.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can activate Tap Pay in the JazzCash app, agree to terms and conditions, and make payments by tapping their phone on an NFC-enabled POS terminal, with a transaction limit of Rs. 50,000 per day.</span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>
	<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Payment via mobile NFC (Tap Pay).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap Pay via NFC allows customers to make payments using their mobile phones.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Customers will not need to carry their physical debit cards, in fact customer&rsquo;s smart phones will become their debit cards</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The handset must be NFC enabled. This service is only available on android handsets. Tap pay is only available on android smart phones (Version 6+).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap Pay can be activated by any JazzCash account holder, even if they do not have a physical debit card.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Daily transaction limit via Tap Pay is Rs. 50,000</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">There are three pre-requisites to avail these services</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device must Android NFC enabled </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Device Lock must be set</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">JazzCash Popup feature must be enabled </span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Above three pre-requisites will be shown in JazzCash App if any of these is not enabled by customer they will be shown with it.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer has not set Device security Lock he will click on it and will be redirected to device setting for enabling.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer device is not supporting NFC customer will receive a prompt error and customer will not able to use this service.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can use this service by clicking on Contactless Icon in JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will click on &ldquo;<strong>set-up Tap Pay&rdquo; </strong>terms &amp; condition will appear, customer will click on I agree (Refer to How to Scenario 2.1)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will be charged PKR 01&nbsp;one time only. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">As per CPS transaction will be shown as POS transaction.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent will ask customer whether he perform transaction through MasterCard or by using mobile phone.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This screen will also show a card image, that will have the last 4 digits of the user&rsquo;s VCN card number and a Mastercard logo along with JazzCash logo.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can view last 10 transaction in transaction history. These will be NFC based transaction history.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will click on Contactless Icon in JazzCash App the screen will show a card image, customer will just tap this screen on POS device and amount will be deducted and customer will receive a confirmation SMS. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will tap pay, a prompt will receive to enter screen lock authentication.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Table 1.0</span></span></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="color:#ffffff"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Payment via NFC (Tap Pay)</strong></span></span></span></p>

		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:17px; vertical-align:top; width:187px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Platform Fee (USSD)</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:17px; vertical-align:top; width:358px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">KMS &gt;&gt; Communication Tab &gt;&gt; USSD Platform fee</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per Scenario</span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Tap On Phone 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The sop document will cover scenario related to Tap on Phone.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap on Phone is the feature where merchants can accept payment from any Visa/Mastercard card by simply tapping it on the back of smartphone.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Smartphone must be NFC enable</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Tap on Phone is certified by Mastercard and Visa, ensuring customer details, including PIN, are secure. Neither Merchant nor JazzCash can access the customer&rsquo;s sensitive details.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants must subscribe to this service by paying a monthly subscription fee. Initially at launch it will be only Rs 1.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Initial registration process can take up to 20 seconds during which the merchant must keep the merchant app open to complete the process.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After 30 days the subscription will expire, and merchant will be required to subscribe again.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Funds from Tap on Phone transactions settle in real-time to merchants&#39; accounts, providing quick access to their earnings.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Upon entering amount, the customer can tap any contactless card/device on the backside of device to accept payment. However, PIN of customer is mandatory for all payments</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants need an Android smartphone with NFC and Android version 8 or higher. Additionally, merchants must have an active monthly subscription to the service.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To refund a card payment, the merchant must select the transaction they want to refund and follow the instructions on the screen. The customer&#39;s card needs to be tapped on the device again. Once successfully processed, the refund can take up to 14 working days for the customer to receive funds in their account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant will be charged 2.32% of every transaction received via Tap on Phone.<a name="_Hlk139326304"></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant calls on helpline that amount is sent from bank but not received in JazzCash business account inform merchant to inform sender to register complaint at Sender Bank.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ JazzCash Khata â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to JazzCash Khata</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The scope of this system is to use khata system digitally within JazzCash Business App</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">There are two types of JazzCash Khata in JazzCash Business App</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Shared Khata</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Private Khata &nbsp;</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Shared Khata:</strong> Both the participants can add and edit entries to the khata, if both are JazzCash Users</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Private Khata:</strong> Only you can add and edit the entries of the khata and the other person if JazzCash User, can just view the entries.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A private khata can be converted to a shared one but once a shared khata is created it cannot be converted to a private one.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant can open a khata with anyone, but the other person will only be able to view or add entries if they are JazzCash users. Also, you can make real transactions on the go with JazzCash users.<a name="_Hlk139326304"></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant can open up to 4 Khata&rsquo;s in total, they can be opened with anybody, be it an individual or a business. However, you can add unlimited entries within those Khata&rsquo;s.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any entry to khata will have an additional optional field to enter notes. The length of notes can be 160 characters.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">You can only edit or delete the entries added by you, you can delete an entry added by you.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a merchant has added a customer but the customer deletes the merchant, then only the customer app will not show the entries anymore. In addition, the customer will stop receiving any notification for new entries.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a merchant has added a customer but the customer deletes the merchant, then only the customer app will not show the entries anymore. In addition, the customer will stop receiving any notification for new entries</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Get your khata statement by opening the khata, clicking the PDF icon, and it will be instantly emailed to your registered or specified email address.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">We prioritize the security and privacy of your financial information. Only you can decide who you want to share your khata with and even if you want the other person to edit the khata or just view it</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136426114">Table 1.0</a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">How &ndash; To Scenarios </span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk136204593"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></span></strong></a></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per Scenario</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal</strong>: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date </span></span><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">(Verify </span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JAZZCASH â€“ CUSTOMER â€“ FREELANCER DIGITAL ACCOUNT 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Freelancer Digital Account (FDA) allows L1/ADA JazzCash account holders to upgrade for higher transaction limits (Daily 750,000, Monthly 1,400,000, Yearly 16,800,000) and enhanced services as per SBP regulations.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only BVS-verified L1/ADA JazzCash customers with matching SIM ownership are eligible. Minor accounts and users outside Pakistan are not eligible.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can upgrade through the JazzCash App for Rs. 100 (non-refundable), with the process completing within 48 hours. Biometric verification must be completed via the app to ensure account functionality.</span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp;</span></u></strong></span></span></p>
	<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related Freelancer Digital Account (FDA).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Freelancer Digital Account is a State Bank&rsquo;s initiative where customers upgrade their L1/ADA account to Freelancer Digital Account which has higher limits.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">FDA is applicable only to customers who are biometrically verified L1 account holders.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">After successful migration to Freelancer Digital Account, customer cannot reverse back to L1/ADA account level.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Upgradation charges: PKR 100 (non-refundable).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Freelancer Digital Account can be upgraded to L2 account (Refer to Account Migration SOP).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;<strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#444444">Eligibility Criteria</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Type:</span></strong> Only L1 and ADA profiles are eligible for upgrade to FDA.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Biometric Verification:</span></strong> The customer must be biometrically verified.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership:</span></strong> The SIM used must be registered under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location:</span></strong> Must be enabled during the upgrade process to ensure the user is within Pakistan.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#444444">&nbsp;Account Upgradation</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgrade Options:</span></strong> L1 account holders can upgrade directly to ADA or FDA.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Non-Restriction on Freelancers:</span></strong> Any user with an L1 or ADA profile can upgrade to FDA, not just freelancers.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgrade Via App: Customers can upgrade their L1/ADA JazzCash account to a Freelancer Digital Account through the JazzCash App.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgradation Charges: The upgrade to Freelancer Digital Account incurs a charge of Rs 100, which is non-refundable.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location Requirement: Geo-location must be enabled by the user, as per SBP requirements, ensuring that users outside Pakistan cannot upgrade their accounts.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership: For both Jazz and OMNO users, SIM ownership must be under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Mismatch: If a user&#39;s request is rejected due to a SIM mismatch, the Rs 100 charge will not be refunded.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Migration Time: The migration to a Freelancer Digital Account will be completed within 2 working days after the request is submitted.</span></strong></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#444444">Freelancer Digital Account Limits</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Transaction Limits</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">:</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

			</td>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Yearly Debit/Credit</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">16,800,000</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">C2C Transaction Counters</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">:</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">A maximum of 5 debit and 5 credit transactions per day.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">No weekly, monthly, or yearly transaction counters.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Information Required for FDA Upgradation</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Following Personal information is required in App for Freelancer Digital Account Upgradation;</span></span></span></span></span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Full Name (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it)</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Father/Spouse/Guardian Name</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Gender (Select gender).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Contact Number (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">CNIC Expiry Date</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Email Address (will be auto populated if already provided by user at L1 account customer).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Occupation (Auto filled as Freelancer).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Purpose of Account (from drop down list. Sample salary/Saving/Remittance/Other).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Source of Income (Auto filled as Freelancing).</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Following Professional Information is required in App for Freelancer Digital Account Upgradation.</span></span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Are you a Tax resident of USA? 		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Are you a Tax resident other than USA? <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
