ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash - Customer - PRC Generation Request
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This process will cover all the information related to PRC (Proceed Realization Certificate).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A Proceed Realization Certificate (PRC) is an official document that confirms the receipt of funds from international remittances. It is typically required by customers to verify the successful receipt of foreign funds in their local bank accounts. The PRC serves various purposes, such as tax filings, regulatory compliance, and providing proof of funds for personal or business transactions.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If Customer is unable to provide the required verifications\details due any reason. Agent will guide the customer to request PRC generation by emailing the Home Remittance team at <a href="http://Home.Remittance@mobilinkbank.com" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">Home.Remittance@mobilinkbank.com</a>.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>CHARGES FOR PRC ISSUANCE:</strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Table 1.</strong><strong>0</strong></span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:486px">

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to view complaint status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Complaint remarks:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Konnect &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Account Number Tab (without zero 3xxxxxxxxxx) &gt;&gt; Click History Tab &gt;&gt; Click on Ticket to review complaint remarks</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Service Request Scenarios</span></span></span></strong><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: </span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="background:white; border-collapse:collapse; width:586px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:white; vertical-align:top">

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenario related to EFU Term Life Plus Insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">EFU Term Life Plus Insurance is being offered to JazzCash consumers in collaboration with EFU.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please be informed that previously EFU Term Life Insurance was known as Term Takaful Insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Previously where customer subscribe insurance (Term Takaful) and was charged Rs. 1600 below are the Benefits In Table.</span></span></li>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer subscribe insurance before 2<sup>nd </sup>September and customer is charged Rs. 1,600 annually as insurance is auto renewal now customer will be charged Rs. 2,000 instead of 1,600 on next renewal </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For insurance subscriptions from September 2nd onwards, no reversals will be processed for any plan, including Annual, Monthly, and Daily.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Where customer is complaining regarding Mis Selling, agent will inform customer that after giving digital consent you have subscribe the insurance. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If still customer insists that wrong information is provided by caller agent will ask the information/benefits which are provided to customer. After validating customer concern if agent found issue valid agent will lodge complaint and will mention complete issue of mis selling in complaint remarks</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Outbound calls to be made to potential customer</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Outbound sales calls will be made to potential customers from&nbsp;021-111-124-444.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer can also subscribe insurance via JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In JazzCash App customer can subscribe Yearly, Monthly and Daily.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Below are the plan details. </span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Insurance Benefits</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Enrollment age:</strong>&nbsp; 18 years to 59 years; cover terminates when a participant attains 60<sup>th </sup>Birthday</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Coverage age:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp; 18 to 60 years</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This plan provides a lump sum payout in case of an insured person&#39;s Natural Death.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This unique proposition provides living and death benefits to the Insured member with a bundle of Accidental Medical Reimbursement and 2x times the benefit in case of an Accidental Death.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Exclusion</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case of death due to murder, suicide, self-inflicted Injury, participation in a criminal act, or violation of the law</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any pre-existing conditions contracted due to accident or bodily Injury before the commencement of cover under this policy</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>&nbsp;Claim Document:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Copy of death certificate issued by NADRA / Union Council</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Copy of CNIC of claimant and deceased</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Heirship Certificate to establish claimant title in case of death of covered member (In case the beneficiary details are not recorded with the Company)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Succession of certificate &amp; original guardian-ship certificate (in case beneficiary is a minor)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attending physicians report, postmortem/FIR</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Past medical records</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any other document deemed necessary by the Company</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Claim Process:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For claims, the assured or beneficiary/ Customer can call EFU Life directly at&nbsp;(021) 111-338-111 (111-EFU-111) or by post at Claims Department, EFU Life House Plot No 112 8th East Street, DHA Phase 1 Karachi.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The assured can also email at <a href="mailto:claims@efulife.com">claims@efulife.com</a> &nbsp;to lodge and initiate the claim(s). </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">EFU Life representative will guide the beneficiary on claim document requirements and will provide guidance on the subsequent steps for claim processing</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>WorkCode: </strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:black">EFU Term Life Plus Plan - Claim</span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">EFU Term Life Plus Plan Insurance Additional Information &ndash; Call routed to Vendor</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process against insurance.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Customer want to talk with EFU Term Life Plus Plan agent.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Agent can only transfer call on VDN from Monday to Friday in 9 Am to 6 PM.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="color:black">Note:&nbsp;For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6031</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Work Code:</strong> <span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:black">EFU Term Life Plus Plan Info - Call Transferred to Vendor</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite to SOP</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ BVS Enablement â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenario related to BVS Enablement.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">BVS (Biometric Verification System) is a security feature integrated into the JazzCash App to enhance customer security and comply with SBP&#39;s digital security measures. The BVS(Unikrew) feature is activated for the following scenarios:</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>New Device Registration Via App</strong>: BVS Required when registering a new account via new device for a JazzCash account (Now user can link maximum 3 devices at a time).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Email Address Change</strong>: BVS incorporated when updating the email address via the app.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Device Chang</strong>: If a user wants to change the device for app login, the BVS (Biometric Verification System) feature will be enabled for verification.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers must verify their identity through the BVS process (scanning both left- and right-hand fingers) before completing the above tasks. This feature is integrated with the Unikrew system to ensure secure identity verification.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case a customer complains about the in-app BVS issue, the agent will refer to the Unikrew complaint document:&nbsp; <a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/16176" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/16176</a> </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Note</u></strong>: <span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">After 3 times, a customer can have their biometric verification done via the App after 24 hours have passed.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Table 1.0</strong></span></span></p>

			</td>
			<td style="background-color:black; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:21px; width:301px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:white">Possible Values</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>
		</tr>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 17713

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Cooldown Status â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover the scenario related to the <strong>Cooldown Period for account and transaction security</strong>. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Cooldown Period is a State Bank of Pakistan initiative designed to protect customer accounts</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">It is a crucial security measure activated after actions such as account registration, device registration, MPIN changes, or email updates to protect user accounts.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Customer will not be able to perform any debit transactions during cooldown period. Cool down period will last for 30 Min.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Agent can check Cool down status in CPS </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">To check Cooldown Status</span></span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Customer Info &gt;&gt; Check State Tag tab after the basic info tab</span></span></span></span></p>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Agent can also check details in Notification Log Tab in CPS. Below is the navigation</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Reporting Log Under My Function Tab &gt;&gt; Enter MSISDN with 92 &gt;&gt; Click View &gt;&gt; Transaction Details will Shown</span></span></p>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The <strong>Cooldown Period</strong> is an automated security measure that activates after certain action is performed in the JazzCash app or USSD platform, temporarily restricting debit transactions to protect the user&#39;s account</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Where customer calls and is unable to perform transaction due to Cooldown period below mention WorkCode will be used</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>WorkCode: </u></strong>Cooldown Restriction - Unable to perform Transaction</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Cooldown Work Code</strong> will be used when customers inquire about the status of their transactions during the cooldown period.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The cooldown period will be triggered in the following scenarios:</span></span></li>
</ul>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-left:40px; width:552px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#d9d9d9; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:24px; width:153px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Scenarios</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:#d9d9d9; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:24px; width:399px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Description</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:153px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Account Registration </span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:399px">
			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Once a new customer account registered on CPS, the debit block would be incorporated on the customer and the cooldown period would be started upon the registration date<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">.</span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case a pending active customer would perform transactions during this stage, and their MPIN is not created, first the MPIN error would be shown to the customer before the debit block error.</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:153px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Device Change</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:399px">
			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">When a new device is linked to the account via app, a cooldown is applied for security reasons.</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:153px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">MPIN Change </span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:399px">
			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After the customer&rsquo;s MPIN change/Reset, a cooldown period implemented and prevents unauthorized access or transactions.</span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:153px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Email Change</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:38px; width:399px">
			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Upon updating the registered email address, e</span>mail address would also have cooldown incorporation once a customer would update their email address. </span></span></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Standard Duration of cooldown:</strong> The cooldown period will last for <strong>30 Min</strong> after any of the above actions are completed.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Impact on Transactions</span></span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">During the cooldown period, customer will not be able to perform any debit transactions such as C2C, Online Transactions, IBFT, Cash Out etc.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px">&nbsp;</p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:black">Category</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">&nbsp;<u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">Pre-requisite:</span></span></u></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation</span></span></u></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">To check Cooldown Status</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Customer Info &gt;&gt; Check State Tag tab after the basic info tab</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk149234157"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">To Check Transaction status</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">:</span></span><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click review Transactions &gt;&gt; Search Transaction Status (Completed, Expired, Cancelled, Decline, Authorized, Pending Authorized, Failed)</span></span></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">To Check Failure Description</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">:</span></span><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; search MSISDN &gt;&gt; click operation &gt;&gt; review Transactions &gt;&gt; Transaction Tab &gt;&gt; click search &gt;&gt; Select transaction &gt;&gt; check Failure Description in Transaction Details</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk135925583"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:red">Info Scenario </span></u></strong></a></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Kisan Card Payment Acceptance â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to the onboarding and payment acceptance process for merchants under the Kisan Credit Card program introduced by the Government of Punjab.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The program dynamics are as follows:</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>75 Billion Rupees</strong> dedicated to the program.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>0.5 Million Kisan Cards</strong> to be disbursed to farmers.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Each card has a <strong>150,000 Rupees limit</strong>.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Over 5000 Agri merchants</strong> will be part of the program.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">An initial <strong>quota of 1500 merchants</strong> have been allocated for onboarding to JazzCash.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only the <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">1500 onboarded merchants</span></strong> can accept payments through the <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Kisan Credit Card</span></strong>, and these merchants are being onboarded via <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">BVS devices</span></strong> through our <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">channels team</span></strong>. Agents can verify these merchants through CPS. These merchants will have the merchant category code &#39;<strong>0763</strong>&#39; and the category <strong>&#39;Agriculture Traders&#39;</strong> on CPS for identification. (For navigation, refer to the navigation header below.)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Tap on Phone(Tap Pay) feature will be used to accept the payments through kisan card.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants must subscribe to a <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">one-time yearly subscription</span></strong> (Rs 01) to use the TapPay service. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Merchants need an Android smartphone with NFC and Android version 8 or higher. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">These merchants will be classified as <strong>M1/M2</strong> under the existing rule profiles and transaction limits for M1/M2 merchants.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px">&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:red">Info Scenario</span></u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Table 2.0</span></u></span></span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="background:white; border-collapse:collapse; width:434px">
	<tbody>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">To check Account Status:</span></strong>&nbsp;<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN in Organization Operator &gt;&gt; Copy the organization short code from the organization code &gt;&gt; Enter the organization short code in the Organization tab under the Search tab &gt;&gt; Under the Business Info tab, the merchant category code will be &#39;<strong>0763</strong>&#39;.</span></span></span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Operations <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Click Transaction history <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search transaction as per Date/Time <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">NADRA Portal <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Search MSISDN <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) <strong>&gt;&gt;</strong> Check Verification details</span></span></p>

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Family Health Insurance Plan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Family Health insurance is being offered to JazzCash customers in collaboration with EFU life insurance</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Previously Family Health Insurance was known as Family Health Takaful</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers are being offered Family Health Insurance Plan via below options:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Outbound calls to be made to potential customer</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Outbound sales calls will be made to potential customers from <strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">021-111-124-444</span></span></span></span></strong>.</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Below are the plan details</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The policyholder &amp; family can avail maximum PKR 500,000 in hospitalization benefit and up to PKR 1,000,000 in ICU benefit, a maximum 4 members are covered</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To qualify for the Daily Hospitalization benefit, the policyholder must be admitted to the hospital for a minimum of 24 hours</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can only claim medical reimbursements for accidents; they don&#39;t need to be hospitalized to claim these reimbursements.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Limitation/Exclusion</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case of death due to suicide or self-inflicted Injury.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any pre-existing conditions contracted due to accident or bodily Injury before the commencement of cover under this policy.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Murder, Suicide, self-inflicted Injury, participation in a criminal act, or violation of the law.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>&nbsp;Claim Info</u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For claims, the assured or beneficiary can call EFU Life directly at (021) 111-338-111 (111-EFU-111) or by post at Claims Department, EFU Life House Plot No 112 8th East Street, DHA Phase 1 Karachi.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The assured can also email at claims@efulife.com to lodge and initiate the claim. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">EFU Life representative will guide the beneficiary on claim document requirements and will provide guidance on the subsequent steps for claim processing.</span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Insurance â€“ Family Health Insurance Plan - SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk133588181"><strong>Product / Service Description: </strong>&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenario related to EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan is being offered to JazzCash consumers in collaboration with EFU Life Insurance.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Outbound sales calls will be made to potential customers from&nbsp;<strong>021-111-124-444</strong> Duration of the insurance is for 1 year from the date of enrolment</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer will be deducted annually. There is no reversal if insurance is successfully subscribed.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Where customer is complaining regarding Mis Selling, agent will inform customer that after giving digital consent you have subscribe the insurance. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If still customer insists that wrong information is provided by caller agent will ask the information/benefits which are provided to customer. After validating customer concern if agent found issue valid agent will lodge complaint of Mis Selling and will mention complete issue of Mis selling in complaint remarks.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Insurance Benefits</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Enrollment age:</strong>&nbsp; 18 years to 59 years; coverage terminates when a participant attains 60<sup>th </sup>Birthday</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Coverage age:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp; 18 to 60 years</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If a customer is hospitalized, their stay can be covered for up to 30 continuous days. After that, any further stay might not be covered unless there are special circumstances. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer gets discharged and then needs to be hospitalized again for the same condition, there must be a 30-day gap between the two hospitalizations for the second one to be considered a new case. If they return to the hospital within 30 days for the same issue, it might not be treated as a separate claim.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After the customer purchases a policy, they will need to wait 30 days before they can claim any expenses related to outpatient services, like doctor&#39;s consultations, lab tests, or minor treatments that don&#39;t require hospitalization. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer falls sick and needs to be hospitalized, they will need to wait 15 days from the start of their policy before they can make a claim for any hospital-related expenses due to illness.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For hospitalization, a per-day limit is provided for 24 hours of hospital confinement regardless of room category. Maximum 100 days covered in a year</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Exclusion</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pre-existing Conditions</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Intentional self-inflicted injury, murder, suicide, and violation of law; Failure to seek or follow medical advice, taking of alcohol or drugs. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Treatment related to dental, pregnancy, miscarriage, or childbirth.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Participating in exercises while serving in the armed or paramilitary forces or any form of policing duty. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Routine dental and vision care, over-the-counter medications aside from doctors&#39; prescriptions, vitamins, or supplements</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US">&nbsp;Claim Document:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Copy of death certificate issued by NADRA / Union Council</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Copy of CNIC of claimant and deceased</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Heirship Certificate to establish claimant title in case of death of covered member (In case the beneficiary details are not recorded with the Company)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Succession of certificate &amp; original guardian-ship certificate (in case beneficiary is a minor)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attending physicians report, postmortem/FIR</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Past medical records</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Any other document deemed necessary by the Company</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">How to Claim</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For claims, the assured or beneficiary/ Customer can call EFU Life directly at (021) 111-338-111 (111-EFU-111) or by post at Claims Department, EFU Life House Plot No 112 8th East Street, DHA Phase 1 Karachi.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The assured can also email at <a href="mailto:claims@efulife.com">claims@efulife.com</a> &nbsp;to lodge and initiate the claim(s). </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">EFU Life representative will guide the beneficiary on claim document requirements and will provide guidance on the subsequent steps for claim processing </span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>WorkCode:</u></strong> <span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="color:black">EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan - Claim</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">EFU Hospitalization and OPD Plan &ndash; Call Transfer to Vendor</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer want to know addition information on claim submission process.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer wants to know about status of his/her subscription/claim.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer want to talk with </span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">EFU</span></span><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> agent.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Customer want to talk with EFU Term Life Plus Plan agent.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Agent can only transfer call on VDN from Monday to Friday in 9 Am to 6 PM.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Note:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="en-PK" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;For all above scenarios, agent will route the call to VDN 6031</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:red">System Navigation for Agent Action required/relevant in SOP:</span></span> </strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction History: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction History</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Transaction Status: </strong>CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Check Verification from NADRA Portal: </strong>NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer Account â€“ Account Opening Unikrew Enablement â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">This SOP document outlines the revised Customer Account Opening journey details. According to SBP guidelines, users must complete biometric verification (BVS) during the registration process to confirm their identity.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">If a user fails to perform the BVS while creating account, they will be registered as an L0 customer. L0 customers are restricted from performing debit transactions but can still perform credit transactions. All newly registered L0 accounts through app will have a <strong>&#39;Debit Lock Rule Profile&#39;</strong> applied, allowing credit transactions while blocking debit transactions.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Upon logging in, L0 customers will receive a notification prompting them to complete BVS to unlock full account services. Once the customer completes BVS, their account will be upgraded, and full transaction capabilities, including debit transactions, will be restored.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">No complaints will be logged for errors related to debit transaction failures for L0 customers. Instead, customers will be advised to complete BVS and try again.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">For complaint handling regarding Unikrew issues. Please refer to the below link : </span></span></span><a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/16176" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/16176</span></span></a> </span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant - Suppler Payment & Favourite Feature additions- SOP 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This sop document will cover information related to Supplier Payment &amp; Favourite Feature Addition</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:13.0pt">Supplier Payment:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Previously the merchant is not able to see how much he has paid to Suppliers through QR/Till. </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Now merchant will be able to see how much he has paid to Suppliers through QR/Till. </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Merchant will be able to see total QR/Till payment done to Suppliers for that specific date in the supplier payment report through app. </span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:black">Merchant will be able to filter it on the basis date range and Supplier name. Report will be downloadable as well through app.</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">Merchant will be able to select date range upto 90 days in export report option in PDF format.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:black">The supplier report will be shown to the merchant on N-1 (the report they receive will reflect data up until the previous day) basis.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Merchant will be able to download Supplier Payment Report as well with both date range and Supplier names filter. The downloaded report has the following data:&nbsp;</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Receiver (Business) Till ID</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Business Name</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Date and Time of transaction</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">TID&nbsp;</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:13.0pt">Favourite Feature Addition in supplier Payments:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>

JazzCash merchants should be able to add favorites, manage favorites, and perform QR transactions on favorites through the JazzCash Business app.</span></span></span>&nbsp;</span></span></li>

		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer can open L1 account directly</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>

	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer need to allow permission of JazzCash App from mobile app setting such as (Camera).&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:black">Biometric verification failed due to mismatch with NADRA</span></span></span></span></p>

			</td>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Pre-requisite to SOP</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Account status: Active, Dormant</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation for Agent:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">To check Account Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 34

Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">If a CNIC and fingerprints being scanned do not match the verification would not be successful and an error would be seen by the customer</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Therefore, the CNIC being entered for account registration should have the same details as per the fingerprints and details of a customer at NADRA side for the verification to be done</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Sasta Ticket â€“ SOP Management
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Sasta Ticket.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">The <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sasta Ticket</span></strong> feature is now integrated into the JazzCash App as a widget, providing users with a seamless and convenient experience for purchasing tickets</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customer can purchase flight and bus ticket via Sasta Ticket Widget.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">When a customer buys a ticket, seat selection and meal options (if available) will be based on the airline chosen during the booking. These options will be included in the booking process flow</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sasta Ticket icon will be added under Travel section.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customers can buy both one-way and two-way (round-trip) tickets through the platform. Here&#39;s what it means:</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">One-Way Ticket:</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black"> This option allows the customer to book a ticket for travel from the starting location to the destination without a return trip</span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Two-Way (Round-Trip) Ticket:</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black"> This option includes both departure and return tickets in a single booking.</span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black"> Users will select their departure and return dates while purchasing the ticket. </span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customer will be shown a list of all the flights that are available in the given date and the price of the ticket to be purchased</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">User would in addition to this, add the traveller information such as their name, date of birth and title for domestic flights</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">User in case of purchasing an international flight ticket would include additional information other than the Name, Date of Birth. Additional information would include the Nationality, Passport Number, Passport Expiry as well.</span></span></span></span><br />
	<strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt">Limits:</span></u></strong></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">While purchasing a ticket via Sasta Ticket, limits do not apply. Customers can purchase any ticket without restrictions.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Ticket cancellation &amp; Refund:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">If customer want to cancel the ticket and wants to refund the amount agent will inform customer to contact Sasta Ticket. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customer can cancel themselves on the JC app via manage bookings as well as call the helpline&nbsp;number (+9221111172782) or drop a whatsapp&nbsp;message at +923047772782 or even interact with the support button present on the app header</span></strong>&nbsp; </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per Scenario</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operations &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Search transaction as per Date/Time &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: NADRA Portal &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the Customer) &gt;&gt; Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
