ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Asaan Digital Account-SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Mandatory Information:</span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Asaan Digital Account (ADA) allows L1 JazzCash account holders to upgrade for higher transaction limits (Daily 400,000, Monthly 1,000,000 &amp; yearly 12,000,000) and enhanced services as per SBP regulations.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only BVS-verified L1 JazzCash customers with matching SIM ownership are eligible. Minor accounts and users outside Pakistan are not eligible.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can upgrade through the JazzCash App for Rs. 100 (non-refundable), with the process completing within 48 hours. Biometric verification must be completed via the app to ensure account functionality.</span></span></li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Note: </span></u></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">It is mandatory to send relevant ISMS.</span></span></span></p>

	<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt">Product / Service Description:&nbsp; </span></u></strong></span></span></p>
	<br />
	<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document covers scenarios related to the Asaan Digital Account (ADA).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">ADA is an initiative by the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) that allows L1 account holders to upgrade to ADA, offering higher transaction limits and enhanced services.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers can upgrade their L1 JazzCash account to ADA through the JazzCash App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Upgrade charges: Rs. 100 (non-refundable).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After successfully upgrading to ADA, customers cannot revert to L1 account profile.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG">SBP Regulation</span></strong></span></span></h3>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">As per SBP regulations, <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Biometric Verification (BVS)</span></strong> is mandatory for all ADA accounts (both existing and new).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers who upgraded without BVS via the app, especially those who used retailer channels, must now perform <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">BVS through the app</span></strong>.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">ADA customers who haven&rsquo;t completed BVS via app will be restricted from performing the debit transaction until the verification is completed(If the user completes BVS through a retailer device, will they not be allowed to perform transactions, customer would need to perform verification through the App).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This restriction will prompt customers to <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">complete BVS</span></strong> to continue using ADA services.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Users as ADA users that have not performed would be required to verify their identity again through BVS before any chance of an upgrade to FDA account status.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">BVS journey flow has been added under the Scenario 2 section, please refer to Scenario 2 for details.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG">Eligibility</span></strong></span></span></h3>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only customers with <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Biometrically Verified (BVS) L1 accounts</span></strong> are eligible to upgrade to ADA.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Minor accounts</span></strong> are <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">not eligible</span></strong> for Asaan Digital Account upgrades.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For both <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Jazz</span></strong> and <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">OMNO</span></strong> users, SIM ownership must match the JazzCash account holder&rsquo;s name.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Geo-location:</strong> Must be enabled for the upgrade, as required by SBP to ensure users outside Pakistan cannot upgrade.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Migration time</span></strong>: The ADA migration process will be completed within <strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">48 hours</span></strong> after the request is submitted.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Asaan Digital Account is the upgrade of L1 customer account with higher limits.</span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Verification: L3</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Debit Block Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: </span></span></span><strong>&nbsp;</strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Check Status &gt;&gt;Check Rule Profile (Under Basic Info)&gt;&gt; Debit Lock Rule Profile</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Request to Pay- SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related to Request to Pay.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">JazzCash Business app currently offers Request to Pay (Get Payments) feature which allows merchant to send payment requests to their customers. Customers can approve these requests and pay either through mentioned payment methods.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Request via Wallet</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">:</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A fast payment option where requests appear as popups on the payer&#39;s app or USSD.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers enter their MPIN within 30 seconds to complete the payment.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Dynamic QR Generation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants generate Dynamic QR codes for payment requests.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Payment via invoice generation:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants can generate invoices in the &quot;Request to Pay&quot; option.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Features include adding product name, amount, tax percentage (optional), discount offers (optional), and descriptions.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants can add multiple products to a single invoice.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Discounts and taxes can be applied as a flat amount or percentage.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Quick Pay:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Transactions can be initiated using the recipient&rsquo;s MSISDN or email.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants can attach documents/images and add descriptions and pay via QR.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Payment via Link(Payment via Card):</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchants can generate a dynamic payment link to share via SMS or email.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers access the link, which opens a MasterCard-hosted webpage.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customers provide card details, verify the amount, and enter an OTP sent by their bank to complete the payment.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only Visa and MasterCard are supported for payments.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Payments are credited to the merchant&rsquo;s account within 5 working days after the sender successfully transfers the amount via the link.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sender is not charged any fee by JazzCash. If the respective bank applies any fee it&rsquo;s the discretion of that Bank.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Merchant will be charged 3% + Tax on receiving transaction.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Note </strong>: This generated Link will expire after</span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">24 hours</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">5 unsuccessful attempts</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">1 successful attempt</span></span></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Please refer to table 1.0 for high level information</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ID: 17829

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Merchant â€“ Sell Load and Earn â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Product/Service Description:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Sell load is a service for JazzCash Business users where we will reward merchants on selling any load (Zong, Telenor, Jazz, Ufone). Merchants can sell Prepaid Loads, Prepaid Bundles and Postpaid Loads</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">They will be rewarded 1.4% without Holding tax + GST as per the as per province.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">This commission will be posted in real time.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Merchant can check the commission on the Sell Load transaction on the review screen while performing transaction.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Minimum and Maximum load limits shall apply as per standard every telecom operator&rsquo;s load limits.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Merchant can use this service only available for postpaid and prepaid numbers.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Merchant cannot perform Sell Load on self-registered number.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">In the start of month Rs. 500,000 Sell Load Limit will be given to merchant</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;Merchant can view Dashboard with information on Amount of Load he can sell and Total Commission earned.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">To check Account Status:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">To check Transaction Failure Reason:</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction &gt;&gt; transaction Details &gt;&gt; Failure Description</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Saving Plan â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Saving Account</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> allows customers to subscribe to various saving plans and earn daily profit based on their maintained balance.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customers can choose from <strong>six different saving plans</strong> through the JazzCash App or USSD, with minimum balance requirements ranging from <strong>PKR 5,000 to over PKR 250,000</strong>.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="background:white; border-collapse:collapse; margin-left:59px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#ffc000; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:.2in">

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">The annual profit rate varies between <strong>2% and 11%</strong>, depending on the selected plan.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">A <strong>Withholding Tax (WHT)</strong> is applicable on the profit amount:</span></span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Filer customers:</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> 15%</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Non-filer customers:</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"> 35%</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customers must maintain the minimum required balance to continue earning daily profit. If the balance falls below the required threshold, no profit will be posted.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customers subscribed to a <strong>saving plan will not receive JazzCash Free Minutes and SMS</strong> on balance maintenance.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Zakat Deduction &amp; Exemption</span></span></span></span></h3>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Zakat will be deducted from saving plan subscribers&#39; accounts if their balance meets or exceeds the Nisab set for the current year.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customers can apply for <strong>Zakat exemption</strong> via the <strong>JazzCash App or USSD</strong> before <strong>1st Shaban ul Moazzam</strong>. Requests submitted after this date will not be entertained for the current year.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">If an account is opened on or after <strong>1st Shaban ul Moazzam</strong>, the Zakat declaration can be obtained at account opening without the thirty-day balance condition.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customers opting for a saving plan will be asked if they wish to declare Zakat at the time of subscription.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Profit will be credited to the customer&rsquo;s account based on the subscribed plan&rsquo;s terms and conditions.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="color:black">Zakat Deduction Certificate: </span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Customer can currently only get the zakat deduction certificate through the JC app.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Please refer to below table 1.0 for high level product details.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Refer to process overview</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Account status: Active</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Saving Plan:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Saving Plan Tab</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JAZZCASH â€“ CUSTOMER â€“ L2 DIGITAL ACCOUNT -SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">This SOP document will cover scenarios related L2 Digital Account.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">L2 Digital Account is a State Bank&rsquo;s initiative where customers upgrade their L1/ADA/FDA/ADRA account to L2 Digital Accounts which has higher limits.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">L2 Digital Account is applicable only to customers who are biometrically verified L1/ADA/FDA/ADRA account holders.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">After successful migration to L2 Digital Account, customer cannot reverse back to L1/ADA /FDA/ADRA account level.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;Upgradation charges: PKR 100 (non-refundable).</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">Eligibility Criteria</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Type:</span></strong> Only L1/ADA/FDA/ADRA profiles are eligible for upgrade to L2 Digital Account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Biometric Verification:</span></strong> Before submitting the personal/ professional details in the journey user firstly must go through the successful BVS journey.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership:</span></strong> The SIM used must be registered under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location:</span></strong> Must be enabled during the upgrade process to ensure the user is within Pakistan.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">&nbsp;Account Upgradation</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgrade Options:</span></strong> L1/ADA/FDA/ADRA account holders can upgrade directly to L2 Digital Account through App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgradation Charges: The upgrade to L2 Digital Account incurs a charge of Rs 100, which is non-refundable.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location Requirement: Geo-location must be enabled by the customer, as per SBP requirements, ensuring that customers outside Pakistan cannot upgrade their accounts.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership: For both Jazz and OMNO users, SIM ownership must be under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Mismatch: If a user&#39;s request is rejected due to a SIM mismatch, the Rs 100 charge will not be refunded.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Migration Time: The migration to a L2 Digital Account will be completed within 2 working days after the request is submitted.</span></strong></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">L2 Digital Account Limits</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Transaction Limits</span></strong>:</span></span></li>
</ul>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-left:95px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">Transaction type</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">Limits</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">Daily Debit/Credit</span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Aptos&quot;,sans-serif">10 Lakh</span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

			</td>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:black"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Balance</span></strong>: <span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.0pt">No maximum </span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.0pt">Account balance </span><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.0pt">limit applied. </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">C2C Transaction Limits</span></strong>:</span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">C2C Transaction Counters</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">:</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">A maximum 5 credit transactions per day. Unlimited debit C2C&rsquo;s can be made in a day. 5 C2C&rsquo;s in a day will be free. 6<sup>th</sup> onward sending C2C in a day will be charged 1% of transaction amount (inc tax)</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">No weekly, monthly, or yearly transaction counters.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">Steps Required to perform for L2 Digital Account Upgradation</span></strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Biometric Verification(Unikrew journey will be opened which user must needs to complete).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">CNIC &amp; Live Selfie (Customers front and back picture required to be uploaded.</span></span></li>
</ol>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">3- Personal information: Following personal information is required in App for L2 Digital Account Upgradation;</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="list-style-type:none">
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Full Name (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Father/Spouse/Guardian Name</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Gender (Select gender).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Contact Number (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">CNIC Expiry Date</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Personal Email Address (Optional).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Current Mailing Address.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Permanent Address. </span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Purpose of Account (from drop down list. Sample salary/Saving/Remittance/Other).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Source of Income.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Expected Monthly Turnover.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Following Professional Information is required in App for L2 Digital Account Upgradation.</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Are you a Tax resident of USA? (Addition Information required if selected)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Are you a Tax resident other than USA? (Addition Information required if selected)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Are you a Tax resident of Pakistan?</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Proof of income required.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">On the final step screen, Requester to input account MPin for confirmation.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Scenario 2.1: How to Track L2 Digital Account upgradation request</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">L2 Digital Account - Migration Status</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>

			</td>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Account status: Active</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt">Data to be taken from CPS only</span></span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JAZZCASH â€“ CUSTOMER â€“ ADRA DIGITAL ACCOUNT -SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This SOP document will cover scenarios related ADRA Digital Account.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">ADRA (Asaan Digital Remittance Account)s is a State Bank&rsquo;s initiative where customers upgrade their L1/ADA account to ADRA Digital Accounts which has higher limits.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">ADRA Digital Account is applicable only to customers who are biometrically verified L1 account holders.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">L0/FDA user is not applicable to upgrade his account level to ADRA.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Payoneer user firstly needs to de-link his payoneer account to upgrade his account level to ADRA.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">After successful migration to ADRA Digital Account, customer cannot reverse back to L1/ADA account level.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;Upgradation charges: PKR 100 (non-refundable).</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp; ADRA accountholders can receive upto PKR 3 million/ month remittances per month</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">Eligibility Criteria</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Account Type:</span></strong> Only L1/ADA profiles are eligible for upgrade to ADRA Digital Account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Biometric Verification:</span></strong> Before submitting the personal/ professional details in the journey user firstly must go through the successful BVS journey.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership:</span></strong> The SIM used must be registered under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location:</span></strong> Must be enabled during the upgrade process to ensure the user is within Pakistan.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">&nbsp;Account Upgradation</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgrade Options:</span></strong> L1/ADA account holders can upgrade directly to ADRA Digital Account through App.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Upgradation Charges: The upgrade to ADRA incurs a charge of Rs 100, which is non-refundable.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Geo-Location Requirement: Geo-location must be enabled by the customer, as per SBP requirements, ensuring that customers outside Pakistan cannot upgrade their accounts.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Ownership: For both Jazz and OMNO users, SIM ownership must be under the JazzCash account holder&#39;s name.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SIM Mismatch: If a user&#39;s request is rejected due to a SIM mismatch, the Rs 100 charge will not be refunded.</span></strong></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Migration Time: The migration to a ADRA Digital Account will be completed within 2 working days after the request is submitted.</span></strong></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#444444">ADRA Digital Account Limits</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>C2C Transaction Counters</strong>:</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A maximum of 5 credit transactions per day.<span style="background-color:white"> Daily limits on sending (C2C) transactions are being removed. However, charges(1%) will apply only on sending transactions from the&nbsp;<strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">6</span></strong></span><strong><sup><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:8.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">th</span></span></span></sup></strong><span style="background-color:white">&nbsp;transaction onward.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No weekly, monthly, or yearly transaction counters.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Steps Required to perform for ADRA Digital Account Upgradation</strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Biometric Verification(Unikrew journey will be opened which user must needs to complete).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">CNIC &amp; Live Selfie (Customers front and back picture required to be uploaded.</span></span></li>
</ol>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">3- Personal information: Following personal information is required in App for ADRA Digital Account Upgradation;</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="list-style-type:none">
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Full Name (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Father/Spouse/Guardian Name</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Gender (Select gender).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Contact Number (This will be Auto populated by CPS. Customer cannot change it).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">CNIC Expiry Date</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Personal Email Address (Optional).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Current Mailing Address.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Permanent Address. </span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Purpose of Account (from drop down list. Sample salary/Saving/Remittance/Other).</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Source of Income.</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Expected Monthly Turnover.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Following Professional Information is required in App for ADRA Digital Account Upgradation.</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Are you a Tax resident of USA? (Addition Information required if selected)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Are you a Tax resident other than USA? (Addition Information required if selected)</span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Are you a Tax resident of Pakistan?</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">On the final step screen, Requester to input account MPin for confirmation.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Table 1.0</span></span></span></span></p>

		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Platform Fee (USSD)</span></span></p>
			</td>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">KMS &gt;&gt; Communication &gt;&gt; USSD Platform fee</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Pre-requisite to service request scenarios</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">System Navigation:</span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Account Status</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status:&nbsp;</span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:#333333">CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction history&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></p>

<p><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></p>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 17864
