ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ Account Closure â€“ SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This sop document will cover scenario related to JazzCash Account Closure.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For account closure request at helpline, agent will ask the reason of account closure to ensure better guidance to customer.&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer wants to open JazzCash account on other number, agent will offer the customer to use &ldquo;Change of MSISDN&rdquo; option available at any Jazz experience centre, franchise and BVS enabled retailers instead of closing the account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer wants to close JazzCash account due to change of sim ownership, agent will offer the customer to use &ldquo;Change of MSISDN&rdquo; option available at any Jazz experience centre, franchise and BVS enabled retailers instead of closing the account.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer wants&nbsp;to close his/her JazzCash account without the intention of opening a new one, such as discontinuing the use of JazzCash services, then there is no need to guide the change of MSISDN option and agent will proceed the request for closure.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Agent must check account status (system navigation) before proceeding with account closure request. &nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account status must be in Active, Pending Active or Dormant state.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Only original customer can request for account closure from helpline. Below type of customer is considered as original customer.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mobile Account Owner</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">SIM (CLI) Owner</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guardian (In case of NextGen Account)&nbsp;</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Account can be closed despite of balance amount.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If balance is zero, agent can proceed with account closure after checking remaining pre-requisites.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the account balance is not zero, the agent must inquire how the customer intends to settle the balance and provide below options to customer:</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk144829122">1-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Customer him/herself&nbsp;</a>can use USSD/App or Cash out from a retailer and make account balance zero.</span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">2-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the balance is Rs. 100 or less than&nbsp;50K, give the customer the option that JazzCash will transfer the balance to their CNIC. They can then withdraw the money from retailer/franchise using biometric. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account. If the amount in the account exceeds Rs.&nbsp;50,000,&nbsp;we will ask the customer to withdraw the excess amount first or visit MMBL.</span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:24px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">3-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If the balance is less than Rs. 100, offer the customer the option to close their account. In parallel, agent will explain that their remaining balance will be held by JazzCash, and they can claim it later if they want. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the customer opts for account closure with a balance (Option 2 &amp; 3), agent will create an activity for account closure with balance in the BBCR tab of Service Now after following the pre-requisite checks (Table 1.0) and follow the account closure scenarios.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If customer wants to clear account balance themselves, guide customer to use/transfer balance via App or USSD and call-back once the account balance is zero. If account balance is in paisa&rsquo;s than amount can only be transferred via JC app. Minimum Transfer amount = 1.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If amount is less than 1 Rs, ask customer to add some amount in account to increase the balance more than 1 Rs.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For NextGen (Minor Account), only guardian can request for account closure. Account request will not be entertained on Minor&rsquo;s request.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For successful account closure request at helpline, agent will check pre-requisites as mentioned in table 1.0 below:</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If these checks are cleared, agent will take account closure request as per scenarios 2.0.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;<strong>Table 1.0</strong></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<table cellspacing="0" class="Table" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:639px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account Closure &ndash; Pre-requisite Checks</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Description</span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account registration date is less than 60 days old</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account closure requires a minimum of 60 days from the registration date. Agent will inform registration date and ask customer to call back once 60 days are passed. If customer wants to close account immediately, agent will ask the customer to visit Business Center.</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account Balance Validation</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">If the account balance is not zero, the agent must inquire how the customer intends to settle the balance and provide below options to customer:</span></span></span></span></p>

			<ul>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Customer him/herself can use USSD/App or Cash out from a retailer and make account balance zero.</span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the balance is Rs. 100 or more, give the customer the option that JazzCash will transfer the balance to their CNIC. They can then withdraw the money from retailer/franchise using biometric. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the balance is less than Rs. 100, offer the customer the option to close their account. In parallel, agent will explain that their remaining balance will be held by JazzCash, and they can claim it later if they want. If the customer agrees, proceed with closing their account.</span></span></li>
			</ul>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Use below work code if customer opt for option 1.</span></span></span></span></p>

			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account Closure Process Info - Account Balance Not Zero</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Original Customer not Available</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Caller should be the original customer of account except if caller is the SIM owner and does not know the ownership of JazzCash account registered on calling number. In this case, request will be taken.</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">L3 not Verified</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Calling/original customer has to be verified as per information available in NADRA Portal. If respective information that needs to be verified is not available in NADRA Portal, customer will be considered as unverified. Additionally, route customer to NADRA Center to get respective details updated.</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Unpaid Ready Cash Loan</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Account will not be closed is there is any outstanding Ready Cash loan. Agent will check Ready cash portal and guide customer to call back for account closure after clearing the pending amount.</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:white; vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">Account Balance &gt; 50,000</span></span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:white; vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="color:black">In case calling customer does not know the account ownership but is the owner of calling SIM (CLI), and balance amount is greater than 50,000, route the customer to MMBL branch or Jazz Experience Center for account closure as amount greater than 50,000 cannot be transferred to CNIC.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">JazzCash Account Closure Deceased Person</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Pre-requisite to SOP</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Owners of Sims (CLIs) have the access to request the closure of any registered accounts on their sims.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mobile Account owner is calling from CLI other than mobile account number.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Caller = Original Customer (Mobile Account Owner/SIM Owner/Guardian in case of NextGen Account)</span></span></li>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="color:red">The rates mentioned above are specifically for Ramadan, and will be subject to change after.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Customers have the freedom to withdraw funds into the JazzCash Wallet at any given moment, without any deduction on principal amount:</span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Min age at entry&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 18 years (Attained)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Max age at entry&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 59 years (Attained)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Max age at expiry 60 years (Attained)</span>&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>

</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Upon creating the goal, the customer is automatically eligible for accidental hospitalization takaful coverage.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">To get life Takaful coverage, you need to keep 20% of your goal money in your Savings</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If you close your goal before finishing it, the insurance stops right away.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Insurance also stops if you finish and close your goal.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If you keep 20% but don&#39;t finish your goal on time, insurance stops when the time is up.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The plan has two parts: investing and insurance for death and hospitalization.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">SFTL gives insurance money up to PKR 5,000,000 if you die, based on the difference between your goal and investment.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For accident hospitalization, SFTL reimburses PKR 10,000.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:13.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Exclusions</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Accidental Hospitalization (IP) Takaful Coverage excludes losses from intentional self-inflicted injury, criminal acts, law violations, alcohol or drug use, and failure to seek medical advice.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pre-existing diseases, bodily injuries before coverage, atomic energy explosions, and war-related events, including civil war, rebellion, riots, or terrorism, are not covered.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Dangerous sports like hot air ballooning, polo, horse racing, diving, mountaineering, and all forms of motor and motorcycle sports are excluded from coverage.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Coverage does not apply to military, paramilitary, or police operations, or injuries from non-commercial aircraft travel unless as a fare-paying passenger on a licensed airline.</span></span></li>
</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Customer wants to have information that is not covered in this SOP.</span></span></span></span></span></li>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white">Verification: As per scenario</span></span></span></span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:14.0pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:red">System Navigation:</span></span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">To check Account Status:</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">&nbsp;CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction History</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Transaction History</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Check Transaction Status</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Click Operations&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Review Transaction&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search transaction as per Date/Time&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Status</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Check Verification from NADRA Portal:&nbsp;</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">NADRA Portal&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Search MSISDN&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Enter CNIC and CNIC Issuance Date (Verify from the customer)&nbsp;<strong>&gt;&gt;</strong>&nbsp;Check Verification details</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">Check Amount against Receiver CNIC</span></span></strong><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333">: CPS &gt;&gt; My Functions &gt;&gt; Operations &gt;&gt; G2P/P2P Payment Management &gt;&gt; search Receiver CNIC</span></span></span></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Customer â€“ SpEidi- SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">SpEidi is a new feature allowing JazzCash users to send, receive and request Eidi digitally. Users can select recipients from their contact list, choose an amount, and send, request Eidi with a personalized message. </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The recipient receives an instant notification and can redeem the amount directly into their JazzCash wallet. The service is available for JazzCash wallet users only.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Users can send SpEidi via the JazzCash app, and the transaction will remain in a pending authorized state until the receiver redeems the amount.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This feature will be available only in the JC app, while the redeem option will also be provided on USSD.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Limits for sending and receiving SpEidi are as per standard JazzCash transaction limits.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Users can check the status of their sent or received SpEidi under the &lsquo;Transaction History&rsquo; section of the app.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Eidi status can be checked in Eidi tracker as well, for both sent and received, and requests as well</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If the receiver does not redeem the amount, the funds will remain in a pending authorized status in the sender&#39;s account for the specified duration (up to 15 days). If not redeemed within this period, the transaction will be automatically cancelled, and the amount will be refunded to the sender.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This is a limited-time campaign that will be available for a specified period(campaign will be ended on 4<sup>th</sup> of April).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For complaint handling, please refer to the complaint document.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:12.0pt">Important Points: </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">When user tries to request Eidi but they have already received eidi pending to be redeemed from the same user they will receive error you have already received Eidi from this user redeem now.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In CPS against the receiver account this amount will be shown as pending authorized status. Accumulated balance will be shown in unclear balance against the receiver account in CPS.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Users can view all received Eidis (pending to be redeemed and already redeemed.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Transaction History</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">To check Transaction Failure Reason</span></span></strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction &gt;&gt; Transaction Details &gt;&gt; Failure Description</span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzCash â€“ Redeem Rewards - SOP
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: DFS
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">This document provides a summarized overview of the Redeem rewards (Redeemable Cashback) feature.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk192491725"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Previously, cashback amounts from CVM campaigns were directly added to the customer&#39;s account upon meeting the campaign requirements.</span></a></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">With this feature enablement, customers must redeem the cashback amount within 72 hours after it is posted.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">If not redeemed within 72 hours, the cashback amount will expire.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Eligible customers receive a campaign message regarding cashback.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customers can redeem cashback via the JazzCash app or USSD.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><a name="_Hlk192491709"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Redeemable cashback feature will be used exclusively for CVM campaigns. Other campaigns, such as Balance Maintenance, are excluded.</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px">&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Eligibility Criteria</span></span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customers who receive the CVM cashback campaign message.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="color:black">Customers who fulfill the complete campaign requirements.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#e74c3c">Pre-requisite to SOP</span></span></span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Verification</strong>: As per scenario</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Account Status</strong>: Active</span></span></li>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-SG" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#e74c3c">System Navigation for Agent:</span></span></span></span></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Account Status</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Check Status</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Transaction History</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>To check Transaction Failure Reason</strong>: CPS &gt;&gt; Search MSISDN &gt;&gt; Click Operation &gt;&gt; Click Transaction history &gt;&gt; Check Transaction &gt;&gt; Transaction Details &gt;&gt; Failure Description</span></span></li>
</ul>
